T02D2257:207b-1: do ha ni dhi ko sha g'iti n'a ma ba
T02D2257:207b-2: ri p'u ra pra sh'a sta ma ni ti yo
T02D2257:207b-4: mi zad ba'i gter mdzod longs su gang ba'i glu
T02D2257:207b-5: zhes bya ba gnyug ma'i de nyid rab tu ston
T02D2257:207b-7: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal smra ba'i skyes mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2257:207b-8: bla ma dam ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2257:207b-9: skyes bu mchog rnams de nyid thugs su chud pa'i ngo bo dang //
T02D2257:207b-10: shes rab ral gris nyon mongs gcod par byed ba'i rje btsun pa //
T02D2257:207b-11: dam pa'i skyes mchog de nyid ston par byed pa'i bla ma la //
T02D2257:207b-12: bsam gyis mi khyab don gyis yang dag bstod byas te //
T02D2257:207b-13: sangs rgyas nyid las sangs rgyas rtogs bar byed ba'i ngo bo dpal //
T02D2257:207b-14: mi shes gnyug ma'i ngo bo tha ma la shes ba 'di dag ni //
T02D2257:207b-15: dam pa rnams kyi gdams ngag ji lta'i don nyid du //
T02D2257:207b-16: tha dad rtog pa gcad phyir mnyam nyid mee tris bshad //
T02D2257:207b-17: de la chos kyi sku dang de'i dgongs nga tha
T02D2257:207b-18: mi dad ba dag rje btsun pa dpal gyi ri
T02D2257:207b-19: bo bdag gis rtogs pa'i don glur blangs te bsam
T02D2257:207b-20: gyis mi khyab pa'i don de dag bdag gis rab
T02D2257:207b-21: tu rnyed do // de yang mkha' 'gro ma dag
T02D2257:207b-22: gis rjes su dpag pas nye bar mi rnyed pa'i
T02D2257:207b-23: phyir lkugs pa'i skang brjod de /
T02D2257:207b-26: mu stegs sgra dang tshad med ba //
T02D2257:207b-27: mngon sum rjes dpag rigs pa'i mdung //
T02D2257:207b-28: blo rab mngon shes phra mos kyang //
T02D2257:207b-29: rtogs par mi nus man ngag yin //
T02D2257:207b-31: de bas na 'di ni tug kan tsa ma na /
T02D2257:207b-35: len pa len med len 'ong ba //
T02D2257:207b-36: smra ba smra min smra med brda //
T02D2257:207b-37: don min med don med min no //
T02D2257:207b-39: bla ma'i dag las nges par rnyed pa'i don to //
T02D2257:207b-40: de bas na hi ma h'um mam sa ra h'um ho zhes bya ste /
T02D2257:207b-42: mgo bcad nam mkha' dag la 'phangs //
T02D2257:207b-43: nang grol tshogs kyis ston mo byas //
T02D2257:207b-44: rkang mthil spyi gtsug dag tu bkug / lte ba'i 'khor lo bskor bar bya //
T02D2257:207b-45: de ni nges par sbyar ba'i cha'o //
T02D2257:207b-46: de bas na rtag la la aa ri ta zhes te /
T02D2257:207b-48: grub pa med phyir rmi lam ston //
T02D2257:207b-49: brgyud pa yin phyir glu len te /
T02D2257:207b-50: gsang ba yin phyir mkha' 'gro'i skad //
T02D2257:207b-51: gdams ngag yin phyir nyams su blang //
T02D2257:208a-1: ba ni gnas par bya ba'i yan lag go //
T02D2257:208a-2: de bas na ae kra na zhes bya ste /
T02D2257:208a-3: skye ba med pa de dag gi ni /
T02D2257:208a-4: skye med mkha' las thim pa shar //
T02D2257:208a-5: rgyud gzhan 'bras bu'i thig ba ste //
T02D2257:208a-6: sgra ni dus chen 'gyur dus ston //
T02D2257:208a-7: mu rigs chal du bram zhes so //
T02D2257:208a-8: zhes pas ni thos ba can la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2257:208a-9: de bas na ha hi ta ma ni zhes bya ste de dag gi don ni /
T02D2257:208a-10: gzhan gsal snying po'i khyad par dang //
T02D2257:208a-11: bla ma bzang las de rtogs te //
T02D2257:208a-12: gnyug mar sbyang ba'i spyod pa yin //
T02D2257:208a-13: 'dir ni nyams su blang ba ste //
T02D2257:208a-15: de dag ni go bar bya ba'i don nyid du sbyar ro //
T02D2257:208a-16: de bas na ma ki shu ksha na re zhes bya ste de dag gi don ni //
T02D2257:208a-17: g-yas pa gzhan dang gzhan der min //
T02D2257:208a-18: g-yon pas gsal ba brtag phyir min //
T02D2257:208a-19: de nyid de nyid rtogs pa min //
T02D2257:208a-20: min pa rgyal po'i shes pa min //
T02D2257:208a-21: zhes bya ba ni khyad par gyi don brjod pa'o //
T02D2257:208a-22: de bas na do ha zhes bya ste /
T02D2257:208a-24: rang la med pa aa ai'o //
T02D2257:208a-25: rang dang ldan pa ni ae au'o //
T02D2257:208a-26: phan tshun gnyis la mi smra ba ni ai aa'o //
T02D2257:208a-27: ngo bo ni li ri aa'o //
T02D2257:208a-28: gzhan gcod par byed pa ni aoo li'o //
T02D2257:208a-29: mtshan nyid kyi don ni ai aa ra'o //
T02D2257:208a-30: gnas bstan pa'i bya ba ni au li ai'o //
T02D2257:208a-31: nyams su myong bas ni aa ra'o //
T02D2257:208a-32: de nyid kyi brjod pa ni aa aam aa'i'o //
T02D2257:208a-33: de ni mkha' 'gro ma'i sgra'i don dang po'o //
T02D2257:208a-34: sgra'i tshig mang po bzang po'o can la sbyar ba ni /
T02D2257:208a-35: khur chen khyer dang 'gro ba mgyogs //
T02D2257:208a-36: phyin pa med da dang po'i sa //
T02D2257:208a-37: gshog pa spar bas nam mkha'i mtsho //
T02D2257:208a-38: ri rab nor bu gling na bde //
T02D2257:208a-40: sgra'i tshig bka' la sbyar ba ni //
T02D2257:208a-41: chu srin gdug pa'i khar 'gro dang //
T02D2257:208a-42: rus sbal rgyab na gnas pa dang //
T02D2257:208a-43: nya mid chen po'i lto ba ni //
T02D2257:208a-44: nyi ma'i dkyil na mdzes pa che //
T02D2257:208a-46: bstan pa'i sgra sbyar ba ni //
T02D2257:208a-47: me yis skams pa'i bdud rtsi dang //
T02D2257:208a-48: dur khrod tshogs kyi rus pa btung //
T02D2257:208a-49: rgya mtsho'i steng na gzhon nu ma //
T02D2257:208a-50: rgyal pos sa 'dzin gdol ba'i mchog /
T02D2257:208a-52: sgra mkhas pas sbyar ba ni //
T02D2257:208a-53: rkang mthil spyi gtsug snying du mnyam //
T02D2257:208a-54: kha rkub brgyud pa khyi yi zas //
T02D2257:208a-55: srin bu me khyer chu bo'i rgyun //
T02D2257:208a-56: thal mo brdabs pa nam mkha'i sgra //
T02D2257:208a-58: bstan pa thun mong ba'i sbyar ba ni //
T02D2257:208b-0: par su ni gi hi da ko sha bu ha sa na gi ta @208b na ma'o //
T02D2257:208b-2: ma zad mi zad zad pa med //
T02D2257:208b-3: mthar thug rdo rje nyid kyi rang //
T02D2257:208b-4: sangs rgyas sangs rgyas rtog ba min //
T02D2257:208b-5: lag pa'i nor bu mthong ba'o //
T02D2257:208b-6: bde gshegs snang ba sems kyi rang //
T02D2257:208b-7: nges pa'i don smra nga yi snying //
T02D2257:208b-8: rtogs par byed pa nor bu'i rten //
T02D2257:208b-9: de yang sa bon chu yis skyes //
T02D2257:208b-10: gdol ba lta bu'i smos pa las //
T02D2257:208b-11: nor bu chen po lag tu 'ongs //
T02D2257:208b-12: sangs rgyas dam pa rnams kyis gsungs //
T02D2257:208b-13: mkha' la mi smra smra ru med //
T02D2257:208b-14: thams cad chos kyi 'khor lo che //
T02D2257:208b-15: phyag rgya chen po gnyug ma'i ngang //
T02D2257:208b-16: bde dang bral ba chos kyis ku //
T02D2257:208b-17: gsal dang mi rtog longs spyod rdzogs //
T02D2257:208b-18: snang dang stong pa sprul pa ste //
T02D2257:208b-19: rang bzhin lam la shin tu gnas //
T02D2257:208b-20: smras kyang grub pa med pa ni //
T02D2257:208b-21: rmi lam gyi ni nor bzhin du //
T02D2257:208b-22: mtshan nyid bral ba rdo rje'i glu //
T02D2257:208b-23: bla ma'i zhal las nges par blang //
T02D2257:208b-25: aa ai au ae ra li ao zhes bya ste /
T02D2257:208b-27: dang po bzang po mchog gis stobs so //
T02D2257:208b-28: gnyis pa glu blang bar bya ba nyid do //
T02D2257:208b-30: bzhi pa ni longs spyod do //
T02D2257:208b-31: lnga pa ni grub par byed pa'o //
T02D2257:208b-32: drug pa ni de bzhin nyid do //
T02D2257:208b-35: de bas na brda'i don 'di dag ni rje btsun dpal gyi ri bo dang /
T02D2257:208b-36: bdag dang bdag gi cha las sbyar ba dag gis rtogs par bya ba nyid du zad do //
T02D2257:208b-38: mkha' 'gro ma l'a ma dang du ma di ri ni ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'o //
T02D2257:208b-39: kang ka dang gtum mo dang phag mo dang ro
T02D2257:208b-40: langs ma dang 'jigs pa'i gdong can ma ni 'phags
T02D2257:208b-41: pa chen mo dag gi yum mo //
T02D2257:208b-43: be t'a l'i ni rje btsun pa'i yum mo //
T02D2257:208b-44: rdo rje dpa' mo su kha ma h'a siddhi ni bdag byin gyis rlobs pa'i mar gyur pa ste /
T02D2257:208b-45: 'di dag ni gzhan dang ma 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2257:208b-46: der yang ma zad de gnas pa chen po na
T02D2257:208b-47: bdag nyid gnas pa de'i tshe tsunda ma dang stobs
T02D2257:208b-48: mchog ma dang dkar mo ma dang shan pa mo
T02D2257:208b-49: dag gis ro'i brda bstan par gyur to //
T02D2257:208b-50: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'byung gnas dam pa dag tu
T02D2257:208b-51: yang he ru ka ni dur khrod ma dang rnal
T02D2257:208b-52: 'byor ma chen mo sna chen ma dag gis /
T02D2257:208b-53: bsod nams kyi 'khor lo'i brda bstan par 'gyur ro //
T02D2257:209a-0: rdo rje btsun mo'i spyan sngar yangs 'og @209a * //
T02D2257:209a-2: brtul zhugs ma dang spyod pa'i rgyu ba dag gis kyang byis pa'i brda bstan bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2257:209a-3: de bas na rnal 'byor pa dag gis brda'i don la mkhas par bya ste /
T02D2257:209a-4: 'di dag gi don ni bdag gis kla klo'i skad du brjod do //
T02D2257:209a-5: ho sa ra na aa sa ra na /
T02D2257:209a-14: aa tsa ba aa aa ti ma /
T02D2257:209a-29: ae na sa su ga do yi la /
T02D2257:209a-33: ai ba ta na ha hi ai pa na ha /
T02D2257:209a-34: po tsa na to ya li /
T02D2257:209a-35: du ma ho 'o lo tsan do //
T02D2257:209a-39: da ki sa phem phem phem ha ha ho zhes pa ste /
T02D2257:209a-40: 'dir ni srid pa'i 'khor lo'i brdar gyur pa thams cad de /
T02D2257:209a-41: rje btsun pa ni mnyam pa la bzhugs pa ste /
T02D2257:209a-42: bdag 'ba' zhig gis shes pa kho nar zad do //
T02D2257:209a-43: de yang mdor bstan pa'i tshul ni /
T02D2257:209a-44: dang po pa nyid rnam par zhi ba'o //
T02D2257:209a-83: 'dis ni brda'i don rnam par phye ba'o //
T02D2257:209a-84: de yang rje btsun pa dpal gyi ri bo pa dag gis //
T02D2257:209a-85: snyid rje chen po dag gis kun nas bslang pa'i
T02D2257:209a-86: sangs rgyas ye shes kyi spyod yul rnam par phye
T02D2257:209a-87: ba'i don de dag gis dgrol zhing gsal ba'i bdag
T02D2257:209a-88: nyid du bshad par bya ste /
T02D2257:209a-89: de yang dang po snying po'i don dngos kyis mtshan
T02D2257:209b-0: nyid la tha dad kyis yang dag @209b pa'i don
T02D2257:209b-1: gtan la phab cing de bzhin nyid je lta ba
T02D2257:209b-2: de dag la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mchod pa
T02D2257:209b-3: brjod nas / bshad par dam bca' bar bya ste /
T02D2257:209b-4: 'di dag ni spros pa dang bcas pa'i tha snyad kyis dben pa yin te /
T02D2257:209b-6: 'di dag ni rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos rtogs pa'i don yin no //
T02D2257:209b-7: de yang rab tu mi gnas pa'i rgyud las /
T02D2257:209b-8: dbang phyug chen po dag gis nyams su myong ba
T02D2257:209b-9: 'di ni dam pa rnams kyis gdams ngag go zhes
T02D2257:209b-10: 'byung ba'i phyir 'di dag gi don nges par shes
T02D2257:209b-11: par byed pa yang gnyis med brjod bya dang bral
T02D2257:209b-13: dam pa rnams kyis rtogs pa las 'byung ba'i zhal gyi bdud rtsi dang /
T02D2257:209b-14: sems nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa chen bor rtogs pa'i lus te /
T02D2257:209b-15: glegs bam tha dad pa la ltos pa ni ma yin no //
T02D2257:209b-16: de yang rgyud de nyid las //
T02D2257:209b-17: 'di ni gnyis med rab tu sbyor ba'i lus /
T02D2257:209b-18: dam pa rnams kyis rnam par sbrel pa'i ngag / bsam gyis mi khyab sems kyi klong rnams ni //
T02D2257:209b-19: dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi dbang po'o //
T02D2257:209b-21: don de nyid nyams su myong bar byas la thams
T02D2257:209b-22: cad bde ba chen po'i rig par sbyar bar bya'o
T02D2257:209b-24: rnal 'byor rig ba rig pa che //
T02D2257:209b-25: dbang phyug rig ba bla na med //
T02D2257:209b-26: nyams su myong ba don gyi gtso //
T02D2257:209b-27: thams cad bde ba chen por sbyor //
T02D2257:209b-29: man ngag gi thigs pa nyid snying gi padmo'i ze
T02D2257:209b-30: 'brul thim pas rang bzhin gyis 'od 'byung bar 'gyur
T02D2257:209b-31: te / 'dis ni rtog pa'i 'ching pa thams cad rang grol bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2257:209b-32: de yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud las //
T02D2257:209b-33: snying gi padmo'i tha mal shes pa dag / mnyam nyid rtsi yis kun nas khyab pa ste //
T02D2257:209b-34: sems kyi bung ba dag gis 'jibs gyur na //
T02D2257:209b-35: chos nyid ma bcos bde ba chen po'i sku //
T02D2257:209b-38: tha mal shes pa nang nas sgro 'dogs gcod //
T02D2257:209b-39: gcod du med de chos dbyings 'khor lo che //
T02D2257:209b-41: snang ba thams cad chos kyi sku gnyug ma'i ngo bo nyid du shes par bya zhing /
T02D2257:209b-42: dus thams cad du phyag rgya chen po 'ba' zhig tu blta'o //
T02D2257:209b-43: de yang rab tu mi gnas pa'i rgyud las //
T02D2257:209b-44: snang srid phyag rgya chen po ste //
T02D2257:209b-45: bde ba chen po kun du bzang //
T02D2257:210a-0: @210a * // rnal 'byor dbang phyug blta bar byos //
T02D2257:210a-2: dus thams cad du lhan cig skyes pa gnyis su
T02D2257:210a-3: med pa'i ye shes kyi tshul du spyad par bya'o
T02D2257:210a-4: // de yang rgyud de nyid las //
T02D2257:210a-5: bdag tu mi brtag gzhan du min //
T02D2257:210a-6: gnyis ka dag tu brtag mi bya //
T02D2257:210a-7: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes ni //
T02D2257:210a-8: gnyis med spyod pa chen po'o //
T02D2257:210a-10: chos kyi sku de dag ni gzhan du brtag par
T02D2257:210a-11: mi bya ste rang gis sems ji bzhin ba la
T02D2257:210a-13: sangs rgyas grub pa med phyir gzhan mi brtag / grub med sems ni rdo rje lta bu ste //
T02D2257:210a-14: sems can kun gyi rgyud la de gnas shing //
T02D2257:210a-15: gnas pa med pa rdo rje snying po che //
T02D2257:210a-17: de dag ni 'bad rtsol gyis bsgrub pa dang 'grub pa yang ma yin te /
T02D2257:210a-18: gnyug ma'i don phyin ci ma log pa de dag
T02D2257:210a-19: goms pa mthar phyin pa las ni skye ba 'di
T02D2257:210a-20: la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro
T02D2257:210a-21: ; / de yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud las //
T02D2257:210a-22: 'bad dang rtsol bas de nyid 'grub pa min //
T02D2257:210a-23: rtogs pa'i don la goms par gyur ba na //
T02D2257:210a-24: skye ba 'di yis sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob //
T02D2257:210a-25: bzang po he ru kas ni rnam par smras //
T02D2257:210a-26: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir dus de dag kyang thun mong rnam par bshad par bya'o //
T02D2257:210a-27: khyad par gyi don tha mal gyi shes pa 'di
T02D2257:210a-28: dag ni bla ma dam pa'i drin gyis bdud rtsi'i
T02D2257:210a-29: khu ba 'thungs pas rang gi de kho na nyid
T02D2257:210a-30: rtogs te skad cig ma gcig la mngon par rdzogs
T02D2257:210a-32: de yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud las /
T02D2257:210a-33: rtogs dang goms pa mthar phyin pa //
T02D2257:210a-35: rtogs pa'i skad cig de nyid la //
T02D2257:210a-36: bcu bzhi sa la des par gnas //
T02D2257:210a-38: de nyid kyi don gsal bar bya ba ni //
T02D2257:210a-39: kun ldan kun min ldan pa yi //
T02D2257:210a-40: lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo dpal //
T02D2257:210a-41: bde dang stong par dbyer med sku //
T02D2257:210a-42: gnyug ma'i don la phyag 'tshal te //
T02D2257:210a-43: bdag gis de nyid bdag 'dra ba //
T02D2257:210a-44: bdag 'dra gzhan la de nyid ston //
T02D2257:210a-45: brda las shes shing myong ba nyid //
T02D2257:210a-46: smra med don ni der bshad bya //
T02D2257:210a-48: bla ma dam pa rnams kyis gdams pa'i don de dag smos par bya ste /
T02D2257:210b-0: de yang kun ldan zhes pa ni @210b snang grags kyi chos thams cad do //
T02D2257:210b-1: de dag gang dang ldan zhe na /
T02D2257:210b-2: sems sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid la ldan pa'o //
T02D2257:210b-3: kun min zhes bya ba ni de la zhe na
T02D2257:210b-4: shes kyi rtog pa ji snyed pa de dag min
T02D2257:210b-5: no // ldan pa'i zhes bya ba ni sems gnyug
T02D2257:210b-6: ma'i ngo bo phyin ci ma log pa dag pa
T02D2257:210b-7: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsum
T02D2257:210b-8: dang ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2257:210b-9: lhan cig skyes pa zhes bya ba ni chos gi su la bya ste /
T02D2257:210b-10: snang ba lhan cig skyes pa dang //
T02D2257:210b-11: sems nyid lhan cig skyes pa'o //
T02D2257:210b-12: de bas na de dag glo bur ba ma yin
T02D2257:210b-13: te thog ma nyid nas chos kyi sku'i ngo bo
T02D2257:210b-14: la rtogs pa dpal du gyur pa dag go //
T02D2257:210b-15: de dag ni bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin yin te /
T02D2257:210b-16: zag pa dang bcas pa'i bde ba dang zag pa med pa'i bde ba'o //
T02D2257:210b-17: de dag kyang lus dang sems dag las byung ba ste /
T02D2257:210b-18: de la brtags pa'i 'khrul pa med pa ni stong pa'o //
T02D2257:210b-19: de ltar bde ba dang stong pa dbyer med pa
T02D2257:210b-20: ni chos kyi sku yin te de nyid tha mal
T02D2257:210b-21: gyi shes pa'i ngo bo 'gyur ba med pa ni
T02D2257:210b-22: mchog ste sku'o // de ni sems ma bcos pa gnyug ma'i don nyid yin te /
T02D2257:210b-23: de yang mar la mar gzhag pa dang chu la
T02D2257:210b-24: chu gzhag pa'i tshul du sems la snang ba gzhag
T02D2257:210b-25: pa 'di dag ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes
T02D2257:210b-26: te / kun la gnas shing don dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir //
T02D2257:210b-27: phyag 'tshal zhing btud par rigs so //
T02D2257:210b-28: te zhes bya ba ni lhag ma dang bcas pa'i don te /
T02D2257:210b-29: gong gi mchod par brjod pa'i gnas bsam gyis mi
T02D2257:210b-30: khyab par don ji bzhin par gsal bar bya ba'i
T02D2257:210b-31: tha tshig go // de yang bdag gis zhes bya
T02D2257:210b-32: ba ni tha snyad kyi blo la brjod par bya
T02D2257:210b-33: tha tshig go // ste / rje btsun pa nyid do //
T02D2257:210b-34: de nyid ces bya ba ni thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
T02D2257:210b-35: bdag 'dra zhes bya ba ni snang grags kyi chos thams cad la bya ste /
T02D2257:210b-36: de dag tha mal gyi shes pa bdag nyid kyi
T02D2257:210b-37: dbang du gyur cing de dus thams cad mtshungs par
T02D2257:210b-39: de ltar don de nyid kyang su la ston zhe na /
T02D2257:210b-41: rje btsun bdag dang mtshungs pa 'am //
T02D2257:210b-42: gang zag skal ba dang ldan pa dbang po rab
T02D2257:210b-43: tu gyur pa don gnyis su med pa 'di dag
T02D2257:210b-44: la mos shing gzhol ba tshogs bsags pa'i mthu las
T02D2257:211a-0: @211a * // gzhan la de kho na nyid bstan pa'am ston pa'o //
T02D2257:211a-1: de dag kyang bstan du yod dam zhe na ma yin te /
T02D2257:211a-3: ka la mu su ra dang /
T02D2257:211a-4: rtsi trid ka ni ka dang /
T02D2257:211a-5: ni ba lo bi ka dang /
T02D2257:211a-6: ha sna na ma da ni ma da ra la
T02D2257:211a-7: sogs pa'i brda las shes shing slob pa po'i blo
T02D2257:211a-8: la myong du med pa'i myong ba nyid ston to
T02D2257:211a-9: // de dag nyams su myong ba dang smrar med
T02D2257:211a-10: de med pa'i don de nyid ni rtog ge ba
T02D2257:211a-11: rnams la gsal bar bya ba'i phyir sgro btags te
T02D2257:211a-12: bshad par bya ba'i don to //
T02D2257:211a-13: de yang ji ltar bshad par bya zhe na /
T02D2257:211a-14: log par rtogs pa bsal ba dang //
T02D2257:211a-15: snying po don gyi khyad par dang //
T02D2257:211a-16: bla ma bstan la rtogs par bya zhing //
T02D2257:211a-17: gnyug ma la sbyangs pa'i gang zag gi spyod yul yin pa dang /
T02D2257:211a-18: de nyid nyams su blang ba dang /
T02D2257:211a-19: 'bras bu 'byung ba'i rim pa bstan pa'o //
T02D2257:211a-20: de yang dang por mi mthun zhing log pa'i gang zag dang mi 'grogs par ston te /
T02D2257:211a-21: dug sprul lta bu'i skal med kyis //
T02D2257:211a-22: nges pa'i skye bo dam pa la //
T02D2257:211a-23: skyon gyi dri mas gos byed cing //
T02D2257:211a-24: smad tshig mngon par sgrub pa la //
T02D2257:211a-25: ro snyoms ldan pa'i skyes bu yis //
T02D2257:211a-26: mthong ba tsam gyis 'jigs par byos //
T02D2257:211a-27: zhes bya ba'i don ni log par rtogs pa'i sems
T02D2257:211a-28: can tha dad kyi bag chags 'thug pos no na
T02D2257:211a-30: dug sbrul zhes bya ba ni sbrul dug can la bya ste /
T02D2257:211a-31: de dag mthong bas ni skyes pa dang bud med dag 'jigs par 'gyur la /
T02D2257:211a-32: reg pas ni sngangs par 'gyur te /
T02D2257:211a-33: bldags shing sos btab pas ni skrangs pa dang 'chi bar 'gyur /
T02D2257:211a-34: de lta bu'i gang zag skal ba med pa dag
T02D2257:211a-35: gis rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dag la
T02D2257:211a-37: mthong pa'i dus su yang khong khro ba dang bcas
T02D2257:211a-38: pas blta bar byed cing lhan cig tu gnas pa
T02D2257:211a-39: na yang de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi gnyug ma
T02D2257:211a-40: nyams su myong ba'i slu pa med pa'i don nges
T02D2257:211a-41: par sbyar pa'i skye bo dam pa dag la rnam
T02D2257:211a-42: par rtog pa'i skyon gyis de kho na nyid la
T02D2257:211a-43: mi 'jug cing zhugs pa dag kyang phyir zlog par
T02D2257:211a-44: byed pa la the tshom skyed pa ste /
T02D2257:211a-45: de la sogs pa dri mas gos par byed cing 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma yin no //
T02D2257:211a-46: 'di ni ston pa'i bstan pa ma yin no //
T02D2257:211b-0: 'di la dam pa rnams kyis gdams @211b ba ma
T02D2257:211b-1: yin no zhes smod pa'i tshig mngon par sgrub pa
T02D2257:211b-2: rnams la bde pa dang stong pa dbyer mi phyed
T02D2257:211b-3: pa'i ro snyoms dang ldan pa'i skyes bu dam pa
T02D2257:211b-4: des / mi mthun pa'i gang zag de dag mthong
T02D2257:211b-5: pa na de tsam gyis 'jigs par bya ba nyid
T02D2257:211b-6: des / yin te / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug
T02D2257:211b-7: chen po rnams kyis ni sems nyid gnyug ma'i rang
T02D2257:211b-9: de ma yin pa'i don gyi gzhi nyams su myong
T02D2257:211b-10: pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis ni gzhan du 'gro
T02D2257:211b-11: par byos shig / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2257:211b-12: sems la gnod pa'i phyir te de nyid rnam par
T02D2257:211b-13: smin pa ma yin pa myong zhing skyed par byed
T02D2257:211b-14: do // de ni bram ze'i brtul zhugs kyis mi grol bar ston te /
T02D2257:211b-15: de nyid la 'khrul mu stegs ni //
T02D2257:211b-16: bram ze spyod pa la gnas shing //
T02D2257:211b-17: sgyu ma'i rig byed bzhi dag ni //
T02D2257:211b-18: thun bzhis rnam par gnas shing 'don //
T02D2257:211b-19: sgyu ma'i dngos po gcod par byed //
T02D2257:211b-20: lta ba skye nyid rnam par 'dzin //
T02D2257:211b-21: zhes bya ba'i don ni gnyug ma dang bral pa'i tshangs par spyad pas mi grol par ston te /
T02D2257:211b-22: de yang de nyid ces bya ba ni chos nyid
T02D2257:211b-23: ma bcos pa'i rnal ma ji lta ba la bya'o
T02D2257:211b-24: // de nyid la 'khrul pa ni mu stegs lo ma can rnams te /
T02D2257:211b-25: de dag ni bram ze lta bu'i spyod pa la gnas par byed cing /
T02D2257:211b-26: rtag tu gtsang sbra dang khrus la brtson par byed
T02D2257:211b-27: pa ste tshangs pa'i skung pa dang gundhe 'chang pa
T02D2257:211b-28: yang byed do // de dag gi bya ba'i rim
T02D2257:211b-29: pa ni nus pa mi 'byin cing yid brtan du
T02D2257:211b-30: mi rung pa ste sgyu ma'o //
T02D2257:211b-31: rig pa ni thun mong gi dngos grub skyed par byed do //
T02D2257:211b-32: de la yang pho'i rig byed dang mo'i rig byed
T02D2257:211b-33: dang mtshungs pa'i rig byed ngang las kyi rig byed
T02D2257:211b-34: de dag ni ba ra hi dang /
T02D2257:211b-38: de dag gis ni sa 'og ging ngos grub dang
T02D2257:211b-39: mkha' spyod kyi dngos grub pa dang mig sman gyi
T02D2257:211b-40: dngos grub dang / rkang mgyogs kyi dngos grub 'grub par byed do //
T02D2257:211b-41: de yang snga dro dang phyi phred dang srod dang
T02D2257:211b-42: tho rangs dang thun bzhi'i rnam par rig pa dang
T02D2257:211b-43: ldan pa'i lo mang po bcu gcig gis rdo rje
T02D2257:211b-44: skyil mo krung la gnas shing 'don bar byed do
T02D2257:211b-45: // de yang sgyu ma'i dngos po skyes pa dang
T02D2257:211b-46: bud med dang byol song gi tshogs ji snyed pa
T02D2257:211b-47: byung na 'phro gcod par byed do //
T02D2257:211b-48: lta ba ni dbang phyug tu 'dzin pa ste /
T02D2257:211b-49: de dag gi 'dod pa yang dang po nam mkha'
T02D2257:211b-50: la rlung gi rdul phra rab gnyis lha dbang phyug
T02D2257:212a-1: pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po sra zhing
T02D2257:212a-3: de'i steng du sa'i rdul phra rab gnyis 'grub par 'gyur te /
T02D2257:212a-4: de gnyis phrad cing 'dus pa las gser gyi sa gzhi chen po 'byung par 'gyur ro //
T02D2257:212a-5: de'i steng du chu'i rdul phra rab gnyis 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2257:212a-6: de gnyis phrad cing 'dus pa'i skad cig ma de
T02D2257:212a-7: nyid las chu'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'byung bar 'gyur
T02D2257:212a-8: ro // de'i steng du me'i rdul phra rab gnyis 'grub par 'gyur te /
T02D2257:212a-9: de gnyis phrad cing 'dus par skad cig med nyid la me'i sgo nga chen por 'gyur ro //
T02D2257:212a-10: de dag gi nang nas mes po ral pa can
T02D2257:212a-11: zhes bya ba tshangs pa gdong bzhi pa byung ste
T02D2257:212a-12: / de dag gis gdong bzhi las mngal nas skyes pa dang /
T02D2257:212a-13: drod gsher las skyes pa dang /
T02D2257:212a-14: sgo nga las skyes pa dang /
T02D2257:212a-15: brdzus te skyes pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2257:212a-16: de la mchod pas mnyes shing mgu par gyur pa las ni legs pa dang /
T02D2257:212a-17: dngos grub thams cad skye pa nyid du byed do //
T02D2257:212a-18: de dag mnyes par ma byas pa de dag gis
T02D2257:212a-19: ni 'bad pa dang rtsol pa ji snyed cig byas
T02D2257:212a-20: kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro zhes mngon par log
T02D2257:212a-21: pa'i lta ba 'dzin par byed do//
T02D2257:212a-22: bzhi de dag gi 'khrul gzhi gang las 'khrul zhe na /
T02D2257:212a-23: yul w'a r'a na s'i'i grong khyer chen po li
T02D2257:212a-24: ga ta na zhes bya ba na bram ze'i rigs
T02D2257:212a-25: su skye ba bzhes pa'i tshangs par spyod pa'i rnal
T02D2257:212a-26: 'byor ba sing ha pa na ha zhes bya ba
T02D2257:212a-27: zhig gis 'jam dpal dpal bo rig pa'i rgyal mtshan
T02D2257:212a-28: gyi rgyud la brtan nas bya ba'i rgyud dang kri
T02D2257:212a-29: ya'i brtul zhugs nye par spyod pa la gnas pa'i
T02D2257:212a-30: tshul nye par spyod pa ni rgyud de dag dang
T02D2257:212a-32: de yang lung de nyid las //
T02D2257:212a-33: rtag tu tshangs par spyod par bya //
T02D2257:212a-34: khrus dang gtsang sbras gnas byas te //
T02D2257:212a-35: sha chang sgog btsong rnam par spang //
T02D2257:212a-36: rtag tu bram ze'i spyod pa ni //
T02D2257:212a-37: mu tig shel skud dang ldan pa //
T02D2257:212a-38: de bzhin mgo po rkang pa rked //
T02D2257:212a-39: lus kun rnam par dkri bya'o //
T02D2257:212a-40: lha dang lha mo'i rig pa dang //
T02D2257:212a-41: chos dang rig pa'i bzlas pa ni /
T02D2257:212a-42: tshangs par spyod pa dang ldan pa'i //
T02D2257:212a-43: bcu gcig dag ni thun bzhir bzlas //
T02D2257:212a-44: rdo rje skyil krung gnas byas te //
T02D2257:212b-0: lha yi nga rgyal @212b ldan par bya //
T02D2257:212b-1: smra dang dgod ngang g-yeng pa dang //
T02D2257:212b-2: bar du gcod pa'i mi rnams ni //
T02D2257:212b-4: zhes bya ba'i don de dag la brten te bsgrub
T02D2257:212b-5: pa las khyim bdag rgyal mtshan gyi dbang por skyes
T02D2257:212b-6: te / der longs spyod thams cad dang ldan te /
T02D2257:212b-7: de nas skye pa 'phos nas sum cu rtsa gsum
T02D2257:212b-8: gyi lha 'od kyi hal mtshan 'bar ba bya bar
T02D2257:212b-10: de dag las 'khrul nas mu stegs lo ma ba ste /
T02D2257:212b-11: lo tan ta zhes bya bas brtul zhugs de la
T02D2257:212b-12: nye par zhugs te de dang mtshungs par spyod pa
T02D2257:212b-13: ni de'i rjes su 'dzin pa rnams so //
T02D2257:212b-14: da ni ri khrod kyi mu stags rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi spyod pas mi grol pa bstan te /
T02D2257:212b-15: spre 'u la la'i brtul zhugs ni //
T02D2257:212b-16: sa chu ku sha pa yu yis //
T02D2257:212b-17: gdan dang zas dang 'khrud par byed //
T02D2257:212b-18: tsandan shing la me sbar te //
T02D2257:212b-19: rlangs pa yin zhes lus la gdung //
T02D2257:212b-20: don med sbyin sreg byed pa ni //
T02D2257:212b-21: du bas mig la gnod par zad //
T02D2257:212b-22: ces bya pa'i don ni 'khrul pa'i brtul zhugs pa dag stan te /
T02D2257:212b-23: de yang spre zhes pa'i don ni ri khrod kyi 'jigs pa'i gnas la bya'o //
T02D2257:212b-24: 'u zhes bya ba ni mu stegs kyi mkha' 'gro ma tshogs pa'i sa'o //
T02D2257:212b-25: la la zhes bya ba ni log pa'i bsam gtan don du gnyer pa la bya ba ste /
T02D2257:212b-26: brtul zhugs ni tha mal gyi spyod pa brtul nas
T02D2257:212b-27: drag po'i shugs la 'jug pa ste de dag ni
T02D2257:212b-28: bye ma dag pa'i sa'i tshom bu gsum gyi lus
T02D2257:212b-29: kyi stong dang smad dang rked pa 'khru par byed
T02D2257:212b-30: do // mtsho dag gi nang du song ste //
T02D2257:212b-31: spyi gtsug nas brtsams te khrus la brtson par byed pa dang /
T02D2257:212b-32: ba'i rnam pa lngas mandala byas pa'i steng du rtsva
T02D2257:212b-33: ku sha dag legs par bting ste 'dug pa dang
T02D2257:212b-34: / ba spos kyi rtsa yid du 'ong ba dag
T02D2257:212b-35: zos pa'i ba'i rnam pa ldas zas byed pa dang
T02D2257:212b-36: / / de yang rus pa'i khang pa dag tu
T02D2257:212b-37: gnas te yang dang yung du ka sha'i gdan dang
T02D2257:212b-38: / / / ba yu za ba dang sa dang chu'i khrud pa la brtson par byed do //
T02D2257:212b-39: nyi ma phyed kyi dus dag na yang tsandan gyi
T02D2257:212b-40: shing la gu gul gyi dud pas bdugs pa dag
T02D2257:212b-42: ras kyi kha tshar mang po dag gis g-yab pa'i dud pa lho phyogs su 'bud par byed do //
T02D2257:212b-43: de la brtul zhugs pa dag gis lus nye par
T02D2257:212b-44: bstan te 'di ni lha dbang phyug chen po'i kha'i
T02D2257:213a-1: lus la bdug par byed cing de yang lus kyi
T02D2257:213a-2: phyi nag por nam song pa na bdag gi sgrib
T02D2257:213a-3: pa thams cad 'dag par byed pa ste /
T02D2257:213a-4: chos nyid mi 'gyur pa'i rtags thob pa yin no
T02D2257:213a-5: zhes don med par sbyin sreg byed pa de ni
T02D2257:213a-6: du bas mig la gnod pa kho nar zad do
T02D2257:213a-7: // grong khyer pa rnams kyi me dang khyad med par 'gyur ro //
T02D2257:213a-8: de yang 'khrul gzhi gang las 'khrul zhe na /
T02D2257:213a-9: rnal 'byor pa chen po te lo ba zhes bya
T02D2257:213a-10: ba dpal he ru ka bzang po'i brtul zhugs la
T02D2257:213a-11: zhugs te ri khrod dag na nye par gnas pa
T02D2257:213a-12: de yang rgyu de dag na gnas pa'i spyod pa
T02D2257:213a-13: la gnas te de yang ci zhe na /
T02D2257:213a-14: he ru ka mchog sangs rgyas grub 'dod pa'i //
T02D2257:213a-15: dur khrod dgon pa'i phyogs nyid dam pa ru //
T02D2257:213a-16: phyi nang zang zing g-yeng pa rnam spangs te //
T02D2257:213a-17: kun sha sngon po'i gdan la 'dug nas kyang //
T02D2257:213a-18: ba yu rnam lnga zas su bza' bya la //
T02D2257:213a-19: tho rangs dus su sa dang chu yis bkru //
T02D2257:213a-20: mandala bzang po yid du 'ong pa'i steng //
T02D2257:213a-21: me tog chal pa legs par bkra ma nas kyang //
T02D2257:213a-22: tsandan dkar po'i shing ni legs brtsigs te //
T02D2257:213a-23: bde gshegs mnyes phyir rtag tu sbyin sreg dbul //
T02D2257:213a-24: ham ti ta dang bil pa'i snying po dang //
T02D2257:213a-25: aag ma ka dang kre ya aa ka ru //
T02D2257:213a-26: sbyar pa'i khu bas lus la byug par bya //
T02D2257:213a-27: des ni thun mong mchog gi dngos grub rnams //
T02D2257:213a-28: myur du ster zhing dam par 'gyur pa'o //
T02D2257:213a-30: tshul de bzhin du gnas pa dag skye pa 'phos
T02D2257:213a-31: nas rgyal po stobs kyi glang por skyes par gyur
T02D2257:213a-32: to // der tshogs nyid yongs su bsags pa dag
T02D2257:213a-33: gis phung po lhag ma med pa'i rig 'dzin gyi
T02D2257:213a-34: sar tshogs kyi 'khor lo la song pa mthong ngo
T02D2257:213a-35: to // // de dag la mu stegs pa la
T02D2257:213a-36: kin ti zhes bya ba 'khrul nas ri khrod kyi
T02D2257:213a-37: brtul zhugs de dag la zhugs te /
T02D2257:213a-38: de dag gi tshul 'dzin pa ni de'i rjes su 'brang pa dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2257:213a-39: da ni mu stegs rgyang pan pas mi grol par ston te //
T02D2257:213a-41: gtsug dang dbyu gu gnyis la gnas //
T02D2257:213a-42: sos kha'i gsal shing rtse la btab //
T02D2257:213a-43: zags pas nyon mongs bcom zer te //
T02D2257:213a-44: legs ldan dag gis nga rgyal gnas //
T02D2257:213a-45: mngon pa'i nga rgyal tha dad med //
T02D2257:213b-0: ces bya ba'i don ni mu stegs nags khrod pa'i brtul zhugs 'dzin @213b pa ste /
T02D2257:213b-1: spre'u zhes bya ba ni shing kha la gnas pa dag gi tshul la gdags pa'o //
T02D2257:213b-2: brtul zhugs zhes bya ba ni bag yangs pa la
T02D2257:213b-3: brtul nas sdug bsngal gyi bag la brten pa la
T02D2257:213b-4: zhugs pa'o // de yang gnas tshal dag tu sa gzhi legs par snyoms par byas te /
T02D2257:213b-5: de dag gi steng du shing taksha na'i sdong po chen po btsugs te /
T02D2257:213b-6: shing kha te ri'i rgya gram sbrel pa 'khor lo'i
T02D2257:213b-7: tshul du dbyu gu gnyis sbrel pa'i sna la spre'u
T02D2257:213b-8: bzhi gnas par byas te de dag gi steng du
T02D2257:213b-9: gnas nas gsal shing shin tu rno ba dag la
T02D2257:213b-10: snum byugs nas legs par brtag bas rno par byas
T02D2257:213b-11: pa dag gi rtse mos khrag rgyu pa'i phyir rtsa
T02D2257:213b-13: khrag dang chu ser zags pas bdag gi nyon mongs pa bcom pa yin no zhes zer te /
T02D2257:213b-14: seng ldeng gi rgya ma dag la nyi ma re te zhing lus 'jal par byed do //
T02D2257:213b-15: de yang ji bzhin du yang song pa ltar bdag
T02D2257:213b-16: ni lha legs ldan chen po dang khyad med pa
T02D2257:213b-17: yin no zhes nga rgyal gnas pa'o //
T02D2257:213b-18: bdag ni 'bras bu thams cad kyi bdag nyid yin no zhes mngon pa'i nga rgyal byed cing //
T02D2257:213b-19: sangs rgyas dang tha dad med par smra'o //
T02D2257:213b-20: de dag kyang 'khrul gzhi gang las 'khrul zhe na /
T02D2257:213b-21: lho phyogs kyang gi yul dag na slob dpon tom
T02D2257:213b-22: bi he ru ka'i slob ma shes rab kyi rgyud
T02D2257:213b-23: la blo gnas par byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa dha
T02D2257:213b-24: snya ru pa zhes bya ba zhig gis rgyal po
T02D2257:213b-25: chen po dpa' bas byin pa la 'di skad ces
T02D2257:213b-26: smras so // rgyal po chen po khyod gsang sngags
T02D2257:213b-27: kyi theg pa la rab tu gzhol par gyis shig
T02D2257:213b-29: skye pa 'di la dngos grub chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes pa dang /
T02D2257:213b-31: ri khrod pa khyod la nus pa ci yod /
T02D2257:213b-32: bdag la ston cig dang bdag dad par 'gyur ram mi 'gyur blta bar bya'o zhes pa dang /
T02D2257:213b-34: kye rgyal po chen po bdag gis ni gsang sngags
T02D2257:213b-35: kyi theg pa 'di dag la zhugs nas ring por
T02D2257:213b-36: ma lon te / de ltar yin yang lus kyi
T02D2257:213b-37: khrag ngang chu ser thams cad ni 'o mar 'gyur
T02D2257:213b-40: de bdag gis blta bar bya'o //
T02D2257:213b-42: zhag nyi shu snyed nas spyon cig zhes nas dur khrod du phyin te /
T02D2257:214a-0: lus kyi khrag dang chu ser la srog chags mi 'jug pa'i phyir zhing gi sgor bu @214a * //
T02D2257:214a-1: legs par byas pa'i steng du 'dug ste /
T02D2257:214a-2: gsal shing gi rtse mos lus phug nas khrag dang chu ser gzags te 'o ma 'thungs so //
T02D2257:214a-3: de nas rigs bzhi'i mkha' 'gro ma bzhis rnal 'byor ba de dag la srung pa byed pa dang /
T02D2257:214a-4: 'jig rten pa'i mi rnams kyis spre'u bzhir mthong par gyur to //
T02D2257:214a-5: de nas rgyal po des de dag gi phyir /
T02D2257:214a-6: rnal 'byor pa'i lus dum bur gcod do //
T02D2257:214a-7: bcad kyang de dag la khrag dang chu ser ma byung ste 'o ma 'dzag par gyur to //
T02D2257:214a-8: de nas rgyal po de ngo mtshar nas rnal 'byor pa bdag la skabs su song ste /
T02D2257:214a-9: rgyal srid thams cad bor nas ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so //
T02D2257:214a-10: de nas skye pa de nyid la thun mong gi
T02D2257:214a-11: dngos grub dpag tu med pa byung par gyur nas
T02D2257:214a-12: / mu stegs ha la kag sha zhes bya bas mthong nas de dag gi tshul du spyod de //
T02D2257:214a-13: de dag dang nye par 'dzin pa ni de'i rjes su 'brang ba dang bcas pa rnams so //
T02D2257:214a-14: da ni spyod pa'i brtul zhugs kyis mi grol pa ston te /
T02D2257:214a-15: rgyu pa dur gyi ngang pa'i skad //
T02D2257:214a-16: bstan pas gzhan 'dul chos ston pa //
T02D2257:214a-17: snying po'i don dang gzhan ma sel //
T02D2257:214a-18: de ltar mngon par zhen pa yis //
T02D2257:214a-19: 'gro pa brdzun pa nyid du grol //
T02D2257:214a-20: zhes bya ba'i don ni mu stegs ro langs pa dag gi spyod pa ste /
T02D2257:214a-21: grong khyer du bsod snyoms la rgyu pa'i dus su
T02D2257:214a-22: dur khrod na gnas pa'i ngang ba dag gi skad
T02D2257:214a-24: kang ka ra dang zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2257:214a-25: de yang mngon par 'dod pa'i sgras phye pa ni /
T02D2257:214a-27: ka ra dbang phyug gi nga rgyal lo //
T02D2257:214a-28: dang de dag gi mchod pa'o zhes li ka ru'i
T02D2257:214a-29: mchod pa chen po la gtogs pa'i mi rnams la
T02D2257:214a-31: mu stegs kyi bstan pa la 'jug cing gzhan dul
T02D2257:214a-32: par byed pa de gong ma lta bu'i chos ston
T02D2257:214a-33: pa'o // gzhan dag ni chos ma yin no ston
T02D2257:214a-34: pa'i bstan pa ma yin no zhes snying po'i don
T02D2257:214a-35: 'di dag dang nang ba sangs rgyas kyi chos gzhan
T02D2257:214a-37: de ltar bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa la mngon
T02D2257:214a-38: par zhen pa'i mu stegs kyi 'gro pa de dag
T02D2257:214a-39: ni don gyi 'bras bu 'byin par mi nus te
T02D2257:214a-40: / slu par byed pa'i phyir brdzun pa nyid du grol pa'o //
T02D2257:214b-0: da ni phyi rol pa'i bsam gtan gyi brtul zhugs kyis mi @214b grol par ston te /
T02D2257:214b-1: bsam gtan tshul byed mu stegs ni //
T02D2257:214b-2: gundhe ae re thal bas bkang //
T02D2257:214b-3: nyal dus thal byugs ral pa dgrol //
T02D2257:214b-4: bsod snyoms thig le spyi bor sdud //
T02D2257:214b-5: gtsang ma la ba'i steng nyid du //
T02D2257:214b-6: 'dug nas tshangs pa'i nga rgyal byed //
T02D2257:214b-7: ae ra na mar mes dbang phyug mchod //
T02D2257:214b-8: mtshams su gtor gtong dril bu dkrol //
T02D2257:214b-9: skyil krung bcas nas mig btsums te //
T02D2257:214b-10: brtag med tshig gis g-yo sgyu byed //
T02D2257:214b-11: skra med rgyan bral rigs ston //
T02D2257:214b-12: thod pa'i dur khrod dbang skur byed //
T02D2257:214b-13: bla ma'i nga rgyal yin tan len //
T02D2257:214b-14: zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi brdul zhugs kyis spyir mi grol par ston te /
T02D2257:214b-15: de yang bsam gtan zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa dngos gzhi'o //
T02D2257:214b-16: de dag ma rtogs pa'i bsam gtan ni bsam gtan
T02D2257:214b-17: gyi tshul du byed pa ste log par rtogs pa'o
T02D2257:214b-18: // de dag la gnas pa'i mu stegs ni gundhe
T02D2257:214b-19: phrag par bkal te bram ze'i ro bsregs pa'i thal
T02D2257:214b-21: mu stegs de dag gundhe'i nang thal bas bkang ste
T02D2257:214b-22: nyal pa'i dus su yang lus po la thal ba
T02D2257:214b-23: byugs te ral pa'i spyi gtsug nas bkrol nas lus
T02D2257:214b-25: grong gseb dang dur khrod thams cad du bsod snyoms
T02D2257:214b-26: la rgyu ste khrag dang zhag gi thig le dag
T02D2257:214b-27: gis lus thams cad la 'god par byed do //
T02D2257:214b-28: sprul gyi chun po dang bcas pa'i ral pa'i spyi bor bsdus te /
T02D2257:214b-29: sba dang smyug ma las btags pa'i stan la rta'i gzugs bris te /
T02D2257:214b-30: shin tu gtsang bar byas pa la tsandan dang gur
T02D2257:214b-31: gum la sogs pa dris bsgos pa'i steng du 'dug
T02D2257:214b-32: nas kha shar phyogs su bltas te /
T02D2257:214b-33: tshangs pa gdong bzhi pa'i nga rgyal byed do //
T02D2257:214b-34: ae rang zhes bya ba ni sbrul gdug ba can la bya ste /
T02D2257:214b-35: de dag gi tshil bus thod pa'i nang du mar
T02D2257:214b-36: me btang ste des dbang phyug chen po'i rten rdo
T02D2257:214b-37: las byes pa lha srid pa'i gdong can la mchod
T02D2257:214b-38: par byed do // shar phyogs mtshams su nyi ma re re la gtor ma bcu bcu gtong ste /
T02D2257:214b-39: dur khrod kyi ka p'a la rnying pa la kha
T02D2257:214b-40: ti ri'i khu bas padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bris
T02D2257:214b-41: pa'i dbus su srid pa'i mes po btags te dril
T02D2257:215a-0: rdo rje skyil mo krung bas nas @215a * //
T02D2257:215a-1: mig btsums te shes pa'i tshogs drug ma 'gags pa
T02D2257:215a-2: dag la ting nge 'dzin med do zhes rna ba
T02D2257:215a-4: da ri ha zhes brtag med pa'i tshig de dag
T02D2257:215a-5: gis yon bdag rnams la 'debs par byed cing g-yo
T02D2257:215a-6: sgyur byed do // chung ma skra med rgyan dang
T02D2257:215a-7: bral ba la srid pa'i mes po dpral par bris
T02D2257:215a-8: nas 'di dag gsang sngags kyi rig pa yin no
T02D2257:215a-9: zhes ston cing bdag ni chags pa dang bral pa
T02D2257:215a-10: sgyur byed do // ste / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2257:215a-11: rig ma 'di dag la blta bar bya'o zhes so //
T02D2257:215a-12: dur khrod kyi thod pa dag la dbang phyug chen
T02D2257:215a-13: po'i gzugs bris te skra shad kyi dra bar bcug
T02D2257:215a-14: nas dur khrod du song ste /
T02D2257:215a-15: skyes pa dang bud med gzhon nu dag gi ro
T02D2257:215a-16: bshad nas za bar byed cing thod pa de dag
T02D2257:215a-17: mgo bo la bzhag nas dbang bskur par byed do
T02D2257:215a-18: // 'di dag ni lha chen po dag gis gnang pa'i dngos grub yin no zhes zer ro //
T02D2257:215a-19: de nas sten mthon po la 'dug cing nga ni
T02D2257:215a-20: khyed rnams kyi bla ma chen po yin no zhes
T02D2257:215a-21: nga rgyal bas slob mas phul pa'i yon rnams len
T02D2257:215a-22: par byed do // 'di dag gi 'khrul gzhi ni
T02D2257:215a-23: rnal 'byor pa chen po dan ta ko la zhes
T02D2257:215a-24: bya ba sgyu 'phrul chen mo la nye bar gnas
T02D2257:215a-25: pa dag gi tshe de'i tshul du sgrub par byed
T02D2257:215a-26: par byed do // do // de yang rgyud de nyid nas /
T02D2257:215a-27: rtag tu dur khrod dag tu gnas //
T02D2257:215a-28: he ru ka yi nga rgyal dang //
T02D2257:215a-29: mkha' 'gro rnams la gtor ma sbyin //
T02D2257:215a-30: kang ka ra dang 'bod par byed //
T02D2257:215a-31: dpa' bo chen po'i nga rgyal bas //
T02D2257:215a-32: dur khrod chas dang thig le mgo / ral pa spyi gtsug dag tu bskur //
T02D2257:215a-33: bdug pa'i mar me rtag tu mchod //
T02D2257:215a-34: dur khrod gnas su gtor ma gtong //
T02D2257:215a-35: gcer bu rgyan bral skra grol pa'i //
T02D2257:215a-36: mtshan dang ldan pa'i rig ma la //
T02D2257:215a-37: dbang bskur bde pa bskyed par bya //
T02D2257:215a-38: de ni srid gsum dag pa'i don //
T02D2257:215a-40: zhes 'byung pa'i phyir de dang mthun par spyad de //
T02D2257:215a-41: de dag skye pa 'phos pa las rnal 'byor pa sh'anting dharma ka ra skyes par gyur te /
T02D2257:215a-42: de la mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyis dbang bskur
T02D2257:215a-43: nas srid pa gsum gyi 'khor lo thams cad sgyur
T02D2257:215a-44: par nus so // de dag mu stegs gcer bu
T02D2257:215a-45: pa legs srung zhes bya bas mthong nas brtul zhugs
T02D2257:215a-46: par nus so // la zhugs so // de dang
T02D2257:215b-0: nye par mtshungs @215b pa ni de'i rjes su 'brang
T02D2257:215b-1: ba dang bcas pa rnams so //
T02D2257:215b-2: da ni phyi rol pa brtul zhugs kyi cha dang
T02D2257:215b-3: mthun pa dag gis kyang grol par mi 'gyur te
T02D2257:215b-4: / skra sen ring zhing dri ma skud //
T02D2257:215b-5: gos bral skra ni rnam par 'bal //
T02D2257:215b-7: gsang sngags kyi tshul dag dang cha mthun par spyod pa ste /
T02D2257:215b-8: skra shin tu ring pa la rtsa ba glu shing gi me tog gi chus byugs te /
T02D2257:215b-9: ser skyar byas pas de dag spyi gtsug tu sbrul gyis 'ching par byed do //
T02D2257:215b-10: sen mo 'ang shin tu ring bzhin lus po la
T02D2257:215b-11: thang chu dang bdud rtsi bsres pa'i dri mas skud
T02D2257:215b-12: par byed do // gcer bu'i tshul gyis gnas par byed de dus rtag tu gos dang bral ba'o //
T02D2257:215b-13: skra'i mtha' thams cad kyang 'bal bar byed de //
T02D2257:215b-14: nga ni chags pa dang bral pa yin no zhes smra bar byed do //
T02D2257:215b-15: de dag kyang gzhi ci las 'khrul zhe na /
T02D2257:215b-16: byang phyogs 'dam bu'i tshal na rnal 'byor pa dpal
T02D2257:215b-17: gyi zhags chen po zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das
T02D2257:215b-18: dga' ba'i rdo rje'i nga rgyal du zhugs nas /
T02D2257:215b-19: lo bcu dgu'i bar du shing lo'i stan gcig gi steng nas ma langs te /
T02D2257:215b-20: bza' ba dang btung pa ni dri chen dang dri chu'i rgyun log pas 'tsho bar byas so //
T02D2257:215b-21: de yang gcer bu'i tshul gyis gnas par byas te
T02D2257:215b-22: skra dang sen mo thams cad kyang ring bar gyur
T02D2257:215b-23: to // skra'i rtse mos la 'khyil pa dag dum bu dum bur yang gyur to //
T02D2257:215b-24: de nas lha'i bu rnams kyis nam mkha' la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
T02D2257:215b-25: skyes bu mchog ldan dpa' bo he ru ka //
T02D2257:215b-26: rje btsun bzhengs shig bsam gtan las bzhengs la //
T02D2257:215b-27: lhung pa'i las can rnams kyi tshogs bsags phyir //
T02D2257:215b-28: sum cu rtsa gsum 'khor los sgyur par gshegs //
T02D2257:215b-29: zhes nas nam mkha' la rol mo'i tshogs dpag tu med pas /
T02D2257:215b-30: bsu ba dang blta ba byas nas song ngo //
T02D2257:215b-31: de dag gdong pa au ri ta na zhes bya
T02D2257:215b-32: bas mthong nas de'i rjes su brtul zhugs spyad do
T02D2257:215b-33: // de dang nye par mtshungs pa ni de'i rjes su 'brang ba dang bcas pa rnams so //
T02D2257:215b-34: de dag thams cad kyang tshul 'di lta bu dag yin te /
T02D2257:215b-35: yid ni nam mkha'i khams la rtog / bstan la gnod byed lam gzugs ston //
T02D2257:215b-36: bdag ni grol 'dod thar la mngon par dga' //
T02D2257:215b-37: gnas min bzod pa can la gnas //
T02D2257:216a-0: theg chen rnams kyi gzhi yi @216a * //
T02D2257:216a-3: de thams cad mthun pa'i bdag nyid ston par byed
T02D2257:216a-4: pa ste de yang de dag gis yid kyi rnam
T02D2257:216a-5: par shes pa nam mkha'i mtha' la ston cing /
T02D2257:216a-6: nam mkha' sgom par byed do //
T02D2257:216a-7: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la gnod par byed de
T02D2257:216a-8: bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 'dzin pa'o zhes
T02D2257:216a-9: brjod pas so so'i skye bo blo chung pa rnams
T02D2257:216a-10: lam gyi gzugs su ston pa de la 'jug par
T02D2257:216a-11: 'gyur ro // de dag thams cad kyang bdag nyid
T02D2257:216a-12: grol bar 'dod cing bdag 'ba' zhig gi don du
T02D2257:216a-13: thar pa la mngon par dga' ba'o //
T02D2257:216a-14: de yang gnas kyis bzod par brtul zhugs don med
T02D2257:216a-15: pa rnams dang nam mkha'i yid can la gnas te
T02D2257:216a-16: / theg pa chen po pa rnams kyi gzhi ste dpyad pas sa kho nar zad do //
T02D2257:216a-17: nga ni wa khyi'i brtul zhugs kyis mi grol bar ston te //
T02D2257:216a-18: gcer bu nyid kyis gnas byed cing //
T02D2257:216a-19: wa khyi'i brtul zhugs kyis grol na//
T02D2257:216a-20: dur khrod kyi dang wa nyid kyang //
T02D2257:216a-21: khyod kyi mthun phyir grol bar rigs //
T02D2257:216a-23: phyi rol pa dag dus rtag tu gcer bu nyid kyis gnas par byed cing //
T02D2257:216a-24: rkang lag bzhi sa la btsugs nas wa dang khyi'i tshul gyis gnas te /
T02D2257:216a-25: de'i brtul zhugs kyis spyod do //
T02D2257:216a-26: des ni grol bar mi nus te grol lo zhe na /
T02D2257:216a-27: dur khrod kyi wa dang khyis kyang khyod dang mthun pa'i phyir grol bar rigs so //
T02D2257:216a-28: de dag gi 'khrul gzhi ni rnal 'byor pa chen po prin ti ra'i dang /
T02D2257:216a-29: sring gi sna gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
T02D2257:216a-30: gzugs kyi spyan lam du rul pa'i dugs kyis bdugs
T02D2257:216a-31: dang / gtsug lag khang du mchil lham ma bor
T02D2257:216a-32: bar phyin pas dur khrod kyi wa dang khyi rgod
T02D2257:216a-33: dang / du skyes te / de dag skye ba
T02D2257:216a-34: 'phos pa las mkha' 'gro ma sug sme si la
T02D2257:216a-35: dang / du skyes te / ha dang / rnal
T02D2257:216a-36: 'byor pa chen po tog rtse ba chen po gnyis
T02D2257:216a-38: de dag bram ze 'jigs pa med par rgyu ba
T02D2257:216a-39: zhes bya bas mthong nas de'i brtul zhugs gzung ngo
T02D2257:216a-40: // de dang mngon par mtshungs pa ni rjes su 'brang ba dang bcas pa rnams so //
T02D2257:216a-41: da ni gzhon nu ma'i brtul zhugs kyis mi grol bar ston te /
T02D2257:216a-42: rdo leb steng du gnas byed cing //
T02D2257:216a-43: spu 'breg gzhon tshul gyis grol na //
T02D2257:216b-0: @216b bud med lang tsho gzhon nu dag / khyim
T02D2257:216b-1: la 'gro dus rked spu 'breg / mtshan spu 'thogs
T02D2257:216b-4: rdo leb gtsang ma dag gi steng du 'dug ste
T02D2257:216b-5: bag dang ldan pa'i tshul gyis gnas par byed cing
T02D2257:216b-6: rgyal po'i khyim la gnas pa dag gis lus kyi
T02D2257:216b-7: spu bregs te / mgo rgyan dang lus kyi rgyan
T02D2257:216b-8: dang yan lag gi rgyan bgos nas gzhon nu'i tshul
T02D2257:216b-9: gyis kha smra bar byed cing /
T02D2257:216b-10: rnga yab kyi g-yab mos gzhan bsang bar yang byed pa ste /
T02D2257:216b-11: de dag gis grol na rgyal po dang bram ze
T02D2257:216b-12: dang khyim bdag gi bu mo dag lang tsho la
T02D2257:216b-13: bab pa'i dus su gzhon nu yo byad sna tshogs
T02D2257:216b-14: dag gis mdzes par byed cing khyim bdag la sogs
T02D2257:216b-15: pa gzhan gyis rin po che dang rkang 'gros kyi
T02D2257:216b-16: tshogs kyis nyos te khyim so la 'gro ba'i dus
T02D2257:216b-17: su skye gnas bkra shis par bya ba'i phyir rked
T02D2257:216b-19: ci nas bkra shis par bya ba'i phyir mchan khung
T02D2257:216b-20: gi spu 'thog par byed cing bag dang ldan pa'i
T02D2257:216b-21: spyod pas 'gro par byed de de dag kyang grol
T02D2257:216b-23: da ni rma bya'i brtul zhugs kyis mi grol bar ston te /
T02D2257:216b-24: mu stegs pan ti ta pa khyod //
T02D2257:216b-25: mjug ma btags nas mdzes tshul ston //
T02D2257:216b-27: de ni shin tu mi rigs te //
T02D2257:216b-28: rma bya g-yag sogs grol bar 'gyur //
T02D2257:216b-29: zhes bya ba'i don ni bu ra ka na ti
T02D2257:216b-30: ste de dag gi don ni phyin ci log la
T02D2257:216b-31: mngon du zhen cing gdug pa'i brtul zhugs nye bar
T02D2257:216b-32: bstan pa'i phyir mu stegs so //
T02D2257:216b-33: pan tra ti pa zhes bya ba'i rigs so //
T02D2257:216b-34: khyod ces bya ba ni dgag par bya ba nyid do //
T02D2257:216b-35: de dag gi tshul ni nya kri ta ma ra'i
T02D2257:216b-36: shing la ldong ros kyis ri mo bris te rma
T02D2257:216b-37: bya'i mjug ma'i gzugs byas nas 'og gi sgor btags
T02D2257:216b-38: te shing 'jam po dag gi steng du 'dug nas
T02D2257:216b-39: rma bya'i rnam pa mdzes pa'i tshul du gzhan la
T02D2257:216b-41: nyi ma la 'grems shing rgyab kye phyogs su bltas
T02D2257:216b-42: pas grol par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba de ni
T02D2257:216b-43: shin tu yang mi rigs te /
T02D2257:216b-44: rma bya dang g-yag la sogs pa yang khyod dang mthun pa'i phyir grol bar rigs so //
T02D2257:216b-45: de dag gi 'khrul gzhi yang shar phyogs be ta
T02D2257:216b-46: la zhes bya ba'i yul du khyim bdag phyug po'i
T02D2257:217a-1: khyim bdag mo 'od zer sbyin ma bya ba cig yod de /
T02D2257:217a-2: de la bu gnyis dus gcig la btsas par gyur to //
T02D2257:217a-3: de nas bram ze mtshan mkhan la mtshan bstan pa dang bram zes smras pa /
T02D2257:217a-4: 'di gnyis btsas pa'i dus su ltas ce byung zhes dris pa dang smras pa /
T02D2257:217a-5: 'di dag dang dus mtshungs par 'bras mu ru te
T02D2257:217a-6: snod gsum khengs pa dang zla ba gnyis shar bar
T02D2257:217a-8: de na bram zes smras pa /
T02D2257:217a-9: phu bo la s'a au tri pa zhes bya bar
T02D2257:217a-10: btags te 'di dag ni dur khrod du rnal 'byor
T02D2257:217a-11: pa la thong cig / nu bo la tsandra dzny'a
T02D2257:217a-12: na zhes bya bar btags te 'di dag ni slob
T02D2257:217a-13: pa po'i phyogs su gtang bar bya'o zhes so //
T02D2257:217a-14: de nas de bzhin du btang pa dang rnal 'byor
T02D2257:217a-15: pas bud med kyi cha byad du gnas nas lha
T02D2257:217a-16: mo bdag med ma'i nga rgyal du de bzhin bsgoms
T02D2257:217a-17: so // mkhas pa chen por gyur nas rgyud dag
T02D2257:217a-18: nas byung ba'i dug gi bdud rtsi 'byung bar bya
T02D2257:217a-19: so // ba'i phyir / rma bya'i cha byad du
T02D2257:217a-20: gnas pa la grong khyer gyi mi rnams kyis blta
T02D2257:217a-21: bar rigs so zhes nas phyin pa dang rnal 'byor
T02D2257:217a-22: bas lus bud med kyi cha byad kyis chos ston
T02D2257:217a-23: so // ba'i phyir / nus pa dang / mkhas
T02D2257:217a-24: pas dug gi bdud rtsi byugs pas nang ma lus
T02D2257:217a-25: ba zhi bar nus pa byung ngo //
T02D2257:217a-26: de la thams cad ngo mtshar bar gyur te /
T02D2257:217a-27: bram ze gang+ga ta ra zhes bya ba'i bu glang
T02D2257:217a-28: po dang glang po'i stobs zhes bya ba gnyis kyis
T02D2257:217a-29: gsol ba btab pa las gnang bar ma gyur to
T02D2257:217a-30: // de nas de gnyis kyis rang bzo zhugs pa
T02D2257:217a-31: las phyi rol gyi gzhon nu ma'i brtul zhugs dang
T02D2257:217a-32: rma bya'i brtul zhugs gnyis su zhugs so //
T02D2257:217a-33: de dang nye bar mtshungs pa ni de'i rjes su 'brang ba dang bcas pa rnams so //
T02D2257:217a-34: da ni 'greng ba'i brtul zhugs kyis mi grol bar ston te /
T02D2257:217a-35: nags tshal gseb tu legs gnas te /
T02D2257:217a-36: langs te za bas grol 'gyur na //
T02D2257:217a-37: rta dang glang po grol bar thal //
T02D2257:217a-38: zhes bya ba'i don mu stegs mtshams na gnas pa
T02D2257:217a-39: rnams kyis nags shin tu 'thug po tsher ma rags
T02D2257:217a-40: pa dag gi gseb tu song ste /
T02D2257:217a-41: bdag gis dngos grub ma thob bar du 'di las
T02D2257:217a-42: ldog par ma gyur cig ces smras nas nges pa'i
T02D2257:217a-43: shes pa gnas nas bza' ba dang btung ba thams
T02D2257:217b-0: cad kyang @217b langs te za bas gzhan dag gis
T02D2257:217b-1: skyes bu legs par zhugs shig / bdag gis zas
T02D2257:217b-2: sbyin par byed do zhes brjod kyang bdag bza' ba
T02D2257:217b-3: dang ldan nas bde ba las langs te sdug bsngal
T02D2257:217b-4: bas shi ba rung ngo zhes zer bas grol bar
T02D2257:217b-5: 'gyur na / rta dang glang po dang ba men
T02D2257:217b-6: dang ma he dag kyang langs nas za bas phyir
T02D2257:217b-8: de dag gi 'khrul gzhi ni rnal 'byor pa dom
T02D2257:217b-9: bi he ru ka chen pos 'od ma'i tshal du
T02D2257:217b-10: langs pa'i brtul zhugs lo gsum mdzad de /
T02D2257:217b-11: dus gcig la sprul pa brgya tham pa spros nas
T02D2257:217b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas kyi
T02D2257:217b-13: rten la mchod pa byed pa'i dus su snang bas
T02D2257:217b-15: lho phyogs gyad kyi yul na gnas pa'i khyim bdag
T02D2257:217b-16: ma h'a ba la zhes bya bas brtul zhugs kyi
T02D2257:217b-17: tshul de la zhugs pa dang /
T02D2257:217b-18: de dang nye par mtshungs pa ni de'i rjes su 'brang pa dang bcas pa rnams so //
T02D2257:217b-19: de dag gi lta ba ni /
T02D2257:217b-20: spyod pa de mtshungs 'dod pa ni //
T02D2257:217b-21: nam mkha' dag la rtog pa'i yid //
T02D2257:217b-22: dbu ma'i don mchog rtogs zer ba //
T02D2257:217b-23: mda' dpung mtshon cha rnon re //
T02D2257:217b-24: thar pa mi thob mngon par smras //
T02D2257:217b-25: zhes bya ba'i don ni spyod pa gong du smos pa de dag gi 'dod pa ni /
T02D2257:217b-26: nam mkha' dag la rtog par byed pa'i yid de gong du smos pa lta bu'o //
T02D2257:217b-27: de dag ni dbu ma'i don mchog tu gyur pa
T02D2257:217b-28: de ni bdag cag gis rtogs so zhes zer ba
T02D2257:217b-29: la aa ai zhes pa ste dam pa dang ma
T02D2257:217b-31: de dag ni mda' dpung ste rang bzhin gyi mtshon
T02D2257:217b-32: cha rnon po thogs pa na re chos kyi sku
T02D2257:217b-33: dang de las gzhan pa'i thar pa dag kyang mi
T02D2257:217b-34: thob bo zhes mngon par smras so //
T02D2257:217b-35: de bas na de'i don 'di la gdams par bya ba nyid du zad do //
T02D2257:217b-36: de ltar phyi rol gyi brtul zhugs de dag gis
T02D2257:217b-37: mi grol ba'i log par rtogs pa de dag shugs
T02D2257:217b-38: kyis bsal nas / da ni bde ba dang bral
T02D2257:217b-39: ba'i pha rol tu phyin pas thar pa mi thob
T02D2257:217b-41: log pa'i dka' thub lus mi bde //
T02D2257:217b-42: yid log pas ni de nyid min //
T02D2257:217b-44: bde ba chen po gnyug ma'i ngo bo nyid 'di
T02D2257:217b-45: dag dang mi ldan pa thams cad log pa'i dka'
T02D2257:217b-47: de dag ni ka kal pa sta ha dza na zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2257:218a-1: ni rtog pa dang bcas pa'i 'ching pas bde pa chen po thob par mi 'gyur ba'i don to //
T02D2257:218a-3: 'bras bu thams cad kyi mchog chos kyi sku bde
T02D2257:218a-4: pa chen po'i rang bzhin du ngang gis gnas pa
T02D2257:218a-5: ste sdug bsngal gyi mtha' skad cig kyang mi gnas
T02D2257:218a-6: te / de ni sems nyid la bya'o //
T02D2257:218a-7: dka' thub 'di dag gis ni lus gdung bar byed de /
T02D2257:218a-8: de'i phyir sems lus la brten pas sems bde ba mi 'byung ba'o //
T02D2257:218a-9: de ni chos sku gdungs pa ste 'bras bu zad par byas pa'i phyir log pa'i dka' thub po //
T02D2257:218a-10: yid ni rig pa'i shes pa nyid kyis dgag bya rnam par bcad cing sgrub par byed pa ste /
T02D2257:218a-11: de ni rtog pa dang bcas pa'i shes pa ste /
T02D2257:218a-14: 'khor ba na sdug bsngal zhing bde ba dang mi
T02D2257:218a-15: ldan pa dag ni rtog pa las byung ba'i phyir
T02D2257:218a-16: ro // de dag ni dgag sgrub dang bcas pa ste yid log pa'o //
T02D2257:218a-17: de dag kyang ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2257:218a-18: gnyug ma'i de kho na nyid ma rtogs pa ste /
T02D2257:218a-19: de ni spros pa thams cad rang zhi ba ste /
T02D2257:218a-20: de nyid kyi tha snyad kyang shugs kyis gcod pa'o //
T02D2257:218a-21: de ni spyi'i don du bshad pa ste /
T02D2257:218a-22: da ni bye brag gi tshul du bshad par bya
T02D2257:218a-23: ba ni blo chung pa'i nyan thos kyi theg pa
T02D2257:218a-24: de dag smyung bar gnas pa la sogs pa dka'
T02D2257:218a-25: thub kyis lus mi bde zhing /
T02D2257:218a-26: gang zag gis stong yang chos kyi bdag 'dzin nges
T02D2257:218a-27: par bsam pa'i gzung ba rang bzhin med par shes
T02D2257:218a-28: kyang 'dzin pa rang bzhin med par ma shes pa'i
T02D2257:218a-29: shes pa rtag pa rdzas su 'dod pa ste /
T02D2257:218a-30: de dag gi yid log pas ni de bzhin nyid min te /
T02D2257:218a-32: de yang rab tu mi gnas pa'i rgyud las //
T02D2257:218a-33: dka' thub log pas lus nyid 'ching //
T02D2257:218a-34: bcing pa'i sems nyid rnam par gdung //
T02D2257:218a-35: des ni chos sku zad pa ste //
T02D2257:218a-36: gnyug ma rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2257:218a-38: rje btsun pa ri bo ba'i zhal snga nas /
T02D2257:218a-39: brtags pa'i rtog pas yang dag 'grol mi srid //
T02D2257:218a-40: rtog med tha mal gnas na bde ba che //
T02D2257:218a-41: skyes bu nam mkha'i mtha' la rtog pa bzhin //
T02D2257:218a-42: 'di mtha' nga yis shes pa ma yin no //
T02D2257:218a-44: gong du smos pa de dag gis myong bar bya ba ni dka' ba nyid du zad do //
T02D2257:218a-45: de dag kyang spyod pa'i tshul ji lta bu la gnas zhe na /
T02D2257:218b-0: lus @218b ngag spyod pa gtsor gyur te /
T02D2257:218b-1: dge slong dge tshul dge bsnyen ma rnams dang //
T02D2257:218b-2: gnas brtan las byed mngon par bskos pa'i gzhi //
T02D2257:218b-3: khyim nas khyim spangs rab tu byung pa'i tshul //
T02D2257:218b-4: theg pa chung du mdo las slob byed cing //
T02D2257:218b-5: bden pa bzhi la mngon par rmongs pa'i yid //
T02D2257:218b-6: sde pa bco brgyad mi mthun gzhan du 'dor //
T02D2257:218b-7: gang zag bdag med chos la bdag 'dzin gnas //
T02D2257:218b-8: shes pa dus gsum rdzas su smra byed cing //
T02D2257:218b-9: so sor brtags min 'gog pa mthar thug byed //
T02D2257:218b-10: mdo sde pa ni rang sangs rgyas nyid de //
T02D2257:218b-11: rten 'brel bcu gnyis rgyun dang lugs las bzlog / de bkag pas ni thar pa thob par 'dod //
T02D2257:218b-12: kha cig theg chen de la rgyu byed cing //
T02D2257:218b-13: tshad ma dag gis mngon par brtags pa yis //
T02D2257:218b-14: shes pa phra rab rdul du grub pa la //
T02D2257:218b-15: des kyang dgra bcom de las gzhan ma yin //
T02D2257:218b-17: blo chung pa'i nyan thos kyang bdag nyid mngon par ston te /
T02D2257:218b-18: de dag kyang spong ba bdun 'khor dang bcas pa'i
T02D2257:218b-19: bslab pa la gnas te lus kyi rnam ba gsum
T02D2257:218b-20: dang / ngag gi rnam pa bzhi spyod pa gtso
T02D2257:218b-21: bor gyur te de yang rigs bdun gyi tshul gyis
T02D2257:218b-22: dang / gnas so // gang zhe na /
T02D2257:218b-30: de dag 'dus pa la dge 'dun zhes bos te /
T02D2257:218b-31: kun dga' ra bdag tu sde tshan dang mtshungs par spyod pa'o //
T02D2257:218b-32: de yang mtshungs pa'i gzhi ni /
T02D2257:218b-33: gnas brtan de dag ni ded dpon lta bu'o //
T02D2257:218b-34: las byed pa ni ngag btsun pa dang go rims la mkhas pa dag gis so //
T02D2257:218b-35: dge 'dun 'dus pa dag gis mngon par bskos pa ni nang khrims pa dag ste /
T02D2257:218b-36: rin po che'i phung po nas bshad pa lta bu'i tshul du byed pa'o //
T02D2257:218b-37: gzhi zhes bya ba ni bstan pa dag gi gzhir
T02D2257:218b-38: gyur pa 'am sdom pa rnam pa gsum gyi gzhir
T02D2257:218b-39: gyur pa'o // de yang ji lta zhe na /
T02D2257:218b-40: mdo rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo nas gsungs pa lta bu ste /
T02D2257:218b-41: kye dge slong dag khyim na gnas pa ni sdug bsngal gyi rgyu las nye bar spyod pa'o //
T02D2257:218b-42: kye dge slong dag shes pa ni 'grib srog ni
T02D2257:218b-43: 'chad tshe'i 'du byed kyang nges par 'joms par 'gyur
T02D2257:219a-0: na / ci'i phyir brtson 'grus dang dad @219a * //
T02D2257:219a-1: pa brtan pos grub par mi byed /
T02D2257:219a-2: mi'i lus thob pa ni shin tu yang rnyed par
T02D2257:219a-3: dka' na de rnyed nas rgyal pa'i bstan pa la
T02D2257:219a-4: rab tu byung ba yang rnyed par dka' na /
T02D2257:219a-5: thar pa'i don dang mi mthun pa dag gis bslus te /
T02D2257:219a-7: srog dang bral te 'chi ba ni sla'o ;
T02D2257:219a-8: / tshul khrims nyams shing zhig pa ni de lta ma yin no //
T02D2257:219a-10: srog dang bral ba ni skye ba 'di nyid zad
T02D2257:219a-11: par 'gyur gyis tshul khrims nyams shing zhig pa ni
T02D2257:219a-12: skye ba 'bum phrag brgya'i bar du rigs dang bral
T02D2257:219a-14: rnam par smin pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2257:219a-15: de bas na dge slong dag khyim du gnas par mi bya'o //
T02D2257:219a-16: khyim ni nyon mongs pa'i gnas so //
T02D2257:219a-19: sdug bsngal mi zad pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas so //
T02D2257:219a-20: dge slong dag khyim na gnas pa ni blo chung ba nyid do //
T02D2257:219a-21: rtag tu 'khor ba'i btson ra las mi thar pa nyid do //
T02D2257:219a-22: dge slong dag khyim du gnas pa dag ni dge ba'i sa bon sreg par byed pa'o //
T02D2257:219a-26: pha rol gyi mtshon cha lta bu'o //
T02D2257:219a-27: glang po che smyon pa la zhon pa lta bu'o //
T02D2257:219a-28: me'i khang pa na gnas pa lta bu'o //
T02D2257:219a-29: shing rta rkang pa dang bral pa lta bu'o //
T02D2257:219a-30: me tog si ka ti lta bu'o //
T02D2257:219a-31: khri mon na gnas pa lta bu'o //
T02D2257:219a-32: shing ta la mgo bcas pa lta bu'o //
T02D2257:219a-33: yan lag dang bral pa'i stobs po che lta bu'o //
T02D2257:219a-34: nyi mas gdungs pas sdo'i myu gu lta bu ste //
T02D2257:219a-35: skyon dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir khyim nas khyim spangs la 'gro bar bya'o //
T02D2257:219a-36: dge slong dag nga ni rkang gnyis thams cad kyi rab tu gyur pa ste /
T02D2257:219a-37: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis
T02D2257:219a-38: rtag tu rab tu 'byung pa'i tshul khrims las mi
T02D2257:219a-40: de bas na nga ni bya ba byas pa'o //
T02D2257:219a-44: srid pa'i dgon pa las 'das pa'o //
T02D2257:219a-45: bdag gi don rjes su dran pa'o zhes 'byung pa lta bu ste /
T02D2257:219a-46: de dag gi rjes su slob par byed pa ni 'phags pa koo di nya dang /
T02D2257:219b-0: de @219b dag thams cad kyang sprul pa'i nyan thos su rig par bya'o //
T02D2257:219b-1: de dag ges bdag nyid nye bar spyod pa rnams
T02D2257:219b-2: ni slob pa po rgyun la zhugs pa rnams te
T02D2257:219b-3: / theg pa chung dun gyi rgyas par 'od kyi
T02D2257:219b-4: mdo dang 'phags pa las brgya ba'i mdo dang ston
T02D2257:219b-5: pa koo sha ni'i mdo la sogs pa la slob
T02D2257:219b-6: / par byed cing / sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung
T02D2257:219b-7: dang 'gog pa dang lam gyi bden pa bzhi la
T02D2257:219b-8: rtag pa nyid kyi 'khrul pa ste /
T02D2257:219b-9: mngon sum du rmongs pa kho nar zad do //
T02D2257:219b-10: de dag ni rtog bcas 'ba' zhig la spyod pa kho na yin no //
T02D2257:219b-11: sde pa zhes bya ba ni dge slong dang /
T02D2257:219b-12: dge tshul gyi bdag nyid 'dzin bzhin tshogs pa dang de las lhag pa'o //
T02D2257:219b-13: de yang bye brag tu phye nas bstan pa ni /
T02D2257:219b-14: bco brgyad de de yang rtsa ba'i sde bzhi ni dang po dge 'dun phal chen sde dang /
T02D2257:219b-15: thams cad yod par smra ba'i sde dang /
T02D2257:219b-18: dang po la yang shar gyi ri bo pa'i sde dang /
T02D2257:219b-19: nub kyi ri bo pa'i sde dang /
T02D2257:219b-21: 'jig rten las 'das par smra pa'i sde dang /
T02D2257:219b-22: rtag par smra pa'i sde rnams su gyes so //
T02D2257:219b-23: gnyis pa la yang gzhi thams cad yod par smra pa'i sde dang /
T02D2257:219b-27: mang du thos pa'i sde dang /
T02D2257:219b-29: rnam par phye ste smra pa'i sde rnams su gyes so //
T02D2257:219b-30: gsum pa yang rgyal byed tshal gnas sde dang /
T02D2257:219b-32: gtsug lag khang chen po sde rnams su gyes so //
T02D2257:219b-33: bzhi pa la yangs sgrogs rigs pa'i sde dang /
T02D2257:219b-35: gnas ma bu'i sde rnams su gyes so //
T02D2257:219b-36: de thams cad kyang spyod pa'i sgo mi mthun te sun 'byin cing gzhan du bor par byed do //
T02D2257:219b-37: lta ba ni nyan thos bye brag tu smra pa dang /
T02D2257:219b-38: mdo sde pa gnyis su gzhi mthun no //
T02D2257:219b-39: de yang gzung ba rang bzhin med par shes pas gang zag la bdag med par rtogs la /
T02D2257:219b-40: 'dzin pa rang bzhin du gnas pas chos la bdag
T02D2257:219b-41: tu 'dzin par gnas so zhes pa yang 'das pa
T02D2257:219b-42: dang ma 'ongs pa dang ltar gyi dus gsum du
T02D2257:219b-43: bsags pa'i rdzas rdul phri rab tu grub par 'dod
T02D2257:220a-0: de / de yang le'u gsing dang g-yag rda'i tshul du sil bu phrag can @220a * //
T02D2257:220a-1: sdud byed kyi rlung gis bsdus pa go 'gegs pa'i ngo bor 'dug pa'am /
T02D2257:220a-2: gong bu bar mtshams med cing ma 'byar bar smra
T02D2257:220a-3: par byed cing yang snang ba gzugs kyi gzhi dang
T02D2257:220a-4: / gtso bo sems kyi gzhi dang /
T02D2257:220a-5: 'khor sems las byung ba'i gzhi ni kun rdzob kyi bden bar smra la /
T02D2257:220a-6: gnas skabs dang mi ldan pa'i gzhi dang /
T02D2257:220a-7: chos nyid 'dus ma byas kyi gzhi ni so sor brtags min gyi 'gog par smra ste /
T02D2257:220a-8: de bzhin nyid dang nam mkha' zhes mthar thug byed do //
T02D2257:220a-9: de la nyan thos mdo sde pa blo rab tu gyur pa ni rang sangs rgyas nyid yin te /
T02D2257:220a-10: de yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bcu gnyis kyi rgyu las 'khor pa 'byung pa dang /
T02D2257:220a-11: lus de dag la bkag cing bzlog pas de bkag
T02D2257:220a-12: pas ni thar pa'i 'bras bu thun mong ma yin
T02D2257:220a-14: kha cig ni dbu ma pa bye brag tu smra
T02D2257:220a-15: pa dag gi theg pa chen po la rgyu byas
T02D2257:220a-16: pas 'bras bu bdag nyid 'di lta bu dag 'thob
T02D2257:220a-17: par 'gyur ro // smra bar byed cing /
T02D2257:220a-18: gzhi dang gzhi yongs su grub par byed pa dang /
T02D2257:220a-19: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dang tshig gi mtshon cha dang smra pa'i mtshon cha dang /
T02D2257:220a-20: dbang por byung ba'i tshad ma dang /
T02D2257:220a-21: tshad ma phan pas grub cing rjes su phan pa'i sgras khas len par 'dod pa ste /
T02D2257:220a-22: de dag gis mngon par brtags pa'i shes pa phra
T02D2257:220a-23: rab kyi rdul du rang nyid kyi 'dod pa'i blos
T02D2257:220a-24: grub pa la nges shing 'bad kyang dgra bcom pa'i
T02D2257:220a-25: 'bras bu rdo la brkos pa'i ri mo lta bu
T02D2257:220a-26: ma yin te chu la bris pa bzhin no //
T02D2257:220a-27: de las gzhan ma yin no //
T02D2257:220a-29: bde ba chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2257:220a-30: da ni sngags kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis thar pa mi thob pa bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:220a-31: rtog ge blo chung gang zag dag / brtags nas lha yi dkyil 'khor bsgom //
T02D2257:220a-32: mu stegs bdag bzhin bsgrub par rtog / bum gsang shes rab ye shes dang //
T02D2257:220a-33: mthar thug man ngag tshig tu 'don //
T02D2257:220a-34: don gyi rnam pa de dang bral //
T02D2257:220a-36: stong pa mkha' bzhin gzhan du rtog / ces bya ba'i don ni /
T02D2257:220b-0: kun du brtags pa 'ba' zhig la @220b zhen pa'i
T02D2257:220b-1: shes pa rnams mtshan ma'i rtog ges yid drug pa'i
T02D2257:220b-3: de dag shin tu grub par byed pa'i gang zag
T02D2257:220b-4: dag ni bdag nyid rten dang brten pa'i ngo bor
T02D2257:220b-5: brtags nas lha'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa dang /
T02D2257:220b-6: de yang rgyal ngang ldan pas grub par smra ste /
T02D2257:220b-7: 'di dag ni mu stegs kyi bdag dang khyad med pa lta bu ste /
T02D2257:220b-8: de bzhin du grub par rtog pa'o //
T02D2257:220b-9: de yang dbang gi rang bzhin ji lta bar ma shes pa las byung ste /
T02D2257:220b-10: de yang bum pa'i dbang ni ma rig pa nyon mongs pa lnga las log nas /
T02D2257:220b-11: rig pa ye shes lnga skyed par byed pa ste chos kyi dbyings so //
T02D2257:220b-12: de nyid las spros pa'i rnam par rtog par 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2257:220b-13: gsang ba'i dbang ni zag pa med pa'i ye shes
T02D2257:220b-14: skyed par byed pa ste byang chub kyi sems so
T02D2257:220b-15: // de la 'jug pa'i rnam par rtog par 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2257:220b-16: shes rab ye shes dang zhes bya ba ni shes
T02D2257:220b-17: rab las kyi phyag rgyal brten nas lhan cig skyes
T02D2257:220b-18: pa'i ye shes nyams su myong bar byed pa ste
T02D2257:220b-19: chos kyi sku'o // de dag la 'dod pa'i zhen par rtog pa'o //
T02D2257:220b-20: mthar thug pa'i don ni pradzny'a aa mu sna'o //
T02D2257:220b-21: de dag gi don ni shes rab chen po ste
T02D2257:220b-22: gsal ba dang mi rtog pa dang bde ba'i rang
T02D2257:220b-23: bzhin dang ldan pa ste gnyug ma'i de kho na
T02D2257:220b-24: nyid do ; / de dag ni man ngag ste tshig tsam du 'dod par byed do //
T02D2257:220b-25: de bas na sems gnyug ma'i rang bzhin dang de
T02D2257:220b-26: bsnyams su myong par byed pa'i tshul gyi rnam pa
T02D2257:220b-28: tshogs ma bsags shing dam pa dang nye par mi
T02D2257:220b-29: ldan pa dag gis bcad cing rtul phod la gnas
T02D2257:220b-30: kyang tha dad kyi rtog pa dang ma bral pa'i
T02D2257:220b-31: phyir 'khor ba na 'khor zhing rnam par zhen pa'o
T02D2257:220b-32: // de dag gi stong nyid ni 'dzin rten pa dag gi bltas pa lta bu ste /
T02D2257:220b-33: nam mkha' bzhin gzhan du rtogs par byed de /
T02D2257:220b-34: de yang ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2257:220b-35: rnal ma la bde pa chen po'i rol tshim par ma byas pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2257:220b-36: da ni dbu ma bas thar pa mi 'thob par bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:220b-37: kha cig stong pa nyid la lta ba 'ching //
T02D2257:220b-38: zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid mi rtog pa'i
T02D2257:220b-39: cha la gnas pa dag la mngon par zhen pa
T02D2257:220b-40: ste / de dag la zhen pa nyid du lta bas 'ching ba nyid du zad do //
T02D2257:221a-3: lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo ni /
T02D2257:221a-4: rtogs pas mngon par grub pa ste /
T02D2257:221a-7: de dag gi don ni ma ha ra na ka ste sems so //
T02D2257:221a-8: de ni lhan skyes kyi rnam pa'o //
T02D2257:221a-9: pa na sa ka ri ste gcig go //
T02D2257:221a-10: de ni sems kyi rnam pa'o //
T02D2257:221a-11: aa na aa sa pu ta ste bla ma'i gdams
T02D2257:221a-12: ngag las skyes pa de de ni thog ma nyid
T02D2257:221a-13: nas sangs rgyas pa'i ngo bo'o //
T02D2257:221a-14: ae ai thar te rtog pa'o //
T02D2257:221a-15: da ni tha mal gyi shes pa nyid do //
T02D2257:221a-17: de ni nyams su myong bas mngon pa grub pa ste /
T02D2257:221a-18: de thog ma nyid nas sangs rgyas pa'i ngo bo'o //
T02D2257:221a-19: ae ai aa ta ma ki ti ste rang nyid la mngon par 'grub pa'o //
T02D2257:221a-20: de ni kun du bzang po nyid do //
T02D2257:221a-21: de bas na don khyad par du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2257:221a-22: gzhan dag ni 'di dang mi ldan pa dag yin te /
T02D2257:221a-25: rgyu la 'bad pa legs byas pas //
T02D2257:221a-26: mya ngan 'das pa thob gyur smra //
T02D2257:221a-27: zhes bya ba'i don ni 'bras bu gzhan du rtog cing lta ba la re ba'i phyir rtog pa'o //
T02D2257:221a-28: rtog pa de yang rtogs pas grub par 'dod de
T02D2257:221a-29: rgyu bsod nams kyi tshogs la 'bad pa legs par
T02D2257:221a-30: byas pas rnam par rtog pa zad nas mya ngan
T02D2257:221a-31: las 'das pa'i don 'thob par 'gyur bar smra ste
T02D2257:221a-32: rtog pa'o // rtog pas rtog pa nyid slu ba kho nar byed de 'khor ba'o //
T02D2257:221a-33: 'khor ba nyid kyis rtog pa mi slu bar byed de sdug bsngal lo //
T02D2257:221a-34: de yang ci las byung bar brtag par bya zhe na /
T02D2257:221a-35: tshig dang lus kyi rnam pa la //
T02D2257:221a-36: shin tu mkhas pa ltar snang yang //
T02D2257:221a-37: cig shos de la rnam med phyir //
T02D2257:221a-38: nus par gyur pa ma yin no //
T02D2257:221a-39: zhes bya ba ni tshig gi tha snyad kyi rnam par rtog pa bslangs te //
T02D2257:221a-40: de nyid mtha' med pa la rtog go //
T02D2257:221a-41: snang ba dang grags pa'i yul gyi rnam pa gtan la phab nas don med pa la rtog go //
T02D2257:221a-42: de dag cha shas kyi rnam pa la bdag ni
T02D2257:221a-43: shin tu mkhas pa yin no zhes nga rgyal bar
T02D2257:221a-46: mkhas pa ltar snang yang mkhas pa ni ma yin te /
T02D2257:221a-47: rgyal po'i bang mdzod dang 'dra bas rang bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'o //
T02D2257:221b-0: @221b cig shos de la med cing de'i rnam pa
T02D2257:221b-1: yang med pa'i phyir ka ka ra ste nub par
T02D2257:221b-3: de dag ni 'khrul bar brtag pa'i phyir de kho na nyid ma yin no //
T02D2257:221b-5: gdams ngag gzhi ru grub pa'i phyir //
T02D2257:221b-6: gong mas smra tshul mi rigs min //
T02D2257:221b-7: zhes bya ba'i don au pa ha ra ste de
T02D2257:221b-8: ni myong bas don skye bar byed pa'i don te
T02D2257:221b-9: / de yang gu ru au pa ri ste gdams ngag go //
T02D2257:221b-10: de ni bla ma dam pa'i gdams ngag bzhin nyams su myong bas chos kyi sku'o //
T02D2257:221b-11: de dag kyang cis she na /
T02D2257:221b-12: rgyu med pa dang ma ning gi spyod yul du rung ba dang /
T02D2257:221b-13: so sor rtog pa'i shes rab yod pa dang //
T02D2257:221b-14: rgyu 'bras dus mtshungs shing chu bo ltar gnas pa ste /
T02D2257:221b-15: de yang thog ma nyid nas sangs rgyas pa yin pa dang /
T02D2257:221b-16: thams cad la chos kyi sku gnyug ma'i rang bzhin gnas pa dang /
T02D2257:221b-17: thams cad bde ba chen po'i phyag rgyar ro gcig pa dang /
T02D2257:221b-18: rgyu 'bras dus mtshungs shing dus thams cad bzhi ru grub pa'i phyir /
T02D2257:221b-19: ais aa ra ste gong ma ste nga yis so //
T02D2257:221b-20: 'og ma rnams la thar pa mi thob pa smra
T02D2257:221b-21: ba'i tshul mi rigs pa ma yin te rig pa'o
T02D2257:221b-22: // de bas na thams cad thabs dang yang bral shes rab dang yang bral ba ste /
T02D2257:221b-23: tha mal gyi shes pa dang /
T02D2257:221b-24: de'i rang bzhin med pa'i phyir thar pa mi thob pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D2257:221b-25: gang zhig don la mos 'gyur na //
T02D2257:221b-27: ces bya ba'i don ni rigs pa gang zhig go //
T02D2257:221b-28: don dam pa'i lta ba zhes de la mos shing
T02D2257:221b-29: gzhol bar 'gyur te zhen na de 'grub par byed
T02D2257:221b-30: pa yang tshangs pa'i spyod pa la spyad pas 'bras
T02D2257:221b-31: bu dam pa thob par 'dod pa'i phyir /
T02D2257:221b-32: dgag sgrub dang bcas pa nyid du zad de de nyid ma yin no //
T02D2257:221b-33: gang zhig gnyis med myong bral na //
T02D2257:221b-34: bka' dang dman pa'i bsam gtan ni //
T02D2257:221b-35: dgos pa med phyir phyir bsal te //
T02D2257:221b-36: snying po'i don mchog rtogs pa na //
T02D2257:221b-37: mar ma lha bshos de ci dgos //
T02D2257:221b-38: gnyis med ldang dang 'jug med na //
T02D2257:221b-39: spyod pa ci byed sngags mi smra //
T02D2257:221b-40: las dang bya ba gtsor gyur pa'i //
T02D2257:221b-41: 'bab stegs chu la khrus byed cing //
T02D2257:221b-42: gnyug ma'i dka' thub ci dgos te //
T02D2257:221b-43: de nyid don dang ma 'brel na//
T02D2257:222a-0: @222a * // khrus la sogs pas grol mi 'gyur //
T02D2257:222a-1: zhes bya ba'i don ni snying po'i don rtogs pa'i
T02D2257:222a-2: gnyis med la gnas shing ldang 'jug med pa na
T02D2257:222a-3: spyod pa 'di dag shugs kyis dgag cing rtog pas
T02D2257:222a-4: 'ching ba'i phyir mi dgos pa ston pa dang spyod
T02D2257:222a-5: na yang de nyid dang bral bar shugs kyis ston
T02D2257:222a-6: pa ste / de yang gang zhig ces bya ba
T02D2257:222a-7: ni rten gyi gang zag khyad par du gyur pa
T02D2257:222a-8: pa ste / rnams so // gnyis med ces bya ba ni tha mal gyi shes pa nyid do //
T02D2257:222a-9: myong zhes bya ba ni gsal ba dang mi rtog pa dang bde ba dang /
T02D2257:222a-10: bral zhes bya ba ni myong du med pa'i myong ba ste ci yang ma yin pa nyid do //
T02D2257:222a-11: de nyid kyi bdag nyid can de dag la dka' ba'i mu stegs kyi brtul zhugs dang /
T02D2257:222a-12: dman pa nyan thos kyi spyod pa dang ldan pa lta ba dang sgom pa dang /
T02D2257:222a-13: rnam par rig pa dang dbu ma'i dgag sgrub dang
T02D2257:222a-14: bcas pa'i bsam gtan ni dgos pa med pa'i phyir
T02D2257:222a-15: bsal ba ste snying po'i don mchog tu gyur pa
T02D2257:222a-16: 'di rtog pa ni log nas sangs rgyas grub pa
T02D2257:222a-17: med pa'i phyir / mar me dang me tog dang
T02D2257:222a-18: bdug pa dang dri dang lha bshos la sogs pa
T02D2257:222a-19: de ci dgos bsgrub tu med pa'i phyir /
T02D2257:222a-20: gnyis su med pa'i dang de las mi g-yo zhing
T02D2257:222a-21: ldang ba dang 'jug pa la khyad par med na
T02D2257:222a-22: / sbyin pa btang ba la sogs pa'i spyod pas ci byed de don med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2257:222a-23: sngags kyang mi smra ste 'bras bu grub tu med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2257:222a-24: bla ma mnyes par bya ba la sogs pa'i las dang /
T02D2257:222a-25: tshogs sogs pa'i bya ba gtsor gyur pa ni chu 'bab pa'i stegs su 'dug ste /
T02D2257:222a-26: chu la khrus byed cing gtsang bar spyod pa dang /
T02D2257:222a-27: smyung ba'i dka' thub dang dka' spyad rnams ci dgos te de dag nyid kyis 'ching ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2257:222a-28: de yang rnam par bcad pa lta bu ni ma
T02D2257:222a-29: yin te shugs kyis 'gags pa yin pa'i phyir ched
T02D2257:222a-30: du grub pa lta bu ni ma yin no //
T02D2257:222a-31: de bas na de kho na nyid kyi don dang /
T02D2257:222a-32: ma 'brel na khrus la sogs pa gong du smos pa'i spyod pas grol bar mi 'gyur te /
T02D2257:222a-33: 'brel na don dang ldan par 'gyur ba ni shugs las shes par bya'o //
T02D2257:222a-34: ma rtog pa dang ldang 'jug yod pa dang don
T02D2257:222b-0: dang mi 'brel ba rnams kyis @222b kyang de ltar
T02D2257:222b-1: bya ba yin nam zhe na /
T02D2257:222b-2: las dang po yi skyes bu yis //
T02D2257:222b-3: de nyid nyams su myong 'gyur te //
T02D2257:222b-4: ma rtog par du de mi gtong //
T02D2257:222b-5: rtogs na gnyug ma'i lam yin no //
T02D2257:222b-6: zhes bya ba'i don ni las dang po pa'i gang
T02D2257:222b-7: zag skal ba rab tu gyur pa de dag la
T02D2257:222b-8: skyes bu dam pa'i gdams ngag gis nye bar gyur
T02D2257:222b-9: te / de kho na nyid nyams su myong ba'i
T02D2257:222b-10: rnam pa de kho na nyid dang mi 'bral yang
T02D2257:222b-11: gnyis su med pa'i klong du ma gyur gyi bar
T02D2257:222b-12: du de bzhin nyid ma yin te ma rtog par
T02D2257:222b-14: rtogs na bsod nams kyi tshogs de dag kyang sems
T02D2257:222b-15: gnyug ma'i ngo bo nyid kyi mnyam pa'i lam chen
T02D2257:222b-16: po yin no // de dag kyang man ngag gis stobs gang las skyes she na /
T02D2257:222b-17: shes rab dang snying rje zung du 'jug pa la skye ste /
T02D2257:222b-18: de dag bye brag tu gnas pa las mi 'grub
T02D2257:222b-19: cing dbyer mi phyed pa'i ngo bo bstan par bya
T02D2257:222b-20: ste / snying rje bral bas stong nyid ni //
T02D2257:222b-21: snying po rtog par mi 'gyur te //
T02D2257:222b-22: lam mchog mngon par bor nas kyang //
T02D2257:222b-23: nyan thos sa la nges par gnas //
T02D2257:222b-24: snying rje 'ba' zhig bsgom na yang //
T02D2257:222b-25: lus dang sems ni gdung 'gyur bas //
T02D2257:222b-26: mu stegs dag dang khyad med de //
T02D2257:222b-27: bdud kyi las su rig par bya //
T02D2257:222b-28: skyes bu mchog ldan gang zhig gis //
T02D2257:222b-29: gang yang gnyis po sbyor nus pas //
T02D2257:222b-31: mi gnas mtha' la mngon par gnas //
T02D2257:222b-33: snying rje dang bral ba'i stong nyid kyang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
T02D2257:222b-34: stong nyid dang bral ba'i snying rje yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
T02D2257:222b-35: gnyis su med pa'i don 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi dgongs par rig par bya'o //
T02D2257:222b-36: de dag gsal bar bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa
T02D2257:222b-37: thams cad kyi las nges par bstan pa'i rgyud las
T02D2257:222b-39: lho phyogs pa'i sha na'i yul grong khyer mchod rten
T02D2257:222b-40: brtsegs pa zhes bya ba na bram ze nor bu
T02D2257:222b-41: bzang po zhes bya ba zhig yod de /
T02D2257:222b-42: des yul gzhan gyi bram ze mo legs sbyin me
T02D2257:222b-43: tog ces bya ba zhig khyim thab tu blang bar
T02D2257:222b-44: gyur to // gzhon nu de yang bzhin mdzes pa
T02D2257:222b-45: blta na sdug pa yid du 'ong ba skye bo
T02D2257:223a-0: thams cad kyi blo mos par @223a * //
T02D2257:223a-2: de yang tshangs par spyod pa'i sdom pa la gnas
T02D2257:223a-3: pa dam pa'i chos dkar po la gzhol ba pha
T02D2257:223a-4: ma la srid zhu che ba /
T02D2257:223a-6: bran dang g-yog rnams la byams pa'i snying rje chen
T02D2257:223a-7: po dge slong bzhin du tshangs par spyod pa zhig
T02D2257:223a-8: ste / de sa zla ba bzang po'i tshes bcu
T02D2257:223a-9: bzhi la gtsug lag khang du mchod pa la phyin
T02D2257:223a-10: ste / te / dag pa'i dge slong dam pa
T02D2257:223a-11: rnams mthong ste shin tu yid dang par gyur te
T02D2257:223a-12: ste / te / / bdag la yang bu dam pa dag btsas par gyur te /
T02D2257:223a-13: de nas rab tu byung ba ste bstan pa'i lam
T02D2257:223a-14: dang mthun par gyur cig ces smon lam btab po
T02D2257:223a-15: // de nas de'i nub mo nyal ba'i rmi lam
T02D2257:223a-16: na ral gri gsum spyi gtsug tu skyes par gyur
T02D2257:223a-17: // te / ral gri gcig ni g-yang sa chen po la ltung bar gyur to //
T02D2257:223a-18: gcig snum du bcos nas ngar shi bar gyur to //
T02D2257:223a-19: gcig las 'od dpag tu med pa byung ste nam
T02D2257:223a-20: mkha'i khams thams cad khyab pas me tog tu gyur
T02D2257:223a-21: nas char gyi rgyun chen po phab pas sems can
