T02D2257:223a-22: thams cad tshim par byas shing 'bras bu gcig tu
T02D2257:223a-24: de nas nang par langs nas khrus byas te bram ze la 'di skad ces smras so ;
T02D2257:223a-25: / kye khyim bdag bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02D2257:223a-26: bdag gis nyal ba'i rmi lam na //
T02D2257:223a-27: spyi gtsug ral gri gsum skyes te //
T02D2257:223a-28: g-yon pa g-yang sa chen por lhung //
T02D2257:223a-29: g-yas pa snum bcos ngar dang bral //
T02D2257:223a-30: dbus ma'i gri las 'od byung ste //
T02D2257:223a-31: nam mkha'i khams kun me tog rgyas /
T02D2257:223a-32: char gyi rgyun babs sems can tshim //
T02D2257:223a-33: 'bras bu gcig tu smin par gyur //
T02D2257:223a-34: 'di dag bzang dang ngan pa'i ltas //
T02D2257:223a-35: gang yin kho mos mi shes te //
T02D2257:223a-36: 'di dag ci rigs smra bar gyis //
T02D2257:223a-38: de nas bram zes btsun mo dam pa de la 'di skad ces smras so //
T02D2257:223a-39: kye kye btsun mo dam pa khyod //
T02D2257:223a-40: rtag tu tshangs par spyod la gnas //
T02D2257:223a-41: rmi lam dam pa 'di dag ni //
T02D2257:223a-42: ngan par mi 'gyur gzhan la dris //
T02D2257:223a-43: zhes nas yul b'a r'a na s'i nas bram ze
T02D2257:223a-44: aa ga sha ta na zhes bya ba'i mtshan mkhan
T02D2257:223b-0: bkug go // bram zes smras @223b pa ;
T02D2257:223b-1: kye gcang ma yab yum bdag la gson cig /
T02D2257:223b-2: ltas de dag ni sras gsum btsas par 'gyur ba
T02D2257:223b-3: lags te / de yang gcig stong pa la mngon
T02D2257:223b-4: par zhen pas chad pa'i g-yang sa la lhung bar
T02D2257:223b-5: lags te / 'gyur ro // gcig snying rje la
T02D2257:223b-6: mngon par zhen bas snying rje'i snum gyis shin tu
T02D2257:223b-8: bdud kyi byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2257:223b-9: gcig shes rab dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i ngang
T02D2257:223b-10: las 'od gsal chen po ngang gis skye bar 'gyur
T02D2257:223b-11: ro // longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i me tog dang /
T02D2257:223b-12: sbrul pa'i sku'i char gyi rgyun bab ste /
T02D2257:223b-13: chos kyi sku 'bras bu gcig tu grub par 'gyur ba'i rtags so //
T02D2257:223b-14: 'di gsum yang mthun par sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzhol te /
T02D2257:223b-15: smon lam dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi stobs kyis de ltar 'gyur te /
T02D2257:223b-16: de dag ni ming yang chen po'i stobs dang /
T02D2257:223b-17: snying rje'i stobs dang bla med stobs zhes bya bar gdags par bya'o zhes so //
T02D2257:223b-18: de nas go rims kyi tshul gyis mtshan dang ldan pa'i bu gsum btsas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2257:223b-19: de nas phu bo 'phags pa ga ya te zhes
T02D2257:223b-20: bya ba la rnal 'byor gyi lam yun ring du
T02D2257:223b-21: brten nas gsol ba btab pa las bdag tu lta
T02D2257:223b-22: ba la mngon par zhen nas stong pa nyid kyi
T02D2257:223b-23: de bzhin nyid bstan pas khyad par du zhen bar
T02D2257:223b-24: gyur te de dag gis 'khor ba'i bde ba ma
T02D2257:223b-25: yin pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba mi
T02D2257:223b-26: thob cing 'thob pa'i rgyur yang mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2257:223b-27: de nas 'od ma'i tshal na gnas pa'i tshe rnal
T02D2257:223b-28: 'byor ba 'dus pa'i dus su mkha' 'gro ma blo
T02D2257:223b-29: gros ma dang legs sbyin ma gnyis kyis tshigs su
T02D2257:223b-31: stong pa nyid la zhen pa ni //
T02D2257:223b-33: gzugs med khams su skyes nas kyang /
T02D2257:223b-36: de nas de dag tshe 'phos nas kyang gzugs med kyi khams su skyes so //
T02D2257:223b-37: nu bo rnal 'byor pa 'dus pa rang na zhes
T02D2257:223b-38: bya ba la lo dpag tu med par bstan cing
T02D2257:223b-39: gsol ba btab pa las zhe sdang che bar mthong
T02D2257:223b-40: nas snying rje bsgom du bcug pa las /
T02D2257:224a-0: snying rje khyad par du gdungs te sems @224a * //
T02D2257:224a-1: can rnams mthong ba'i dus su ngu zhing 'dre log par gyur to //
T02D2257:224a-2: de nas rnal 'byor pa 'dus pa'i dus su mkha'
T02D2257:224a-3: 'gro ma tsan ma dang la ma gnyis kyis nam
T02D2257:224a-4: mkha' la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
T02D2257:224a-5: snying rje che bas yid gdung ste //
T02D2257:224a-6: sems ni ngan song gnas dang bral //
T02D2257:224a-7: bdud kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir //
T02D2257:224a-8: shi 'phos dga' rab dbang phyug go //
T02D2257:224a-10: de nas shi 'phos nas bdud dga' rab dbang phyug dag tu skyes par gyur to //
T02D2257:224a-11: de nas bu sar pa de dag rnal 'byor pa
T02D2257:224a-12: srid pa dang zhes bya ba la lo dpag tu
T02D2257:224a-13: med par bstan zhing gsol ba btab pa las /
T02D2257:224a-14: shes rab snying rje zung du 'jug pa'i ye shes de kho na nyid bstan pas /
T02D2257:224a-15: nyams su myong pa'i zla ba tshes gcig pa dang nya gang ba'i tshul du 'phel bar gyur te /
T02D2257:224a-16: bla ma dam pa de dag gis kyang ci yang ma yin pa'i stong pa nyid dang /
T02D2257:224a-17: gdung ba dang bral bas snying rje'i rnam pa blo
T02D2257:224a-18: la mngon par sbyangs shing nyams su myong bar byas
T02D2257:224a-19: so // de nas rnal 'byor pa 'dus pa'i dus
T02D2257:224a-20: su mkha' 'gro ma san ta hi dang nye ba
T02D2257:224a-21: can gnyis kyis tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
T02D2257:224a-22: shes rab snying rje zung 'jug pas //
T02D2257:224a-23: rtogs pa mya ngan 'das pa ste //
T02D2257:224a-25: mi gnas sa la mngon 'tshang rgya //
T02D2257:224a-26: zhes phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das par gyur to //
T02D2257:224a-27: de bas na rigs kyi bu rnams dge ba'i bshes
T02D2257:224a-28: gnyen dam pa yun ring du bsten cing thabs dang
T02D2257:224a-29: shes rab gnyis su med pa'i don bstan par bya
T02D2257:224a-30: bar rigs so zhes 'byung ba'i phyir bshad par bya'o
T02D2257:224a-31: // snying rje zhes bya ba ni phrag dog med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ste /
T02D2257:224a-32: ngo bo sems can thams cad sdug bsngal dang bral bar 'dod pa'o //
T02D2257:224a-33: de yang rang gi glad nad dang bral bar dga' ba bzhin du ste /
T02D2257:224a-34: bde ba dang bral ba'i stong pa nyid kyis ni
T02D2257:224a-35: theg pa chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa bar yang mi
T02D2257:224a-36: 'gyur la / snying po'i chos kyi sku rtog par yang mi 'gyur te /
T02D2257:224a-37: lam gnyis su med pa'i mchog tu gyur pa mngon
T02D2257:224b-0: par bor nas kyang zhi ba @224b phyogs gcig tu
T02D2257:224b-1: bgrod pa'i nyan thos kyi sa la nges par gnas
T02D2257:224b-2: so // stong pa dang bral ba'i snying rje 'ba'
T02D2257:224b-3: zhig bsgoms na yang skyi bung zhes byed pa dang
T02D2257:224b-4: ba spu ldang ba dang skra rtsa zing zhes byed
T02D2257:224b-5: pa la sogs pas mi bzod pa'i phyir /
T02D2257:224b-7: lus dang sems ni brten pa'i tshul du gnas pas sems gdung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2257:224b-8: de bas na phyi rol gyi mu stegs pa dag dang khyad med de /
T02D2257:224b-9: sems sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
T02D2257:224b-10: skyes bu bsod nams kyi rgyu las grub pa bla
T02D2257:224b-11: ma mchog dam pa dang ldan pa gang zhig gis
T02D2257:224b-12: / gang yang stong pa dang snying rje dbyer mi
T02D2257:224b-13: phyed pa gnyis po yid la mi byed pa'i tshul
T02D2257:224b-14: du sbyor bar byed de 'khor ba la /
T02D2257:224b-15: chags pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa la zhen pa yang spangs te /
T02D2257:224b-16: shes rab kyis 'khor ba la mi gnas shing snying
T02D2257:224b-17: rjes mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa
T02D2257:224b-18: ste / tha mal gyi shes pa'i mtha' sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa la mngon par gnas so //
T02D2257:224b-19: de bas na de lta bu'i don de dag las gdams par bya ste /
T02D2257:224b-20: kye ho bdag tu 'dzin pa dang //
T02D2257:224b-21: log par zhen pa brdzun du smros //
T02D2257:224b-22: brdzun la nges par chags ma byed //
T02D2257:224b-23: zhen pa'i rnam rtog ma byed par //
T02D2257:224b-24: re dog rtsol ba'i sems de thong //
T02D2257:224b-26: kye ho khams gsum thams cad skye bo zhes bos nas yin pa'i don /
T02D2257:224b-27: de la gdams par bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2257:224b-28: de dag kyang ci zhe na /
T02D2257:224b-29: bdag ces bya ba ni tha dad kyi rtog pas brtags pa'i bdag nyid la zhen pa'o //
T02D2257:224b-30: de bdag tu 'dzin pa las 'khor bar snang zhing sdug bsngal du gyur pa'i phyir thong zhes pa'o //
T02D2257:224b-31: de'i mtha' la rtog pa ni log par zhen pa ste /
T02D2257:224b-32: des ni bslu ba dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir yid brtan du mi rung ste /
T02D2257:224b-33: chags pa dang bral ba nyid kyis brdzun du smros zhes bya'o //
T02D2257:224b-34: bdag ni chags pa dang bral ba yin no zhes
T02D2257:224b-35: brdzun pa bzlog pa'i don de nyid la yang nges
T02D2257:224b-36: par chags par ma byed cig ces gdams so //
T02D2257:224b-37: ji ltar gnas par bya zhe na /
T02D2257:225a-0: tha dad du zhen pa'i rnam par rtog par mi byed par @225a * //
T02D2257:225a-1: gnyug ma'i don de kho na nyid la gnas par bya ste /
T02D2257:225a-2: 'bras bu la re ba dang 'khor ba dang mnyam
T02D2257:225a-3: pa'i don la brtson par byas pa'i sems de dag
T02D2257:225a-4: thong la cir yang ma yin pa'i sems rang dga'
T02D2257:225a-6: de ltar gnyis med kyi don bstan nas /
T02D2257:225a-7: de rtogs na thams cad de'i ngo bo yin pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D2257:225a-8: rtogs par gyur nas thams cad de yin te //
T02D2257:225a-9: de las gzhan zhig sus kyang mi shes 'gyur //
T02D2257:225a-10: klog 'dzin bsam dang sgom pa de nyid yin //
T02D2257:225a-11: bstan bcos sems la bshad cing go bar nges //
T02D2257:225a-12: yin min mtshon pa'i lta ba yod min te //
T02D2257:225a-14: gnyug ma'i don rtogs par gyur na snang zhing grags pa thams cad de'i ngo bo nyid yin te /
T02D2257:225a-15: de las gzhan pa'i mtha' bzhi thams cad mkhyen pa
T02D2257:225a-16: dang rje btsun pa la sogs pa sus kyang shes
T02D2257:225a-18: de yang rab tu mi gnas pa'i rgyud las /
T02D2257:225a-19: sems nyid klong du gyur pa kun du bzang //
T02D2257:225a-20: tha mal shes pa de nyid nyams su myong //
T02D2257:225a-21: dam pa dag gis de nyid rtogs pa na //
T02D2257:225a-22: 'di ni he ru ka ste kun gyi ngang //
T02D2257:225a-24: de bas na klog pa dang /
T02D2257:225a-27: sgom pa thams cad kyang de nyid kyi bye brag gis 'dod pa yin te /
T02D2257:225a-28: de'i ngo bo las ma 'das pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2257:225a-29: de yang rgyud de nyid las //
T02D2257:225a-30: nam mkha' ngo bo dag pa'i rang bzhin las //
T02D2257:225a-31: sprin sogs glo bur dri ma byung gyur yang //
T02D2257:225a-32: de nyid yin gyi nam mkha'i nyid kyi ngang //
T02D2257:225a-33: sems nyid gnas pa rdo rje ye shes ni //
T02D2257:225a-34: sna tshogs snang yang gnyug ma'i ngo bo nyid //
T02D2257:225a-35: byed sgo tha dad rnam pa'i tshul snang yang //
T02D2257:225a-36: de nyid don las gzhan pa yod ma yin //
T02D2257:225a-37: 'di ni rang bzhin nyid de bde ba che //
T02D2257:225a-39: thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D2257:225a-40: de bas na brda dang tha snyad kyis 'di dag gzhal bar bstan par mi nus te /
T02D2257:225a-41: bstan pa'i chos dam pa rnams kyi zhal gyi bdud
T02D2257:225a-42: rtsi las byung ba 'di dag sems ci yang min
T02D2257:225a-43: pas sems ci yang ma yin pa la bshad cing
T02D2257:225b-0: de nyid du go bar byas @225b te 'di ni
T02D2257:225b-1: nges pa'o // de'i ngo bo de yang yin pa dang min par mi rtog ste /
T02D2257:225b-2: mtshon par nus pa'i lta ba yang yod pa ma yin no //
T02D2257:225b-3: de bas na 'di dag la gzhal bar bya ba ni ma yin te /
T02D2257:225b-4: rtogs ma rtogs su med pa nyid do //
T02D2257:225b-5: de ltar snying po'i don gyi khyad par bstan nas /
T02D2257:225b-6: de yang bla ma dam pa las rtogs par bya ba ston te /
T02D2257:225b-7: bdag gi de nyid rtogs pa'i man ngag de //
T02D2257:225b-8: nyag gcig bla ma'i zhal las ltos pa yin //
T02D2257:225b-9: bla ma'i smras pa gang zhig snying zhugs pa //
T02D2257:225b-10: lag mthil dag tu skyu ru rlon gzhag dang //
T02D2257:225b-11: nor bu rin chen mi rtog gsal lta 'dra //
T02D2257:225b-12: zhes bya ba'i don ni sems can thams cad kyi
T02D2257:225b-13: bdag tu 'dzin pa'i shes pa de nyid kyang chos
T02D2257:225b-14: kyi sku dag las mi gzhan te /
T02D2257:225b-15: de nyid rtog par bya ba'i man ngag de dag
T02D2257:225b-16: kyang srid ta sna ae ga ri ste bla ma
T02D2257:225b-17: nyag gcig gi zhal la ltos par bya ba yin
T02D2257:225b-18: no // de dag kyang ci zhe na /
T02D2257:225b-19: aa smri rag tra na zhes bya ste /
T02D2257:225b-21: mgon po gang gis lung bstan nus //
T02D2257:225b-22: ring ba'i bla ma nyid yin no //
T02D2257:225b-23: de nyid nyams su myong ba ni //
T02D2257:225b-24: nye ba'i bla ma nyid yin te //
T02D2257:225b-25: dus gsum sangs rgyas skye ba'i phyir //
T02D2257:225b-26: bla na med pa ma yin no //
T02D2257:225b-27: dam pa'i zhal la gus pa dang //
T02D2257:225b-28: sgra la nges par byas pa ste //
T02D2257:225b-29: ltos pa spangs na the tshom med //
T02D2257:225b-30: bsgrub dang de bral de yin no //
T02D2257:225b-31: zhes sgra'i don du nges par 'byung ngo //
T02D2257:225b-32: de bas na bla ma dag gis smras pa'i rnal
T02D2257:225b-33: ma'i shes pa de dag shugs kyis go ba ste
T02D2257:225b-34: de nyid kyi ngo bos bde ba lus la 'gyel
T02D2257:225b-35: ba dang / sems la 'gyel ba dag gi tshul gyis gang bar 'gyur la /
T02D2257:225b-36: de la yang zhen pa med par phyag rgya chen
T02D2257:225b-37: pos bde ba zhig cing snying po gnyug ma'i ngo
T02D2257:225b-38: bo nyid la goms pas mnyam pa nyid kyi don
T02D2257:225b-39: snying la zhugs par gyur te /
T02D2257:225b-40: ji bzhin pa'i don de bzhin par rtogs so //
T02D2257:225b-41: de dag kyang dper na lag pa'i mthil dag tu
T02D2257:225b-42: skyu ru ra dang aa mra la sogs rlon pa
T02D2257:225b-43: gzhag pa na de dag phyi nang med par gsal
T02D2257:225b-44: ba'i ngo bor shes par 'gyur ba bzhin dang /
T02D2257:225b-45: nor bu rin po che aa smri ra me long dang /
T02D2257:225b-46: steng du bzhag ste bltas na 'od mi rtog cing gsal ba'i ngo bor lta ba dang /
T02D2257:226a-1: pa med par 'byung ba dang 'dra bar gnyug ma'i
T02D2257:226a-2: don 'di dag rtogs pa na snang grags kyi chos
T02D2257:226a-3: thams cad sems kyi ngo bo nyid du rtogs shing
T02D2257:226a-4: bde ba chen po'i ros thams cad nga bdag med
T02D2257:226a-5: pa'i mnyam pa'i don la zhugs kyis 'jog / don
T02D2257:226a-6: de nyid kyang brtags par mi nus shing brtag par
T02D2257:226a-7: yang dka' ba gzhan la ltos par bya ba yang
T02D2257:226a-8: ma yin te / mi rtog cing gsal la rang
T02D2257:226a-9: bzhin grub pa med pa ni dpe gong ma lta
T02D2257:226a-11: don de nyid kyang dbu ma la sogs pa gzhan
T02D2257:226a-12: gyis mi rtogs pas de dag la smra bar bya
T02D2257:226a-13: ba ni / gnyug ma'i rang bzhin byis pas ma tshor bas //
T02D2257:226a-14: 'khrul pas byis pa bslus zhes snying pos smras //
T02D2257:226a-16: gnyug ma'i rang bzhin de kho na nyid byis pa
T02D2257:226a-17: lta bu'i rtog pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis ma
T02D2257:226a-18: tshor te / de kho na nyid las log par
T02D2257:226a-19: 'khrul pas byis pa de dag bslus te sdug bsngal
T02D2257:226a-20: bar gyur to zhes snying pos smras so //
T02D2257:226a-21: de nyid tshul ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D2257:226a-22: bsam gtan med cing rab tu byung ba med /
T02D2257:226a-24: de dag gi ni bsgom bya dang sgom byed du rtogs pas bsam par bya ba dang ldan te /
T02D2257:226a-27: bsam gtan la zhen cing chags pa dang de las gzhan pa la zhes sdang ba'o //
T02D2257:226a-28: de bas na chags sdang mngon par 'phel ba ni 'khor ba 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
T02D2257:226a-29: 'di ni bza' gtad dang bral ba'i phyir bsam gtan
T02D2257:226a-30: med cing rtogs pas 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir rtsol ba'i
T02D2257:226a-31: bdag nyid thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pa'i brtul zhugs
T02D2257:226a-32: rab tu byung ba la sogs pa yang med do
T02D2257:226a-33: // 'o na khyim na gnas shing 'jig rten pa
T02D2257:226a-34: phal pa dang mthun pa'i spyod pa las 'grub pa
T02D2257:226a-35: // ma zhe na / ma yin pa'i phyir bshad par bya ste /
T02D2257:226a-36: khyim gnas chung ma 'khor dang lhan cig tu //
T02D2257:226a-37: gang zhig yul chags dga' bcings mi grol na //
T02D2257:226a-38: snying po'i don mchog ldan pa ngas smras pa //
T02D2257:226a-39: de nyid don la regs pa yin no //
T02D2257:226a-41: ri khrod dang dgon pa dang chu 'gram dang phug
T02D2257:226a-42: stong dang nags la sogs pa dben pa'i gnas dor
T02D2257:226b-0: nas khyim na gnas shing yo byad dang chu @226b
T02D2257:226b-1: ma dang 'khor rnams dang lhan cig tu mtshungs par
T02D2257:226b-2: spyod pa gang zhig bdag ni bsam gtan yin no
T02D2257:226b-3: zhes de de bzhin nyid sgom yang yul chags pa
T02D2257:226b-4: dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan la dga' bas bcings
T02D2257:226b-5: pa mi grol bas na de'i rgyus chags sdang mngon
T02D2257:226b-7: snying po'i don mchog dam pa dang ldan pa ngas
T02D2257:226b-8: smras pa de kho na nyid kyi don la reg
T02D2257:226b-9: pa ma yin no zhes so //
T02D2257:226b-10: da ni de nyid kyi don de dag brtags pas mi 'thob pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D2257:226b-11: gal te mngon du gyur na bsam gtan gang //
T02D2257:226b-12: gal te lkog na yod na mun tshod dpog /
T02D2257:226b-13: ces bya ba'i don ni kho bos dbu ma pa
T02D2257:226b-15: shes bya nang du 'dod pa dag ni snang ba
T02D2257:226b-16: sems las ma byung ba yin no zhes smras pa
T02D2257:226b-17: dag la / gal te sems las byung ba yin
T02D2257:226b-18: na sems sangs rgyas yin pa'i phyir mngon du gyur
T02D2257:226b-19: pa thams cad kyang chos kyi sku ste /
T02D2257:226b-20: bsgom du med pa'i phyir bsgom par bya ba'i don
T02D2257:226b-21: khyod kyi bsam gtan ni gang yin smros shig /
T02D2257:226b-22: gal te phyi rol na snang ba de dag ni
T02D2257:226b-23: lkog na skyed par byed pa yod pa ste /
T02D2257:226b-24: shes pa'i rnam pa yin par smra na tha dad
T02D2257:226b-25: pa'i phyir khyod kyis gzhal bar yang mi nus te
T02D2257:226b-26: / mun pa la tshod dpog pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir bsgoms kyang don med par 'gyur ro //
T02D2257:226b-27: da ni de kho na nyid kyi rang bzhin bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:226b-28: lhan cig skyes pa'i 'gro ba'i ye shes de //
T02D2257:226b-29: rang bzhin nyid kyi dngos dang dngos med par //
T02D2257:226b-30: snying po'i don ni 'o dod rtag tu 'bod //
T02D2257:226b-31: ces bya ba'i don ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ye
T02D2257:226b-32: shes 'gro ba thams cad kyi rgyud la yod pa'i
T02D2257:226b-33: gnyug ma'i ye shes de dag thog ma dag nas
T02D2257:226b-34: rang bzhin nyid kyi dngos por rtog pa dang dngos
T02D2257:226b-35: po med par rtog pa dang bral bas snying po'i
T02D2257:226b-36: don 'di ni tha mal gyi shes pa yin /
T02D2257:226b-37: rtogs pas sangs rgyas pa yin no //
T02D2257:226b-38: thams cad bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin no zhes snyan pa'i 'o dod dang /
T02D2257:226b-40: grags pa'i 'o dod rtag tu 'bod do //
T02D2257:226b-41: 'di dag gis nges par 'tshang rgya bar ji tsam na nus zhe na /
T02D2257:226b-42: lta ba'i khyad par bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:226b-43: gang zhig blangs na skye 'chi gnas gyur pa //
T02D2257:226b-44: de nyid blangs nas bde chen mchog grub ces //
T02D2257:227a-1: snyan grags pa'i snying po smra byed kyang //
T02D2257:227a-2: byol song 'jig rten mi go ji ltar bya //
T02D2257:227a-4: bla ma'i gdams ngag de nyid nyams su myong ba las gang gi rgyas btab ste /
T02D2257:227a-5: tha mal gyi shes pa blangs nas rtag chad kyi skye 'chi gnas gyur pas //
T02D2257:227a-6: de kho na nyid 'bras bu chags pa thams cad kyi mchog bdag nyid kyis blangs te /
T02D2257:227a-7: de nas skad cig ma de nyid la bde ba
T02D2257:227a-8: chen po de kho na nyid kyi mchog grub ste
T02D2257:227a-9: / mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes skad
T02D2257:227a-10: snyan par bsgrags pas snying po'i don gyi smra bar
T02D2257:227a-11: byed kyang tshogs ma bsags pa'i gang zag rtog pa'i
T02D2257:227a-12: rmongs pas byol song gi 'jig rten dang 'dra pa
T02D2257:227a-13: rnams kyis mi go ba'i phyir de ji ltar bya
T02D2257:227a-15: da ni phyin ci ma log pa'i don bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:227a-16: bsam gtan bral bas ji zhig bsam byar yod //
T02D2257:227a-17: brjod du med la gang zhig bshad du yod ;
T02D2257:227a-18: / srid pa'i phyag rgyar 'gro ba ma lus zhugs //
T02D2257:227a-19: rang bzhin gnyug ma sus kyang rtog pa mad //
T02D2257:227a-20: rang bzhin snying po nyams su myong dus su //
T02D2257:227a-21: rgyu med sngags med sems med bsam gtan med //
T02D2257:227a-22: mnyam dus de kun rang bzhin 'khrul pa'i rgyu //
T02D2257:227a-23: rang bzhin shes pas 'khrul pa snying po'i don //
T02D2257:227a-24: rang bzhin dag pa'i sems kyi padmo la //
T02D2257:227a-25: rtog gi bsam gtan dag gis mi bslad de //
T02D2257:227a-26: bdag nyid bde la gnas kyang ma zhen cig / ces bya ba'i don ni /
T02D2257:227a-27: de kho na nyid gnyug ma'i don de dag la
T02D2257:227a-28: bsgom du med pa'i phyir bsgom par bya ba ma
T02D2257:227a-29: yin te / gnyis 'dzin gyi bsam gtan dang bral bas ci zhig bsam du yod de med do //
T02D2257:227a-30: bsam gtan gyi ngo bo sgrub par byed pa'i tshig
T02D2257:227a-31: dag kyang brjod du med la yul grub pa med
T02D2257:227a-32: pa'i phyir gang zhig gis bshad du yod pa ma
T02D2257:227a-34: de ltar ma rtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsgom par bya ba'i yul dang /
T02D2257:227a-35: de nyams su blangs pa'i thabs kyi tha snyad kyi
T02D2257:227a-36: tshig brjod du yod pa'i phyir srid pa ste khams
T02D2257:227a-37: gsum pa'o // de ni rtog pa las byung ba
T02D2257:227a-38: yin pa'i phyir dam pa rnams kyi gdams ngag dang
T02D2257:227b-0: nye bar ma 'brel bas rnam @227b rtog gi phyag
T02D2257:227b-1: rgyar 'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad zhugs so
T02D2257:227b-2: gsum pa'o // // rang bzhin gnyug ma'i de kho
T02D2257:227b-3: na nyid ni sus kyang rtog pa med de rang
T02D2257:227b-4: bzhin gnyug ma'i snying po'i don de nyams su myong
T02D2257:227b-5: ba'i dus su rgyud med de de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D2257:227b-7: sngags med de de la brten pa'i bstan bcos su grub pa med do //
T02D2257:227b-8: de dag gis bsgrub pa'i sems nyid dang nyams su myong ba'i bsam gtan du grub pa med do //
T02D2257:227b-9: de kho na nyid nyams su myong ba'i mnyam pa
T02D2257:227b-10: nyid kyi ye shes kyi dus su gong du bshad
T02D2257:227b-11: pa de kun thams cad chos nyid kyi don rnal
T02D2257:227b-13: de dag kyang 'khrul du yod dam zhe na /
T02D2257:227b-14: snang srid chos kyi sku phyag rgya chen po'i ngo
T02D2257:227b-15: bo nyid du rtogs shing tha mal gyi shes pas
T02D2257:227b-16: don ci yang med pa'i rang bzhin shes pa rnams
T02D2257:227b-17: kyis ni 'khrul pa logs su mi rtog ste /
T02D2257:227b-18: de nyid snying po'i don yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2257:227b-19: de ltar rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i sems kyi rang
T02D2257:227b-20: bzhin rtog pa'i dri mas ma gos pa'i padmo la
T02D2257:227b-21: rtog ge ba'i bsam gtan dag gis bslad bar mi
T02D2257:227b-22: bya ste / rang bzhin gar dga' ba'i tshul du
T02D2257:227b-23: gzhag pa de'i de nyid nyams su myong ba'i bde
T02D2257:227b-24: ba lus dang sems la gnas kyang de la ma
T02D2257:227b-25: zhen cig ces dam pa rnams kyis gdams pa'i don
T02D2257:227b-26: bya ste / to // da ni rang bzhin de
T02D2257:227b-27: kho na nyid kyi gnas lugs bstan par bya ste
T02D2257:227b-28: bya ste / to // / bdag nyid bde yid dag la 'dug mi bya //
T02D2257:227b-29: bdag nyid za zhing 'thungs la gnyis sbyor te //
T02D2257:227b-30: dga' ba'i yid kyis sprod par byed pa ni //
T02D2257:227b-31: rtag tu yang dang yang du 'khor lo 'gengs //
T02D2257:227b-33: rmongs pa'i 'jig rten 'gror rtog bzhag nas so //
T02D2257:227b-34: zhes pa'i don ni rnal ma'i don gnyug ma'i de
T02D2257:227b-35: nyid nyams su myong ba ni rnal 'byor ba bdag
T02D2257:227b-36: nyid la bde ba skyes kyang yid de dag la
T02D2257:227b-38: 'o na bsgom par bya ba ma yin nam zhe na /
T02D2257:227b-39: rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid gnyug ma'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D2257:227b-40: de dag gi zas za zhing bla ma'i gdams ngag
T02D2257:227b-41: dam pa'i skom 'thungs la bde ba dang stong pa
T02D2257:228a-1: par byed pa ni rang dga'i tshul gyis te /
T02D2257:228a-2: dran pa rgyun chags kyi yid kyis sems sems su
T02D2257:228a-3: sprod par byed pa ni snang ba sems la ma
T02D2257:228a-4: thim par dus rtag tu yang dang yang du goms
T02D2257:228a-5: par bya ste / lus bde ba chen po'i 'khor
T02D2257:228a-6: lo la sems sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid kyis 'gengs
T02D2257:228a-7: par bya ste / zhes bya'o // de bas na
T02D2257:228a-8: rang bzhin gyi chos 'dis ni yang dag par rdzogs
T02D2257:228a-9: pa'i sangs rgyas su mtshon pa'i 'jig rten pha rol
T02D2257:228a-11: de ni sems nyid du 'grub cing rtogs pa'o //
T02D2257:228a-12: tha dad kyis bsgribs pa'i rmongs pas 'jig rten gyi
T02D2257:228a-13: khams rnam par rtog pas brtags pa'i mgor sems rnam
T02D2257:228a-14: rtog tu brtags pa bzhag nas song ngo //
T02D2257:228a-15: de dag gis ni 'bras bu la nye bar byed pa yang ma yin no //
T02D2257:228a-16: da ni dman pa'i bsam gtan dag gis don med par 'gyur ba bshad par bya ste /
T02D2257:228a-17: gang du rlung dang sems ni mi rgyu zhing //
T02D2257:228a-18: thabs dang shes rab 'jug pa med gyur pa //
T02D2257:228a-19: skyes bu mi shes pa dag gnas der ni //
T02D2257:228a-20: gnas shing gnas skabs sems ni dbugs dbyung zhing //
T02D2257:228a-22: rmongs pa'i bsam gtan dag gis steng 'og gi rlung snga ma zhing mnan pa dang /
T02D2257:228a-23: rtsa'i n'a da thig le'i rnam pa la blo zhen du 'jug pa dang /
T02D2257:228a-24: shes pa kha nang du bltas pa'i zhi gnas bsgom pa dang /
T02D2257:228a-25: phyi rol gyi yul sku dang phyag rgya la sogs pa la dmigs pa nye bar 'dzin pa ste /
T02D2257:228a-26: de dag gi dus su yul gang du yang rlung dang sems mi rgyu ba ste /
T02D2257:228a-27: 'phros par gyur na yid kyi zhing de dag la
T02D2257:228a-28: rang ldog par 'gyur ro zhes smra bar byed kyang
T02D2257:228a-29: shes pa khugs su bcug nas shes pa de dag
T02D2257:228a-31: sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig kho na skyed par zad do //
T02D2257:228a-33: thabs tha mal gyi shes pa dang /
T02D2257:228a-34: shes rab gsal ba dang mi rtog pa dang bde
T02D2257:228a-35: ba dang 'jug pa'i chos kyi sku bde ba chen
T02D2257:228a-36: po'i rang bzhin dang bral te med par 'gyur bas
T02D2257:228a-37: thabs zhi gnas la nan tan byas pas 'bras bu
T02D2257:228a-38: lhag mthong gi shes rab skyed par 'dod de /
T02D2257:228a-39: de dag kyang bsgom bya dang sgom byed du brtags
T02D2257:228b-0: par skyes bu mi shes pa dag gnyis @228b 'dzin
T02D2257:228b-1: gyi shes pa'i gnas der ni mnyam par gzhag pa
T02D2257:228b-2: la gnas shing rjes su thob pa'i gnas skabs su
T02D2257:228b-3: sems kyi ngo bo ni dbugs dbyung zhing gnas par
T02D2257:228b-4: byed pa ste / 'di dag la ni bye ma la mar btsir ba bzhin no //
T02D2257:228b-5: slob dpon chen po dag gi zhal gyi bdud rtsi
T02D2257:228b-6: gnyis pa rje btsun pa las thos pa ni man
T02D2257:228b-7: ngag tu gnas pa ste zhal las shes par bya'o
T02D2257:228b-8: // da ni ji ltar bsgom par bya ba yin zhe na /
T02D2257:228b-9: snying po'i don gyi ye shes de kho na //
T02D2257:228b-10: bdag med mas ni man ngag bstan nas song //
T02D2257:228b-11: gnyis su mi bya gcig tu bya ba ste //
T02D2257:228b-12: gcig tu rtog na rnal 'byor spros pa'i lam //
T02D2257:228b-13: zhes bya ba'i don ni sems gnyug ma'i rang bzhin
T02D2257:228b-14: snying po'i don de nyid kyi ye shes kyi cho
T02D2257:228b-15: 'phrul dpag tu med par snang ste /
T02D2257:228b-16: de thams cad kyang rnal ma'i de kho na nyid
T02D2257:228b-17: kyi nyams su myong bar byed de de nyid kyang
T02D2257:228b-18: sems nyid kyi ngo bo steng bdag gi cha dang
T02D2257:228b-19: bral ba'i phyir bdag med yin la 'bras bu thams
T02D2257:228b-20: cad skyed par byed pas na ma ste /
T02D2257:228b-21: des de la ni ci yang min pa'i man ngag bstan nas song //
T02D2257:228b-22: de 'dzin par byed pas man ngag gi bsgom bya
T02D2257:228b-23: dang sgom byed gnyis su mi bya zhing ngo bo
T02D2257:228b-25: bdag nyid kyi ngo bo yin no zhes gcig tu
T02D2257:228b-26: rtog na rnal 'byor pa'i rtog pa dang spros pa'i
T02D2257:228b-27: lam ste / 'bras bu zad par byed pa nyid do //
T02D2257:228b-28: 'di dag gi byed pa'i tshul ni 'di lta bu yin te /
T02D2257:228b-29: rigs la bye brag bzang ngan ma byed par //
T02D2257:228b-30: khams gsum ma lus 'di dag thams cad ni //
T02D2257:228b-31: 'dod chags rnam spangs 'dod chags nyid min te //
T02D2257:228b-32: 'dod chags chen po gcig tu kha dog bsgyur //
T02D2257:228b-33: zhes bya ba'i don ni snang grags kyi chos 'di
T02D2257:228b-34: dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs te nam
T02D2257:228b-35: mkha' dang 'dra'o // de la bye brag dang bzang
T02D2257:228b-36: ngan ma byed par chos kyi skur blta bar bya'o
T02D2257:228b-37: mkha' dang 'dra'o // // de nyid la rigs gsum du snang ste //
T02D2257:228b-38: 'dod pa'i khams ni rin po che'i rigs so //
T02D2257:228b-39: gzugs kyi khams ni padma'i rigs so //
T02D2257:228b-40: gzugs med pa'i khams ni rdo rje'i rigs te /
T02D2257:228b-41: de yang rab tu mi gnas pa'i rgyud las //
T02D2257:229a-2: thams cad chos kyi sku ru blta //
T02D2257:229a-3: 'dod khams rin chen rigs yin te //
T02D2257:229a-5: gzugs khams padma'i rigs yin te //
T02D2257:229a-6: lus rnam dag cing dri ma med //
T02D2257:229a-7: gzugs med rdo rde'i rigs yin te //
T02D2257:229a-8: mtshon gyis bcad kyang snad mi nus //
T02D2257:229a-10: rigs gcig dag las nges par 'byung //
T02D2257:229a-11: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir khams gsum pa ma lus 'di
T02D2257:229a-12: dag thams cad ni tha dad kyi 'dod chags rnam
T02D2257:229a-13: par spangs te / spang du med pa'i don sems
T02D2257:229a-14: nyid gnyug ma'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro
T02D2257:229a-15: par spangs te / // de bas na 'dod chags
T02D2257:229a-16: spang du med de tha mal gyi shes pas 'dod
T02D2257:229a-17: chags chen po nyid yin te /
T02D2257:229a-18: de yang nges pa'i 'dod pa dang ci yang ma
T02D2257:229a-19: yin pa'i chags pa chen pos chos kyi sku nyag
T02D2257:229a-20: gcig tu kha dog bsgyur bar bya'o //
T02D2257:229a-21: da ni mtshan nyid kyi rnam pa brjod par bya ste /
T02D2257:229a-22: de la thog mtha' dbus ni yod min te //
T02D2257:229a-23: srid dang mya ngan 'das pa gnyis mi rtogs //
T02D2257:229a-24: ma bcos bde ba chen po'i mchog 'di la //
T02D2257:229a-25: bdag dang gzhan du grub pa yod ma yin //
T02D2257:229a-26: mdun dang rgyab dang g-yas g-yon phyogs bcu ru //
T02D2257:229a-27: gang du rtog dang myong ba de dag ni //
T02D2257:229a-28: de ni 'khrul pa'i lam la mngon par gnas //
T02D2257:229a-29: rang bzhin mtshon cha chen po rtogs pa na //
T02D2257:229a-30: da ni su la 'ang dri bar mi bya'o //
T02D2257:229a-31: zhes bya ba'i don ni gong du smos pa'i gnyug
T02D2257:229a-32: mi'i ngo bo de dag la thog ma dang mtha'
T02D2257:229a-33: yod pa ma yin te nam mkha' dang 'dra'o //
T02D2257:229a-34: dbus ni ci yang ma yin pa'i phyir yod pa min te bdag gis smra bar mi nus so //
T02D2257:229a-35: de ltar nyams su myong ba'i don de nyid la
T02D2257:229a-36: srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis su
T02D2257:229a-37: mi rtog ste dbyer mi phyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2257:229a-38: de ltar na rang bzhin gyi ngo bo ni sems ma bcos pas yin te /
T02D2257:229a-39: de nyid kyi khyad par ni thams cad bde ba
T02D2257:229a-40: chen po'i rang bzhin las rtog pa mchog tu gyur
T02D2257:229a-41: pa 'di la bdag dang gzhan du grub pa yod
T02D2257:229a-43: de'i phyir rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi sems nyid du
T02D2257:229b-0: rtogs pa dang bskyed pa'i rim pa @229b brtan pas
T02D2257:229b-1: thob cing de nyid la 'byung ba dang /
T02D2257:229b-2: rtsa ba'i rgyal po dang blon po dang dmangs rnams
T02D2257:229b-3: dang steng du rgyu ba'i rlung dang thur la rgyu
T02D2257:229b-4: ba'i rlung dang 'phred la gnas pa'i rlung dang gnas
T02D2257:229b-5: pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang /
T02D2257:229b-6: 'pho ba byang chub kyi sems dang 'gyur ba byang
T02D2257:229b-7: chub kyi sems la bde ba skyed cing blo gnas
T02D2257:229b-8: shing brtan pa dang shes pa mi rtog pa 'ba'
T02D2257:229b-10: bum pa'i dbang me long lta bu'i ye shes su blta ba dang /
T02D2257:229b-11: gsang ba'i dbang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes su blta ba dang /
T02D2257:229b-12: shes rab kyi dbang so sor rtog pa'i ye shes su blta ba dang /
T02D2257:229b-13: mtha'i dbang bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes su blta ba rnams dang /
T02D2257:229b-14: de thams cad bsten par byed pa yang dam tshig las 'byung ba yin pa dang /
T02D2257:229b-15: de thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes
T02D2257:229b-16: las ma 'das so zhes mdun dang rgyab dang g-yas
T02D2257:229b-17: g-yon phyogs bcu ru brtags shing dpyad de gang du
T02D2257:229b-18: rtogs pa dang nyams su myong ba de dag gi
T02D2257:229b-19: zug rngu ste / skyes bu de ni 'khrul pa'i lam las mngon par gnas pa kho na'o //
T02D2257:229b-20: gnyug ma'i don phyin ci ma log pa mi mthun
T02D2257:229b-21: pa'i phyogs skad cig ma de nyid la zhi bar
T02D2257:229b-22: byed pa'i rang bzhin gyi mtshon cha chen po 'di
T02D2257:229b-23: rtogs na da ni bdag gis su la yang dri
T02D2257:229b-24: bar mi bya'o // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2257:229b-25: rtag pa thams cad sdug bsngal yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2257:229b-26: nga ni rtogs pa'i tshad bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:229b-27: snang ba'i dbang po gang du nub 'gyur zhing //
T02D2257:229b-28: rang gi ngo bo ma nyams dngos nyams 'gyur //
T02D2257:229b-29: zhes bya ba'i don ni gnyug ma'i ngo bor bzhag
T02D2257:229b-30: pa la khyad med kyang rnam pa la yod pa'i
T02D2257:229b-31: phyir dang por myong du med pa'i myong ba dang
T02D2257:229b-32: / goms pa dang mthar phyin pa'i dus su snang
T02D2257:229b-33: ba dang dbang po'i yul du gyur pa thams cad
T02D2257:229b-34: gnyug ma'i ngo bo nyid du nub par 'gyur zhing
T02D2257:229b-35: / / de yang rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyams te ji bzhin par rtogs pa'o //
T02D2257:229b-36: byis pa rnams kyis brtags pa'i dngos po thams cad nyams par 'gyur ro //
T02D2257:229b-37: da ni de nyid kyi don de dag bla ma
T02D2257:229b-38: ma yin pa'i gzhan las mi rtog pa bstan par
T02D2257:229b-39: bya ste // kye ho grogs dag lhan cig skyes pa de //
T02D2257:230a-1: nas mi rnyed bla ma'i zhal las dris //
T02D2257:230a-2: don dam zhal gyi ngo bo de rtogs na //
T02D2257:230a-3: yid ni 'ching med rlung yang 'chad par med //
T02D2257:230a-4: khams gsum 'di ni thams cad de yi bdag / de ma rtogs pas 'ching dang 'chad par 'gyur //
T02D2257:230a-5: zhes bya ba'i don ni kye ho zhes bya ba
T02D2257:230a-6: ste bla ma la brten pa la gdams pa yin
T02D2257:230a-7: pa'i don te / grogs dag ces bya ba'i don
T02D2257:230a-8: ni blo shin tu chen por 'gyur ba'i gang zag
T02D2257:230a-9: rje btsun pa rnams dang mtshungs par spyod nus pa
T02D2257:230a-10: pa'i don te / rnams la'o // de dag la
T02D2257:230a-11: sbyangs pa'i don de ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ye
T02D2257:230a-12: shes de dag gzhan nas rnyed pa ma yin te
T02D2257:230a-14: de bas na bla ma'i zhal gyi bdud rtsi la dris nas don dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T02D2257:230a-15: de bas na dam pa'i gdams ngag de dag rtogs na yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur la /
T02D2257:230a-16: ma rtogs na dug tu 'gyur ba'i phyir gnyis med
T02D2257:230a-17: kyi don dam pa de dag bla ma'i zhal gyi
T02D2257:230a-18: ngo bo de las rtogs na yid 'ching ba med
T02D2257:230a-19: de / shes pa rnal ma chos kyi sku yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2257:230a-20: rtog pa dang rlung yang chad pa med pa ste
T02D2257:230a-21: snang grags kyi chos sku phyag rgya chen po yin
T02D2257:230a-22: pa'i phyir ro // de bas na khams gsum pa
T02D2257:230a-23: 'di dag thams cad ni bde ba chen po de'i
T02D2257:230a-25: de nyid kyi ngo bo la rtogs pas rtogs par 'dod pa'i phyir yid 'ching ba dang /
T02D2257:230a-27: sems bsad cing dgag sgrub byas pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2257:230a-28: da ni rtogs pa'i don las snying po log na med par bshad par bya ste /
T02D2257:230a-29: khams gsum 'di na yan lag dngos po gnas //
T02D2257:230a-30: de ni rmongs par rab tu shes par gyis //
T02D2257:230a-31: ma rig mi rig gti mug rgya mtsho che //
T02D2257:230a-32: chad pa'i tshul snang de la ma zhen pa'i //
T02D2257:230a-33: 'di ni snying po bde chen mchog yin no //
T02D2257:230a-34: 'di ni sangs rgyas dgongs pa sangs rgyas nyid //
T02D2257:230a-35: gzhan gyi spyod min sa ra pa yis bstan //
T02D2257:230a-36: rjes su 'gro ba glu yi gar blang bya //
T02D2257:230a-37: zhes bya ba'i don ni khams gsum pa 'di dag
T02D2257:230a-38: ni gsal ba dang mi rtog pa'i yan lag dang
T02D2257:230a-39: / bde ba chen po'i dngos po gnas te de
T02D2257:230a-40: ni gnyis su med pa'i phyir rmongs pa yin pas
T02D2257:230b-0: don de nyid rab tu shes @230b par gyis shig
T02D2257:230b-2: khams gsum pa 'di dag yan lag can rdzas dang bsags pa dang 'dus pa'i dngos po dang /
T02D2257:230b-4: rnam pa yin par 'dod pa smra ste /
T02D2257:230b-5: de ni kun nas dkris pa'i phyir rmongs pas 'khor ba'i bdag nyid la gnas pa kho na ste /
T02D2257:230b-6: de na gi yang sa yin pa'i phyir rab tu shes par gyis shig pa'i don to //
T02D2257:230b-7: da ni nyon mongs pa dang de kho na nyid tha mi dad pa yin te /
T02D2257:230b-8: khams gsum pa thams cad kyi ma rig pa ni
T02D2257:230b-9: ye shes nyid yin te rig tu med pa'i phyir
T02D2257:230b-10: ro // de bas na ma rig pa'i don de
T02D2257:230b-11: nyid gti mug chen po ste mi shes shing shes
T02D2257:230b-13: de ni zab cing dpag dka' ba'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po dang 'dra'o //

T02D2257:237a-25: pas de nyid kyi drung du rtogs pa'i sems kyi
T02D2257:237a-26: thag shugs kyis gcod bar byos shig ces bya ba'i
T02D2257:237a-27: ba ste / don to // da ni gnyis med kyi don de dag la gdams par bya ste /
T02D2257:237a-28: rlung bcings pa la rang nyid ma sems kyi //
T02D2257:237a-29: shing gi rnal 'byor sna rtser ma sems shig / kye ma'o ma yin lhan cig skyes pa yi //
T02D2257:237a-30: gnyis med dang du mnyam pa'i 'dod chags byos //
T02D2257:237a-31: zhes bya ba'i don ni rnam rtog gi rta rlung gi rnam par de dag bcings pa'i don /
T02D2257:237a-32: mi rtog pa 'ba' zhig la zhen na ma sems kye zhes gdams so //
T02D2257:237a-33: de bas na shing zhes ni zag pa med pa'i
T02D2257:237a-34: ye shes gnyug ma'i rang bzhin te de dag ni
T02D2257:237a-35: 'phel zhing skyes pa 'di nyid kyis 'bras bu smin
T02D2257:237a-37: dang po'i cha ma yin pa'i rnal 'byor gyi shes
T02D2257:237a-38: pa mnyam pa nyid de dag sna rtse la sogs
T02D2257:237a-39: pa rnams su rnam par rtogs pa gtad de ma
T02D2257:237a-40: sems shig / de bas na de ltar rtogs pa
T02D2257:237a-41: rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin ni kye ma'o ma yin
T02D2257:237b-0: zhes bya'o // lhan cig skyes pa'i ye @237b shes
T02D2257:237b-1: de dag ni bde pa chen po'i ngang du mnyam
T02D2257:237b-2: pa nyid du 'dod chags byos zhes bya'o //
T02D2257:237b-3: da ni gzung ba'i skyon bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:237b-4: srid pa'i sna rtser 'ching ba yongs su spangs //
T02D2257:237b-5: 'di ni yid 'dus pa la rlung gis rlabs //
T02D2257:237b-6: g-yo zhing 'phar bar shin tu mi srun 'gyur //
T02D2257:237b-7: zhes bya ba'i don ni yid bcings pa dag ni srid pa ste 'khor ba'i rnam pa yin no //
T02D2257:237b-8: de'i phyir sna rtser 'ching pa la sogs pa yongs su spang ngo //
T02D2257:237b-9: de'i mi rtog pa 'di ni yid 'dus pa ste 'phred la gnas pa'i rlung zin pa'o //
T02D2257:237b-10: de la steng 'og gi rlung gis rlabs na sems
T02D2257:237b-11: g-yo zhing lus 'phar bas shin tu mi srun par
T02D2257:237b-12: 'gyur te / smyon pa dang mtshungs pa'i phyir don med par 'gyur ro //
T02D2257:237b-13: de ltar ma bcings pa'i phan yon bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D2257:237b-14: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes gnas gyur na //
T02D2257:237b-15: de'i phyir bdag nyid brtan par 'gyur ba ste /
T02D2257:237b-16: gang zhig yid ni nye bar 'gags gyur na //
T02D2257:237b-17: lus ni 'ching pa rnam par 'chad par 'gyur //
T02D2257:237b-19: snang ba dang sems lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin
T02D2257:237b-20: ci yang ma yin pa'i ngo bor gnas gyur na
T02D2257:237b-21: / chos kyi sku de'i bdag nyid brtan par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2257:237b-22: gang gi tshe gnyug ma la goms par 'gyur ba
T02D2257:237b-23: de'i phyir yid kyi rtog pa ni nye bar 'gag
T02D2257:237b-25: lus kyi 'ching ba 'char bar 'gyur ba dang bde
T02D2257:237b-26: ba la zhen pa la sogs pa rnam par 'chad
T02D2257:237b-27: par 'gyur ro // da ni nyams myong gi rtags bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:237b-28: dbus su lhan cig skyes dang ro mnyam pas //
T02D2257:237b-29: de tshe dmangs rigs dag dang bram ze med //
T02D2257:237b-31: sems dang snang ba gnyis kyi dbus su lhan cig
T02D2257:237b-32: skyes pa'i ye shes kyi de kho na nyid ro
T02D2257:237b-33: mnyam par 'gyur ba'i de dog med pa'i don de
T02D2257:237b-34: nyid rtogs shing gnyis 'dzin med cing gza' gtad dang
T02D2257:237b-35: bral ba'i ngo bo nyams su myong ba las blang
T02D2257:237b-36: dor med pa'i spyod pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te
T02D2257:237b-37: / de'i tshe nyam da bar 'gyur ba med pa'i
T02D2257:237b-38: phyir tha dad kyi rtog pa dang bral bas dmangs
T02D2257:237b-39: rigs dang bram ze med do zhes bya'o //
T02D2257:238a-0: da ni grags pa'i dpe'i sgo nas don @238a * //
T02D2257:238a-2: 'di nas zla ba'i rgya mtsho nyid dang ni //
T02D2257:238a-3: 'di nas gang+g'a'i rgya mtsho'i bar dag dang //
T02D2257:238a-4: b'a r'a na s'i'i khor yug bar dag ni //
T02D2257:238a-5: 'di ni zla ba rgyas pa gsal byed cing //
T02D2257:238a-6: byang chub sems kyi ri bong gis //
T02D2257:238a-7: sems can rgya mtsho gsal bar byed //
T02D2257:238a-8: dran pa gang+g'a'i mtsho dag gis //
T02D2257:238a-9: yul chen b'a r'a na s'ir gsal //
T02D2257:238a-10: zla ba 'grib dang rgyas pa ni //
T02D2257:238a-11: zla bar 'gyur ba ma yin te //
T02D2257:238a-13: zla ba lta bu'i sems nyid la //
T02D2257:238a-15: rtog pa'i dbang gis de ltar snang //
T02D2257:238a-16: de phyir rtog ba bsal ba'i phyir //
T02D2257:238a-17: gnyug ma'i grogs dang bcas pas 'bad //
T02D2257:238a-19: kye ho dang po'i rten la smros //
T02D2257:238a-21: dpe dag gis nye bar mtshon pa'ang //
T02D2257:238a-22: gnyug ma'i don kho na nyid brjod par bya ste /
T02D2257:238a-23: 'di nas zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas so //
T02D2257:238a-24: zla ba rgya mtsho zhes bya ba ni lto phyogs kyi ngos dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa dag na'o //
T02D2257:238a-25: de dag ni chu zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis
T02D2257:238a-26: yod pa khor yug tu dpag tshad bzhi bcu rtsa
T02D2257:238a-28: de dag gi nang na nor bu rin po che
T02D2257:238a-29: hu lu aindra zhes bya ba las dpag tshad gcig
T02D2257:238a-31: de dag la zla ba'i 'od kyis phog pa'i dus
T02D2257:238a-32: su chu'i rgyun 'byung bar 'gyur zhing 'od kyang phyogs
T02D2257:238a-33: bcur 'phro'o // 'di nas gang+g'a'i rgya mtshor dpag tshad bcu gnyis te /
T02D2257:238a-34: de dag gi bar dag tu rin po che'i 'od
T02D2257:238a-35: kyis khyab cing khyad par du chu de dag gsal
T02D2257:238a-36: bar byed do // 'od de dag dang 'brel ba'i
T02D2257:238a-37: gang+g'a'i chu'i nang na rin po che aasma garbha zhes
T02D2257:238a-39: de'i 'od kyis yul b'a r'a na s'i'i grong khyer
T02D2257:238a-40: gyi dbus na mchod rten da sha ka zhes bya
T02D2257:238a-41: ba yod de / de dag gi rtse mo la
T02D2257:238a-42: nor bu rin po che mu sa la garbha zhes
T02D2257:238a-44: de dag la khyad par byed do //
T02D2257:238a-45: de'i 'od kyis b'a r'a na s'i'i khor yug gi
T02D2257:238a-46: bar thams cad 'od kyis gang bar byed cing khyad
T02D2257:238a-47: par du yo byad thams cad kyi mdog kyang gsal
T02D2257:238b-0: bar byed do // @238b de bas na grong khyer
T02D2257:238b-1: 'di ni zla ba rgyas pa gsal byed pa ste
T02D2257:238b-2: zla ba nyid kyi mthu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2257:238b-3: de bzhin du don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems
T02D2257:238b-4: chos kyi sku'i ri bong gis sems can gyi rgya
T02D2257:238b-5: mtsho thams cad la gsal bar byed de de dag
T02D2257:238b-6: la ye shes kyi nor bu rin po che rang
T02D2257:238b-8: de'i 'od len par byed pa yang dran pa rgyu na chags te gang+g'a'i mtsho lta bu'o //
T02D2257:238b-9: de dag gi nang na chos kyis rtog par byed pa'i nor bu gnas te /
T02D2257:238b-10: skal ba dang ldan pa'i yul tshogs chen bo bsags pa'i gang zag b'a r'a na s'ir gsal lo //
T02D2257:238b-11: de dag ni tha mal gyi shes pa'i mchod rten
T02D2257:238b-12: gyi rtse mo la nyams su myong ba'i nor bu
T02D2257:238b-14: snang srid bde ba chen po'i 'od 'byin par byed do //
T02D2257:238b-15: de'i 'od kyi khyad par du sna tshogs du ma'i
T02D2257:238b-16: yo byad thams cad ro gcig tu mdog 'byin to
T02D2257:238b-17: // de yang rtogs pa dang ldan pa'i gang zag
T02D2257:238b-18: rnams la mi snang ba'i phyir dpe brjod par bya
T02D2257:238b-19: // ste / zla ba nyid la 'grib pa dang
T02D2257:238b-20: rgyas pa ni yod pa ma yin te zla ba
T02D2257:238b-21: 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2257:238b-22: de ltar 'phel 'grib kyi rnam pa yang nyi ma
T02D2257:238b-23: dang nye ba dang ring ba'i rkyen gyis 'phel ba
T02D2257:238b-25: dpe de bzhin du zla ba lta bu'i 'od don
T02D2257:238b-26: dam pa byang chub kyi sems de nyid la ni
T02D2257:238b-27: thog ma nyid nas ma bcos pa rnal ma'i rang
T02D2257:238b-28: bzhin yin pa'i phyir skal pa dang ldan pa rnams
T02D2257:238b-29: 'phel ba dang skal ba med pa rnams la 'grib
T02D2257:238b-31: blo chung ba'i gang zag rnams kyis tha dad kyi
T02D2257:238b-32: rtog pa'i ngo bor brtags pa'i dbang gis de ltar
T02D2257:238b-33: snang ba dang / chos thams cad ci yang ma
T02D2257:238b-34: yin pa'i ngo bo tha mal gyi shes pas nyams
T02D2257:238b-35: su myong bar bya ba rtogs pas 'phel 'grib kyi
T02D2257:238b-36: tshul du snang ste de ltar ma rtogs pa rnams
T02D2257:238b-37: kyi ni rtogs par bya ba'i phyir rtog pa bsal
T02D2257:238b-38: snang ba dang / bar bya ste / de nyid
T02D2257:238b-39: kyi phyir gnyug ma'i de bzhin nyid bsgom zhing de'i
T02D2257:238b-40: grogs bsod nams kyi tshogs dang snying rje dang bcas
T02D2257:238b-42: rtsol sgrub dang bcas par thal lo zhe na /
T02D2257:238b-43: byis pa'i ngang tshul can rnams la rtog par bya
T02D2257:238b-44: ba'i yan lag tu smras pa ste chen po pa
T02D2257:238b-45: rnams la ni 'bad pa dal med 'gyur te zhes
T02D2257:239a-1: bar bya ba ma yin pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D2257:239a-2: de bas na thabs khyad par can la gdams pa'i phyir kye ho zhes bya'o //
T02D2257:239a-3: dang po'i rten zhes bya ba ni tha mal gyi
T02D2257:239a-4: shes pa ste de dag nyams su myong bar bya
T02D2257:239a-6: da ni grogs dang bcas pa'i de kho na nyid
T02D2257:239a-7: mthong bar 'gyur bar bya ba bstan par bya ste
T02D2257:239a-8: / zhing kun gnas dang nye ba'i gnas tshogs su //
T02D2257:239a-9: phyin te bltas pas rtog par nga smras pa //
T02D2257:239a-10: lung dang dran pa'i mu nas bzung ba'i tshe //
T02D2257:239a-11: dge ba nga yis yang dag nges par mthong //
T02D2257:239a-12: nga yis rmi lam du yang mthong ba med //
T02D2257:239a-13: ri bo'i khrod du gnas te bag yod byos //
T02D2257:239a-15: ta na ta ga ra zhes bya ba ste de dag ni zhing dang nye ba'i zhing ngo //
T02D2257:239a-16: de'i don bsnyad par bya ste /
T02D2257:239a-17: rab tu mi gnas pa'i rgyud las //
T02D2257:239a-18: slob ma skal ldan mtshungs pa dang bo'i zhing //
T02D2257:239a-19: bla ma nyams myong dag pa gnyis med zhing //
T02D2257:239a-20: zhes bya ba'i phyir skal pa nye bar mtshungs pa
T02D2257:239a-21: dang ldan pa'i slob ma dang de kho na nyid
T02D2257:239a-22: nyams su myong bar byed pa'i bla ma'i ste de
T02D2257:239a-24: de la ji ltar zhe na /
T02D2257:239a-25: keng ri ba ha na ra zhes bya ba ste //
T02D2257:239a-26: dur khrod dang nye ba'i dur khrod do //
T02D2257:239a-27: de dag gi don ni rgyud de nyid las //
T02D2257:239a-28: slob ma'i dur khrod des par gsol ba 'debs //
T02D2257:239a-29: rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba lus kyi khrod //
T02D2257:239a-30: bla ma de yis nye bar smin par byed //
T02D2257:239a-31: dag pa'i gdams ngag dag gis nye bar ston //
T02D2257:239a-32: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir slob pa po dag gis gus
T02D2257:239a-33: pa dang ldan pas bla ma la gsol ba btab
T02D2257:239a-34: ste ; btab pa'i don de nyid mi bslu ba'i
T02D2257:239a-35: don du zhal gyi bdud rtsi dag gis rgyud yongs
T02D2257:239a-36: su smin par byas te de dag la sbyar bar
T02D2257:239a-37: ste ; bya'o // de yang ji ltar bsgrub par bya zhe na /
T02D2257:239a-38: gi sa ra ni su'i ha zhes bya ste /
T02D2257:239a-39: tshando ha dang nye ba'i tshando ha'o //
T02D2257:239a-40: de dag gi don ni yang rgyud de nyid las //
T02D2257:239a-41: tha mal shes pas brgyan pa tshando ha //
T02D2257:239a-42: de nyid goms bar gyur pa nye bar mchog / ces 'byung ba'i phyir /
T02D2257:239a-43: bla ma las thos pa'i don de dag tha mal
T02D2257:239a-44: gyi shes pa nyams su myong bar byas shing dus
T02D2257:239a-45: thams cad du goms par byed pa ste de dag
T02D2257:239b-0: de dag @239b kyang gang dang ldan bar 'grub ce na /
T02D2257:239b-1: au ni la ma ha po ti ha ra ni zhes bya ste /
T02D2257:239b-2: gnas dang nye ba'i gnas so //
T02D2257:239b-3: de nyid gsal bar bya ba yang rgyud de nyid las /
T02D2257:239b-4: snang srid bde chen bla ma dran pa dang //
T02D2257:239b-5: sems nyid bla ma mchog ste gnod mi byed //
T02D2257:239b-6: gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la rnyed nas kyang //
T02D2257:239b-7: skad cig gcig la rdo rje chos kyi sku //
T02D2257:239b-8: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir dus rtag tu bla ma mi brjod par bya ba dang /
T02D2257:239b-9: snang srid thams cad chos kyi sku gnyug ma'i ngo
T02D2257:239b-10: bo nyid du rtogs par bya ba ni gnas so
T02D2257:239b-11: // dus rtag tu sems nyid bla ma dam pa'i
T02D2257:239b-12: tshul du bkur bar byed cing sems la mi gnod
T02D2257:239b-13: pa'i lam gyis dus thams cad du chu bo lta
T02D2257:239b-14: bur sems chos kyi skur gzhag pa ni nye ba'i
T02D2257:239b-15: // gnas so // de dag kyang ji lta bu'i tshul du bcas par bya zhe na /
T02D2257:239b-16: ka na to pi ha'i na ra te 'du ba dang nye ba'i 'du ba'o //
T02D2257:239b-17: de yang rgyud de nyid las /
T02D2257:239b-18: gsal dang mi rtog bde ba dang //
T02D2257:239b-19: dbyer mi phyed kyi de nyid ni //
T02D2257:239b-20: spyod lam bzhi la khyad med pa //
T02D2257:239b-22: dur khrod grong khyer tshogs rnams su //
T02D2257:239b-23: 'jigs pa med par rgyu byed cing //
T02D2257:239b-24: chags pa med par slong mo byed //
T02D2257:239b-25: kha tv'am 'dzin cing mu cor smra //
T02D2257:239b-27: / dam pa rnams kyi lam yin no //
T02D2257:239b-29: zhing kun gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang tshogs su zhes sbyar ro //
T02D2257:239b-30: phyin te zhes bya ba ni rims de nyid kyi tshul lo //
T02D2257:239b-31: bltas pas zhes bya ba ni de dag gi tshul ma nyams par nyams su blangs pa'o //
T02D2257:239b-32: de nyid kyis chos kyi sku gnyis su med pa'i
T02D2257:239b-33: ye shes kyi de kho na nyid rtogs par 'gyur
T02D2257:239b-34: ro zhes rje btsun pa dag gis gsungs so //
T02D2257:239b-35: de nyid bla ma dam pa'i lung dang dran pa rgyun chags kyis gnyug ma'i mu nas bzung ste /
T02D2257:239b-36: ci snang chos kyi sku phyag rgya chen por ngo
T02D2257:239b-37: bor snang ba'i tshe de ni thun mong ma yin
T02D2257:239b-38: pa'i dge par yang dag par mngon par shes pas
T02D2257:239b-40: de dag la rgyu 'bras kyi tshul du 'thob par 'gyur ba yod dam zhe na /
T02D2257:239b-41: nga yis zhes bya ste rje btsun pa dag gis kyang de nyid mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2257:239b-42: rmi lam du yang mthong ba med do//
T02D2257:240a-0: @240a * // dngos su rgyu 'bras kyi tshul du 'byung bar lta smos kyang ci dgos /
T02D2257:240a-1: 'o na 'bras bu de dag 'thob par 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na /
T02D2257:240a-2: lus kyi ri bo'i khrod du tha mal gyi shes bas rnal 'byor ba gnas te /
T02D2257:240a-3: dran pa rgyun chags kyi bag yod par byos shig ces pa'am /
T02D2257:240a-4: las dang po pa rnams kyi ri bo dang dgon
T02D2257:240a-5: pa dang chu 'gram dang dur khrod du gnas te
T02D2257:240a-6: spyod lam thams cad du de kho na nyid las
T02D2257:240a-7: mi g-yengs par bag yod par byos shig dang rtog
T02D2257:240a-8: pa'i skad cig de nyid las sangs rgyas par 'gyur
T02D2257:240a-9: ro // da ni gnyug ma'i don de nyid kyi rten mtshon bar bya ste //
T02D2257:240a-10: 'dab ldan bang sdong ge sar gyi dbus na //
T02D2257:240a-11: shin tu phra ba'i rnal ma'i kha don ldan //
T02D2257:240a-12: bye brag bor cig rmongs pa mya ngan gyis //
T02D2257:240a-13: gdungs pa 'bras bu med par ma byed cig / ces bya ba'i don ni /
T02D2257:240a-14: 'dab ces bya ba ni sha brtsegs pa'i 'dang ma ste /
T02D2257:240a-15: de dang ldan pa ni keng rus kyi rus pa'i tshogs so //
T02D2257:240a-16: bad ces bya ba ni mdangs nye bar 'dzin pa ste khrag go //
T02D2257:240a-17: sdong zhes bya ba ni lus brtan par byed pa ste /
T02D2257:240a-18: rtsa'i rgyal po aa wa dh'u t'i la sogs pa'i nang na gnas pa'i byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D2257:240a-19: ge sar zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo rnam pa drug gi 'dab ma'o //
T02D2257:240a-20: de dag gi dbus na gnas pa'i thig le ste
T02D2257:240a-21: snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo'i dbus na gnas pa
T02D2257:240a-22: na rtog ba med pa'i thig le'o //
T02D2257:240a-23: de yang bsam gyis mi khyab ba'i rgyud las //
T02D2257:240a-24: sha yi 'dab ma yongs su rdzogs pa'i nang //
T02D2257:240a-25: keng rus tshogs kyis yongs su gang bar byas //
T02D2257:240a-26: 'dab ma khrag gi mdangs kyis drod 'dzin te /
T02D2257:240a-27: rtsa brtsegs sdong bo'i tshul du nges par gnas //
T02D2257:240a-28: ge sar 'khor lo drug ni rnam par bkram //
T02D2257:240a-29: sdong po byang chub sems kyi lus bstan te //
T02D2257:240a-30: chos kyi 'khor lo'i dbus na thig le mchog / shin tu phra ba rnal ma'i kha dog ldan //
T02D2257:240a-31: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir rtog pa med pa'i thig le
T02D2257:240a-32: de dag ni gnyug ma'i de kho na nyid skyed
T02D2257:240a-33: par byed de / de dag ni shin tu brtags
T02D2257:240a-34: dka' ba'i phyir zab cing phra ba'i rnal pa ste
T02D2257:240a-35: par byed de / / rgya mtsho lta bu'o //
T02D2257:240a-36: de yang tha mal gyi shes pa gsal ba dang
T02D2257:240b-0: mi rtog pa dang bde ba @240b dang nyams su
T02D2257:240b-1: myong bar byed pa ste chos kyi sku nyid yin
T02D2257:240b-2: pa'i phyir rnal ma'i kha dog dang ldan zhes bya'o
T02D2257:240b-3: // de nyid kyi ngo bo nyams su myong ba la ni re dogs gnyis 'dzin /
T02D2257:240b-4: blang dor gyi rnam pa yod pa ma yin te /
T02D2257:240b-5: 'bras bu thams cad kyi mchog go //
T02D2257:240b-6: de bas na tha dad bye brag bor cig de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2257:240b-7: tha dad kyi rtog pas bsgribs pa'i rmongs pa de
T02D2257:240b-8: dag la 'khor ba'i mya ngag gis bdungs pas sdug
T02D2257:240b-10: de kho na nyid kyi 'bras bu med par ma byed cig ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D2257:240b-11: da ni spyi dang mtshungs pa'i dpe brjod par bya ste /
T02D2257:240b-13: tshangs pa khyab 'jug mig gsum pa //
T02D2257:240b-16: rigs med dag la mchod gnas las kyi mtha' //
T02D2257:240b-17: rtog pa de nyid yang dag zad par 'gyur //
T02D2257:240b-19: gnyug ma'i de kho na nyid ma yin pa'i phyi
T02D2257:240b-20: rol pa dag gis kyang 'di dag dang nye bar
T02D2257:240b-21: mtshungs par gyur kyang don med par 'gyur ro //
T02D2257:240b-23: gang du zhes bya ba ni phyi rol ba rnams kyi rigs so //
T02D2257:240b-24: tshangs pa khyab 'jug mig gsum pa //
T02D2257:240b-25: zhes bya ba ni lha dbang phyug chen po'i rten la bya'o //
T02D2257:240b-26: de dag gi smra ba'i tshul ni lha chen bo
T02D2257:240b-27: dag la mchod pa phul nas de dag mnyes par
T02D2257:240b-28: gyur bas / 'jig rten ma lus thams cad zhi
T02D2257:240b-29: ba mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro zhes bya
T02D2257:240b-30: gyur bas / ba ste / 'bras bu rdzogs pa'i
T02D2257:240b-31: sangs rgyas kyi rigs med ba de dag la mchod
T02D2257:240b-32: gyur bas / ba ste / pa la / las
T02D2257:240b-33: kyi mtha'i rtog pa de nyid zad par 'gyur zhes
T02D2257:240b-34: te 'gyur ba ma yin te don med do ;
T02D2257:240b-35: / de bas na bdag dang gzhan du 'dzin pa
T02D2257:240b-36: thams cad kyang tha dad du rtogs pa'i phyir de
T02D2257:240b-38: de ni mi mthun pa de nyid dper bsgrub par bya ste /
T02D2257:240b-39: gang du zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ba gang gis so //
T02D2257:240b-40: tshangs pa zhes bya ba ni tha mal gyi shes
T02D2257:240b-41: pa ste de dag la rtogs pa'i skyon gyis ma
T02D2257:240b-42: gos pa'o // snang grags kyi chos thams cad la de'i ngo bos khyab ba'o //
T02D2257:240b-43: bla ma dam pa dag gis bstan pa de nyid
T02D2257:240b-44: la 'jug par nus pa na gsal ba dang mi
T02D2257:240b-45: rtog pa dang bde ba'i mig gsum dang ldan pa
T02D2257:241a-0: ste / de ltar rtog pa na 'jig rten gyi rnam par rtog pa thams cad ma @241a * //
T02D2257:241a-1: lus par zhi bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ni bla ma dam bas gdams pa'o //
T02D2257:241a-2: de dag la rigs med da ci yang ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2257:241a-3: de dag la snang grags kyi chos thams cad la mchod par phul te /
T02D2257:241a-4: gnyug ma'i ngo bo nyid la gnas na las kyi
T02D2257:241a-5: mtha'i rtog pa thams cad de nyid du yang dag
T02D2257:241a-7: da ni rtogs par dka' ba'i gdams ngag la rag las pa bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:241a-8: kye ho bu nyon mchod pa'i tshogs dang bya ba mang smra dang //
T02D2257:241a-9: yang dag gnas shes pa zhes zer ba ste //
T02D2257:241a-10: 'gro ba mchod cing 'don pa la sogs pas //
T02D2257:241a-11: de ni shes par nus pa ma yin no //
T02D2257:241a-13: dam pa rnams kyi gdams ngag gdams par bya zhing
T02D2257:241a-14: tha snyad tsam du don du gnyer bar mi bya
T02D2257:241a-15: ste / de dag la gdams pa'i don ni /
T02D2257:241a-16: bu zhes pa ni khams gsum pa rnams la bos
T02D2257:241a-17: nas yang dag pa'i don la gzhol ba la dgod
T02D2257:241a-19: mchod pa'i tshogs dang zhes bya ba ni bdun rnam
T02D2257:241a-20: par dag pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa la
T02D2257:241a-21: sogs pa'o // bya ba mang po smra dang zhes
T02D2257:241a-22: bya ba ni don chung ngu dang don med pa'i
T02D2257:241a-24: yang dag gnas zhes bya ba ni rmongs pa'i bsam gtan pa dag ste /
T02D2257:241a-25: 'gro ba tha snyad kyi brjod pa dag 'chad cing
T02D2257:241a-26: pha rol po 'don pa la sogs pas bla ma
T02D2257:241a-27: dam pa'i gdams ngag dang bral ba'i phyir /
T02D2257:241a-28: de kho na nyid kyi don de ni shes par nus pa ma yin no //
T02D2257:241a-29: de bas na yang dag pa'i don las ma yengs
T02D2257:241a-30: shing ji bzhin pa'i don de nyid la bsgom par
T02D2257:241a-31: bya'o // da ni snying po'i don de nyid du rtogs pa'i dka' ba bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:241a-32: kye ho bu nyon de nyid sna tshogs kyi //
T02D2257:241a-33: ro 'di bstan par brjod pa ma yin te //
T02D2257:241a-34: bde ba'i gnas mchog rtogs pa spangs pa ni //
T02D2257:241a-35: 'gro ba nye bar skye ba ji bzhin no //
T02D2257:241a-36: blo ni rnam 'gag yid ni rang zhi bas //
T02D2257:241a-37: gang du mngon pa'i nga rgyal 'chad pa ni //
T02D2257:241a-38: sgyu ma'i rang bzhin mchog tu rtog pa ste //
T02D2257:241a-39: de bas bsam gtan 'ching ba des ci bya //
T02D2257:241a-40: dngos por skyes ba mkha' ltar rab zhi na //
T02D2257:241b-0: dngos po spangs na phyi @241b nas ci zhig bya //
T02D2257:241b-1: de ring dpal ldan mgon pos bstan pa yis //
T02D2257:241b-2: dbye ba rnam spangs de la gnas par bya'o //
T02D2257:241b-4: brjod par dka' ba'i don de nyid la gdams pa'i phyir kye ho zhes bya'o //
T02D2257:241b-5: bu nyon zhes bya ba ni smos pa kho nar zad do //
T02D2257:241b-6: de nyid ces bya ba ni rang bzhin gnyug ma ji lta ba la bya'o //
T02D2257:241b-7: de nyid sna tshogs kyi ngo bor snang ste bde
T02D2257:241b-8: ba chen por gyur ba'i ro 'di cing yang grub
T02D2257:241b-9: pa med pa'i phyir rje btsun pa rnams kyis kyang
T02D2257:241b-10: brtan par brjod pa ma yin te /
T02D2257:241b-11: bde ba chen po rang bzhin rtog pa dang bral
T02D2257:241b-12: ba'i gnas ni tha mal gyi shes pa nyid do
T02D2257:241b-13: // de nyid goms shing mchog tu gyur pas ni //
T02D2257:241b-14: rtog pa ma lus pa thams cad spangs pa'o //
T02D2257:241b-15: de dag ni 'gro ba dag nye bar skye ba ji bzhin pa ste byis pa dang /
T02D2257:241b-16: gzhon nu dang lang tsho la bab pas stobs yongs
T02D2257:241b-17: su rdzogs par 'gyur ba bzhin du de nyid kyi
T02D2257:241b-18: don 'di dag kyang mthong ba dang myong ba dang
T02D2257:241b-19: rtogs pa dang mthar phyin pa las chos kyi sku'i
T02D2257:241b-20: stobs yongs su rdzogs nas sprul pa'i sku dang longs
T02D2257:241b-22: skyes bu dag gi rtogs pa la blo gtad de
T02D2257:241b-23: spros pa'i g-yeng ba ni rnam par 'gags nas yid
T02D2257:241b-24: ni mi rtog pa 'ba' zhig la rab tu zhi
T02D2257:241b-25: bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten pa'i gnas gang du gnas
T02D2257:241b-26: shing 'dug pa de dag tu bdag ni bsam gtan
T02D2257:241b-27: pa yin no zhes mngon pa'i nga rgyal 'chad pa
T02D2257:241b-28: de ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin snang yang med pa
T02D2257:241b-29: tsam mchog tu rtog pa ste /
T02D2257:241b-30: de dag la gnyis 'dzin gyi rnam pas zhen pa
T02D2257:241b-31: 'khor bar 'khor zhing sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig gi rgyu
T02D2257:241b-32: byed pa ste / de bas na bsam gtan gyi 'ching ba des ci zhig bya'o //
T02D2257:241b-33: de dag gi don ji ltar yin zhe na /
T02D2257:241b-34: dngos bor snang zhing skyes pa de dag thams cad
T02D2257:241b-35: sems nyid nam mkha'i ngo bo lta bu las ma
T02D2257:241b-37: de ltar ngo bo gcig pa de dag lhan cig
T02D2257:241b-38: skyes pa'i ye shes kyi rab tu zhi na dngos
T02D2257:241b-39: po thams cad bde ba chen po'i chos sku ste
T02D2257:241b-40: / de dag spangs nas gzhan zhig nas de bzhin
T02D2257:241b-41: nyid 'thob pa ma yin pa'i phyir dngos po'i rnam
T02D2257:242a-0: par 'khrul bar brtags nas phyi nas @242a * //
T02D2257:242a-1: de ma yin pa'i ye shes skye zhes pa ni
T02D2257:242a-2: don med de log pa yin pa'i phyir des ci
T02D2257:242a-3: zhig bya'o // bdag nyid skal pa dang ldan pa'i dus de ring yin pa'i tshe /
T02D2257:242a-4: dpal ldan sangs rgyas dang bla ma dam pa'i mgon
T02D2257:242a-5: pos bstan pa'i don yid la byar med pa de
T02D2257:242a-6: dag la nges pa'i sgo nas nyams su myong na
T02D2257:242a-7: / dbyer med pa ni rnam pa thams cad ro
T02D2257:242a-8: gcig ste shugs kyis sbangs pa'i don de la gnas
T02D2257:242a-9: par byos shig ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D2257:242a-10: da ni rnal 'byor gyi spyod lam bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:242a-11: mthong dang thos dang reg dang dran pa dang //
T02D2257:242a-12: zas snom pa dang mtshan na gnas pa dang //
T02D2257:242a-13: cal col gtam dang lan smrar gyur pa la //
T02D2257:242a-14: sems so zhes ni gcig gi ngo bo dang //
T02D2257:242a-15: rnal ma de bzhin rnam pa la mi 'da' //
T02D2257:242a-16: zhes bya ba'i don ni rnal 'byor pa dag gis
T02D2257:242a-17: 'dod pa'i yon tan mi dgag cing longs spyod par
T02D2257:242a-18: bya ste / de dag kyang ma zhen pa'i tshul
T02D2257:242a-19: du chos kyi sku gnyug ma'i rang bzhin du shes
T02D2257:242a-20: bya ste / par bya'o // da yang mig dang
T02D2257:242a-21: rna ba dang sna dang lus dang yid dang lce
T02D2257:242a-22: la sogs pas mthong ba dang thos pa dang reg
T02D2257:242a-23: pa dang dran pa dang zos pa dang snom pa
T02D2257:242a-24: thams cad chos kyi sku bde ba chen po'i rang
T02D2257:242a-25: bzhin dang de bzhin nyid kyi sgra dang /
T02D2257:242a-26: ci yang ma yin pa'i reg bya dang /
T02D2257:242a-27: dbyer mi phyed pa'i dran pa dang /
T02D2257:242a-28: gnyis su med pa'i ro dang /
T02D2257:242a-29: tha mal gyi shes pa'i dri dang /
T02D2257:242a-30: de dag thams cad kyang sems nyid du longs spyad par bya'o //
T02D2257:242a-31: mchan na gnas pa dang zhes bya ba ni rnam
T02D2257:242a-32: par rtog pa ste phyi nang gi byung tshor thams
T02D2257:242a-33: cad la dran pa de bzhin nyid du shes par
T02D2257:242a-34: bya'o // gzhan dag chags pa dang zhe sdang dang
T02D2257:242a-35: btang snyoms kyi cal col gyi gtam dang bya ba
T02D2257:242a-36: dag la yang de bzhin nyid du shes par bya'o
T02D2257:242a-37: bya'o // // bdag nyid kyi lan smra bar gyur
T02D2257:242a-38: pa la yang sems so zhes ni gcig gi ngo
T02D2257:242a-39: bo dang rnal ma'i de bzhin nyid kyi rnam pa
T02D2257:242a-41: da ni bla mas bstan pa'i don la 'bad par bya ba bshad de /
T02D2257:242a-42: gang zhig bla ma'i man ngag bdud rtsi'i chu //
T02D2257:242a-43: gdung sel bsil ldan ngoms par mi 'thung na //
T02D2257:242a-44: de ni bstan bcos don med mya ngan gyi //
T02D2257:242b-0: thang la skom @242b pas gdungs te shi bar zad //
T02D2257:242b-2: skal ba dang ldan pa'i gang zag skyes pa dang
T02D2257:242b-3: bud med kyi ngo bor snang ba gang zhig gis
T02D2257:242b-4: 'bras bu khyad par can thob bar byed pa'i bla
T02D2257:242b-5: ma dam pa dag gis don nye bar 'dzin pa
T02D2257:242b-6: ste man aa sa ra zhes bya'o //
T02D2257:242b-7: de dag gi don ni shes rab dang snying rje'i
T02D2257:242b-8: bdag nyid 'brel pa ste gnyis med kyi ye shes
T02D2257:242b-10: de dag ni dam pa'i dag las shes par bya ba nyid do //
T02D2257:242b-11: de dag gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs sangs rgyas kyi
T02D2257:242b-12: ye shes bdud rtsi ma rungs par byed pa'i rtsir
T02D2257:242b-13: gyur pa ste dper na chu lta bu'o //
T02D2257:242b-14: de dag gis ni nyon mongs pa'i than pas gdungs
T02D2257:242b-15: pa'i gdung ba sel cing bde ba chen po'i bsil
T02D2257:242b-16: dang / ma bcos pa dang ba'i don gnyis su
T02D2257:242b-17: med pa'i tshul gyis ngoms par mi 'thung ba de
T02D2257:242b-18: ni 'jig rten pa'i bstan bcos don med pa sdug
T02D2257:242b-19: bsngal gyi khang bu de dag la gnas pas 'khor
T02D2257:242b-20: ba'i mya ngam gyi thang la bde ba chen po'i
T02D2257:242b-21: skom gyis shin tu gdungs te /
T02D2257:242b-22: rnam par rtog pa la sogs pas bskyed pa'i gnas su de kho na nyid shes par zad do //
T02D2257:242b-23: da ni don de kho na nyid bstan par bya ba'i thabs bshad par bya ste /
T02D2257:242b-24: bla mas bstan ba mi shes na //
T02D2257:242b-25: slob mas go bar yod min te //
T02D2257:242b-26: lhan cig skyes pa bdud rtsi'i ro //
T02D2257:242b-27: gang zhig ji ltar bsten par bya //
T02D2257:242b-28: zhes bya ba'i don ni bla ma dam pas bstan pa'i thabs ni tha mal gyi shes pa ste /
T02D2257:242b-29: mi shes pa bstan pas na mchog go //
T02D2257:242b-30: slob mas rtogs pa'i bdag nyid kyang go bar bya ba yod pa ma yin te /
T02D2257:242b-31: min pa nyid ni rtog pas bdag nyid yongs su dag pa'o //
T02D2257:242b-32: de nyid yin nam zhe na /
T02D2257:242b-33: yin du med pa yin te /
T02D2257:242b-34: lhan cig skyes pa'i bdud rtsi'i ro ni sems nyid
T02D2257:242b-35: ma bcos pa rnal ma ste gang zhig yin min
T02D2257:242b-36: no // min pa'i don de nyid ji ltar bstan par bya ste bstan pa med do //
T02D2257:242b-37: dam pa dag gi gdams ngag las 'byung ba ni
T02D2257:242b-38: bla ma dag gis tha snyad dpag tu med pa
T02D2257:242b-39: brjod cing de kho na nyid go bar ma nus
T02D2257:242b-40: na bstan par mi shes pa nyid do //
T02D2257:243a-0: de lta bu'i zug rdus slob mas go ba @243a * //
T02D2257:243a-1: dang rtogs pa yod pa yin to //
T02D2257:243a-2: de bas na lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D2257:243a-3: bdud rtsi'i ro 'di dag ni gang zhig ji ltar
T02D2257:243a-5: des par byas shing tha mal gyi nyid do //
T02D2257:243a-6: da ni de ltar ma rtogs pa dag gi skyon bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:243a-7: gal rme tshad mar 'dzin pa'i dbang gis su //
T02D2257:243a-8: blun pos bye brag rnam par 'byed pa ste //
T02D2257:243a-9: de tshe de ni gdol pa'i khyim du rol //
T02D2257:243a-10: 'on kyang de la dri mas mi gos so //
T02D2257:243a-12: gal te'am brgya lam na rtog ge pa'i gang zag
T02D2257:243a-13: dag gis rjes dpag tshad mar 'dzin pa'i dbang gis
T02D2257:243a-14: su rtog pa de dag gis gnyis med kyi ye
T02D2257:243a-15: shes dkrug pa'i phyir blun pa ste /
T02D2257:243a-16: de'i tshe de ni gdol ba'i de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2257:243a-17: bdag gzhan gyis bye brag rnam par 'byed pa ste /
T02D2257:243a-18: dper na bram zes gang gi tshe gtsang ma bcas
T02D2257:243a-19: pa de'i tshe gdol pa'i khyim du rol pas skyon
T02D2257:243a-21: rnal 'byor pa brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa la zhugs
T02D2257:243a-22: pa dag gam gdol pa dag gis de nyid kyi
T02D2257:243a-23: khyim du 'ongs kyang de la skyon gyi dri mas
T02D2257:243a-25: da ni nan tan dang bcas pa the tshom med par bsgrub pa bstan pa ni /
T02D2257:243a-26: gang tshe slong pa srang kha'i kham phor gyis //
T02D2257:243a-27: bdag nyid rgyal po slar yang ci byar yod //
T02D2257:243a-28: mya ngan 'das pa la gnas srid par mdzes //
T02D2257:243a-29: nad gzhan dag la sman gzhan gtang mi bya //
T02D2257:243a-30: bsam dang bsam bya rab tu spang nas su //
T02D2257:243a-31: ji lta bu yi tshul la gnas byas shing //
T02D2257:243a-32: bla ma'i lung la bsgrims te gus 'bad na //
T02D2257:243a-33: lhan cig skyes pa 'byung bar the tshom med //
T02D2257:243a-34: ces bya ba'i don ni gang gi tshe /
T02D2257:243a-35: grong khyer pa dag gi rigs ngan gyi spyod pas
T02D2257:243a-36: rgyu ba na slong ba'i zas kyi bya ba byed
T02D2257:243a-37: pa'i srang khar bor ba'i kham phor gyi dum bu
T02D2257:243a-38: dgos pa yin gyi de dag gis bdag nyid rgyal
T02D2257:243a-39: por gyur pa'i mthus bsod nams kyi bdag nyid yongs
T02D2257:243a-40: su dag pa dag rnyed pa'i phyir zas kyi bya
T02D2257:243a-41: ba byas zin pa de bor ba'i kham phor gyi
T02D2257:243a-42: dum bu de dag gis bdag nyid rgyal po la
T02D2257:243a-43: slar ci yang byar yod de med do //
T02D2257:243a-44: de bzhin du tha snyad kyi rtog pa'i bdag nyid
T02D2257:243a-45: kyis brtags pa'i las dang bya ba dag gis bde
T02D2257:243b-0: ba chen po'i ro dang bral @243b ba'i phyir rmongs
T02D2257:243b-1: pa'i spyod pas rgyu ba dag la 'khor ba'i bde
T02D2257:243b-2: ba cung zad tsam bskyed pas dgos pa ste /
T02D2257:243b-3: bdag nyid re ba dang dogs pa dang bral ba'i
T02D2257:243b-4: don de kho na nyid rtogs nas tha snyad kyi
T02D2257:243b-5: rnam par gzhag pa ni mi dgos te /
T02D2257:243b-6: de ni zug rngu yin pa'i phyir de ltar rtog
T02D2257:243b-7: pa de dag ni mya ngan las 'das pa la
T02D2257:243b-8: gnas pa ste / de nyid gzhan du ma brjod cing srid par mdzes pa'o //
T02D2257:243b-9: de la gzhan du brjod par ni mi bya ste /
T02D2257:243b-10: dper na nad gzhan te tsha ba lta bu dag
T02D2257:243b-11: la sman gzhan te tsha ba btang bar mi bya
T02D2257:243b-12: ste rnam par rtog pa'i nad dag la tha dad
T02D2257:243b-13: kyi rtog pa gzhag par mi bya ba nyid do
T02D2257:243b-14: // de dag ji ltar gzhag par bya zhe na /
T02D2257:243b-15: bsam pa dang bsam bya'i gnyis 'dzin gyi rtog pa rab tu spang nas su /
T02D2257:243b-16: sems rnal ma ji lta bu'i tshul du gnas par
T02D2257:243b-17: bya zhing sems ma bcos pa bla ma'i mchog dang
T02D2257:243b-18: snang srid bde ba chen po'i lus la dran pas
T02D2257:243b-19: bsgrims te spyod lam rnam pa bzhi'i tshul la ma
T02D2257:243b-20: g-yengs pa'i rnam pas gus par 'bad na lhan cig
T02D2257:243b-21: skyes pa'i ye shes 'byung bar the tshom med do
T02D2257:243b-22: // da ni ji ltar mtshon par mi nus pa bstan te /
T02D2257:243b-23: kha dog yon tan yi ge dpe spangs nas //
T02D2257:243b-24: smra ru mi btub de ni gang gis mtshon //
T02D2257:243b-25: gzhon nu'i bde ba snying la zhen pa bzhin ;
T02D2257:243b-26: / dbang phyug bde ba rang bzhin med pa ste //
T02D2257:243b-27: de ni su la bstan par bya nus sam //
T02D2257:243b-28: zhes bya ba'i don ni tha mal gyi shes pa
T02D2257:243b-29: dngos kyi mtshan nyid de dag kha dog med de
T02D2257:243b-31: yon tan med de re ba dang bral ba'o //
T02D2257:243b-32: yi ge med de brjod par bral ba'o //
T02D2257:243b-33: dpes mtshon par mi nus te bsgrub bya dang bral ba'o //
T02D2257:243b-34: de dag thams cad shugs kyis spangs nas don chen po de dag smrar mi btub pa ste /
T02D2257:243b-35: de ni gang gis kyang mtshon par nus pa ma yin no //
T02D2257:243b-36: nyams su myong du yang yod pa ma yin nam zhe na /
T02D2257:243b-37: bu mo lo bcu drug lon pa'i bde ba snying
T02D2257:243b-38: la zhen pa bzhin du myong du yod kyang brjod
T02D2257:243b-39: pa'i tha snyad kyis gtan la dbab pa yod pa
T02D2257:243b-40: ma yin no // de ltar rtogs pa de ni
T02D2257:243b-41: sa bcu'i dbang phyug dam pa ste de'i ngo bo
T02D2257:243b-43: de'i phyir de ni su la yang bstan par bya bar nus sam ste mi nus pa nyid do //
T02D2257:244a-1: brtags pa'i brtag bya thim zhing de dang bral ba bstan pa ste /
T02D2257:244a-2: dngos dang dngos med yongs su bcad pa gang //
T02D2257:244a-3: des ni 'gro ba ma lus rab thim 'gyur //
T02D2257:244a-4: gang tshe yid ni gcod pa med pa yi //
T02D2257:244a-5: mi g-yo brtan pa dran zhing gnas pa der //
T02D2257:244a-6: de ni 'khor ba'i dngos po rang grol 'gyur //
T02D2257:244a-7: gang tshe bdag gzhan yongs su shes med na //
T02D2257:244a-8: de tshe bla ma'i lus su 'grub pa nyid //
T02D2257:244a-9: de ltar brtan pa nyid la nges rtogs par //
T02D2257:244a-10: ma 'khrul pa yi ngo bor rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D2257:244a-11: rang gi rang la rig par shes par bya //
T02D2257:244a-12: dngos dang zhes bya ba'i don ni bems po'i rnam pa dag go //
T02D2257:244a-13: dngos po med pa ni rig pa'i rnam pa'o //
T02D2257:244a-14: bems rig rnam pa gnyis yongs su bcad pa gang yin pa de nyid do //
T02D2257:244a-15: de ltar rtogs pa'i ngang der ni rnam par rtog
T02D2257:244a-16: ba las 'byung ba'i 'gro ba ma lus pa rab
T02D2257:244a-18: gang gi tshe rnal 'byor pa'i yid ni bcos pa
T02D2257:244a-19: med pa'i bdag nyid yongs su rdzogs pa med pa
T02D2257:244a-20: de'i tshe phyi nang gi rnam par rtog pas mi
T02D2257:244a-21: g-yo ba dang / de kho na nyid klong du
T02D2257:244a-22: gyur pa bstan pa dang spyod lam rnam pa bzhi
T02D2257:244a-23: khyad med pa rang bzhin gyis gnas pa der de'i
T02D2257:244a-24: tshe 'khor ba'i dngos po thams cad rang grol bar
T02D2257:244a-25: g-yo ba dang / 'gyur ro // de ltar nyams
T02D2257:244a-26: su myong ba'i rtags ni bdag dang gzhan du rtog
T02D2257:244a-27: pa yongs su shes pa med pa ste /
T02D2257:244a-28: de ltar rtogs na bla ma chen po'i lus su grub pa nyid do //
T02D2257:244a-29: de ltar bla ma dam pas bstan par nges par
T02D2257:244a-30: rtogs nas ma 'khrul pa'i ngo bor mngon par rdzogs
T02D2257:244a-31: par sangs rgyas pa nyid do //
T02D2257:244a-32: de yang gzhan la rag las pas go ba ma yin te /
T02D2257:244a-33: rang gi sems nyid kyis rang gi sems nyid la
T02D2257:244a-34: bstan la legs par shes par bya ba nyid do
T02D2257:244a-35: // da ni ji ltar yang ma yin pa bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:244a-36: rdul med rdul bral ma yin sems kyang min //
T02D2257:244a-37: dngos po de dag gdod nas zhen pa med //
T02D2257:244a-38: mda' bsnun gyis smras de tsam zhig tu zad //
T02D2257:244a-39: kye ma ma lus dri med don dam shes par byos //
T02D2257:244a-40: zhes bya ba'i don ni de kho na nyid gnyug
T02D2257:244a-41: ma'i ngo bo la rnam par rtog pa'i rdul med
T02D2257:244a-42: do // rdul de dang bral ba ma yin no //
T02D2257:244a-43: snang ba dang sems kyang ma yin no //
T02D2257:244b-1: 'di dag ni gdod ma nas zhen pa med pa nyid do //
T02D2257:244b-2: de ni ci yang ma yin pa'i don nyams su myong bar nus so //
T02D2257:244b-3: bdag ni rang bzhin gyi mtshon cha can te mda' bsnun gyis smras de tsam zhig tu zad /
T02D2257:244b-4: de bas shin tu ngo mtshar ba'i don de kye ho zhes bya'o //
T02D2257:244b-5: de dag kyang ci zhe na /
T02D2257:244b-6: snang ba ma lus pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'o //
T02D2257:244b-7: sems la ni dri ma med de de nyid do //
T02D2257:244b-8: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes ni don dam pa
T02D2257:244b-9: ste de dag shes par byos shig / da ni
T02D2257:244b-10: brtags pas mi rtog pa bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:244b-11: khyim na yod pa phyi ru song nas tshol //
T02D2257:244b-12: khyim bdag mthong nas khyim tshes dag la 'dri //
T02D2257:244b-13: mda' snun gyis smras bdag gis shes par byos //
T02D2257:244b-14: blun po'i bsam gtan bsam bya brjod pa min //
T02D2257:244b-15: gal te bla mas bstan cing rtog pas brtags //
T02D2257:244b-16: bden pa thams cad shes par byas gyur kyang //
T02D2257:244b-17: de dag gis ni yongs su brtags pa na //
T02D2257:244b-18: de ma rtogs pas thar pa thob bam ci //
T02D2257:244b-19: yul nas bgrod cing gdung bas nyes byas kyang //
T02D2257:244b-20: lhan cig skyes pa mi rnyed sdig par 'dzin //
T02D2257:244b-21: zhes bya ba'i don ni snang srid thams cad kyi khyim gyi bdag po ni gnyug ma'i sems te //
T02D2257:244b-22: des ni rang gi khyim na yod pa'o //
T02D2257:244b-23: de ltar na rtogs pa'i phyir phyi rol du song nas tshol lo //
T02D2257:244b-24: de ston par byed pa'i bla ma dam pa ni khyim bdag ste //
T02D2257:244b-25: des bstan pa'i zhal gyi bdud rtsi de dag mthong
T02D2257:244b-26: zhing myong nas 'bras bu dang don chen por 'gyur
T02D2257:244b-27: ba bor te / khyim tshes pa lta bu'i phyi
T02D2257:244b-28: rol pa dang de dang mtshungs pa dag la 'dri'o
T02D2257:244b-29: ba bor te / // mda' bsnun gyis smras ba ni gzhan la drir yod ba ma yin te /
T02D2257:244b-30: bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid las shes par byos shig
T02D2257:244b-31: /'di dag ni gti mug chen po yin pa'i blun
T02D2257:244b-33: bsam bya dang brjod bya min pas don de ston
T02D2257:244b-34: par byed pa'i tshig gis gtan la mi 'bebs shing
T02D2257:244b-35: ma 'brel ba'i phyir mi shes so //
T02D2257:244b-36: gal te blo dman pa dag gis bla mas bstan
T02D2257:244b-37: du yod pa bstan cing slob pa pos brtag tu
T02D2257:244b-38: yod pa'i rtog pas brtags pa'i gtan tshigs kyi sgo
T02D2257:244b-39: nas rnam par rtog pa'i bsam gtan la /
T02D2257:245a-1: cad shes par byas gyur kyang de ni bdag dang gzhan du 'dzin pa dang ma bral ba ste /
T02D2257:245a-2: de dag gis yongs su brtags pas de ma rtogs so //
T02D2257:245a-3: ma rtogs pa'i don ni de nyid rtogs pa chen po ste /
T02D2257:245a-4: de dag yongs su dor nas gzhan zhig rtogs pa'i
T02D2257:245a-5: thar pa bde ba 'thob pa'am ci ste mi 'thob
T02D2257:245a-6: po // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2257:245a-7: rnam par rtog pas yul nas rtogs pa de nyid
T02D2257:245a-8: du 'khor te spang bya dang spong byed kyi sgo
T02D2257:245a-9: nas bgrod cing tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs kyi sgo
T02D2257:245a-10: nas gdung pas nye bar byas kyang lhan cig skyes
T02D2257:245a-11: pa'i ye shes mi rnyed de ;
T02D2257:245a-13: rnam rtog gis sdig par 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2257:245a-14: da ni dpe khyad par can gyis bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:245a-15: yul rnams bsten pas yul gyis mi gos te //
T02D2257:245a-16: autpala blangs kyang chu yis mi 'chags bzhin //
T02D2257:245a-17: 'di ltar rtsa ba rlung gis skyabs su 'gro / rlung rnams de nyid yin pas zhi bar nus //
T02D2257:245a-18: zhi ba med de de nyid rtogs pas 'grub //
T02D2257:245a-19: rtogs dus grub pa med de tshig tu zad //
T02D2257:245a-20: dug gi sngags can dug gis ga la tshugs //
T02D2257:245a-21: lha la mchod pa khri phrag byin byas kyang //
T02D2257:245a-22: brtags te 'bras bu gzhan du 'grub 'dod pas //
T02D2257:245a-23: de nyid bdag la 'bras bu de med de //
T02D2257:245a-24: bdag nyid 'ching 'gyur des ni ci zhig bya //
T02D2257:245a-25: de la goms pas grol bar mi 'gyur zhing //
T02D2257:245a-27: 'dir goms ma rtogs ma lus rgal ma yin //
T02D2257:245a-28: mig ni mi 'dzums sems ni 'gags pa dang ;
T02D2257:245a-29: / rnam shes rlung 'gog pa ni bla mas rtogs //
T02D2257:245a-31: dper na 'jig rten pa dag gi shes pa ni chags sdang la mngon par zhen pa ste /
T02D2257:245a-32: dbang po rnam pa lnga yul rnams la brten cing bltas pas yul gyis gos par 'gyur zhing /
T02D2257:245a-33: khyad par du zhen cing chags pas mi gos te
T02D2257:245a-34: mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba bzhin du snang srid thams
T02D2257:245a-35: cad bde ba chen po'i ros khyab pa'i phyir /
T02D2257:245a-36: de dag la tha mal gyi shes pas bltas shing
T02D2257:245a-37: brtags na khros par mi 'gyur te shin tu spro
T02D2257:245b-0: ba'o // de dag 'khor ba la chags pa'i skyon du @245b mi 'gyur ram zhe na /
T02D2257:245b-1: dper na autpala chu'i nang nas blangs kyang chu'i nyes
T02D2257:245b-2: pas mi chags pa bzhin du de nyid kyang de'i
T02D2257:245b-4: rmongs pa dag gis rtsa byang chub kyi sems 'di
T02D2257:245b-5: dag rtogs pa'i rlung ges bcings te de dag gis
T02D2257:245b-7: de ni ma yin te 'di dag gi tshul ni
T02D2257:245b-8: rtog pa dang rlung rnams kyis tha mal gyi shes
T02D2257:245b-9: pa de nyid kyi ngo bo yin pas de la
T02D2257:245b-10: gnas na ngang gis zhi bar nus so //
T02D2257:245b-11: zhi bar bya ba ni 'di skyon dang bcas pa'o zhe na /
T02D2257:245b-12: zhi ba ni med de de kho na nyid rtogs pas 'grub pa'o //
T02D2257:245b-13: de dag kyang grub tu yod pa ma yin te /
T02D2257:245b-14: gnyis med kyi ye shes rtogs pa'i dus nyid la smras pa ste /
T02D2257:245b-15: dngos po rang gi mtshan nyid la grub pa med
T02D2257:245b-16: de slob pa po'i blo la brjod par bya ba'i
T02D2257:245b-17: phyir tshig tsam du zad do //
T02D2257:245b-18: de dag la rtsod de 'khor ba ni zas dug can gyi rnam pa lta bu ste /
T02D2257:245b-19: gnod pa 'ba' zhig byed pa'i phyir rtogs pa tsam gyis grub pa ni mi rigs so //
T02D2257:245b-20: de lta yin na ni sems can thams cad kyis
T02D2257:245b-21: kyang skad cig tsam rtogs su rung phyir sangs rgyas
T02D2257:245b-22: par thal lo // de ltar ma yin na ni
T02D2257:245b-23: chos kyi sku gnyug ma'i sems can gyi rgyud la
T02D2257:245b-25: med na ni ma thob par byed pa yin pa'i
T02D2257:245b-26: phyir 'khor ba yongs su dor ba las mya ngan
T02D2257:245b-27: las 'das pa thob par rigs so //
T02D2257:245b-28: de lta yin na ni sems can thams cad dka' thub dang dka' spyad kyis 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2257:245b-29: de dag ni ngo bo gcig pa ni mi rigs te mun pa dang snang ba bzhin no //
T02D2257:245b-30: de bas na 'di dag skyon dang bcas par 'gyur ro zhe na ma yin te /
