T02D2257:245b-31: dper na dug gis sems can 'chi bar gyur kyang
T02D2257:245b-32: dug gi sngags can de dag dug gis gal tshugs
T02D2257:245b-33: te de de nyid sman du 'gyur ro //
T02D2257:245b-34: de bas na ngo bo gcig pa la 'gal ba med de /
T02D2257:245b-35: dug logs su song ba 'am sman gzhan nas byung ba med de /
T02D2257:245b-36: de nyid de'i ngo bor gyur pa bzhin rnam par
T02D2257:245b-37: rtog pa logs su dor zhing bde ba chen po
T02D2257:245b-38: gzhan nas thob pa ma yin te /
T02D2257:246a-0: bla ma dam pa'i gdams ngag gis tha mal gyi shes pa nyams bsu myong @246a * //
T02D2257:246a-1: bas de nyid de'i ngo bor gyur te /
T02D2257:246a-2: de bas sems can thams cad kyi rgyud las ye
T02D2257:246a-3: shes de kho na nyid gnas te de dag gi
T02D2257:246a-4: mthus skad cig ma nyams su myong srid kyang ji
T02D2257:246a-5: bzhin pa'i ma myong bas grol bar mi nus pa
T02D2257:246a-6: dag go // de nyid nyams su myong bas na
T02D2257:246a-7: skad cig ma de nyid la sangs rgyas par nus
T02D2257:246a-8: dag go // so // de ltar ma rtogs pa
T02D2257:246a-9: rnams kyis brtags pa'i lha la mchod pa lo khri
T02D2257:246a-11: sems can thams cad la sbyin par byas kyang rnam
T02D2257:246a-12: par rtog pas brtags te 'bras bu logs su 'grub
T02D2257:246a-14: / de nyid dang bral te brtags pa'i bdag la
T02D2257:246a-15: mngon par zhen pas chos kyi sku'i 'bras bu de
T02D2257:246a-17: de bas na gnyis 'dzin dang bral ba de kho na nyid rtogs pa ste /
T02D2257:246a-18: gnyis 'dzin dang bcas pa ni bdag nyid 'ching bar 'gyur ba'i phyir de yis ci zhig bya'o //
T02D2257:246a-19: de bas na de la goms pas grol bar yang mi 'gyur zhing /
T02D2257:246a-20: de 'dra ba'i spyod lam 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'di 'dra bar chad pa med do //
T02D2257:246a-21: 'di la 'dis 'di nyid du 'dir goms par byas
T02D2257:246a-22: pas mi rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'khor ba
T02D2257:246a-23: pa ma rtogs pa'i bdag nyid ma lus brgal dka'
T02D2257:246a-24: ba 'di dag brgal bar 'gyur ba ma yin no
T02D2257:246a-25: // ji ltar spyad pas 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2257:246a-26: mig ni mi 'dzums te cir snang phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid dang /
T02D2257:246a-27: tha mal gyi shes pa nyams su myong bas sems
T02D2257:246a-28: ni ngang gis 'phags pa dang phyi nang gi byung
T02D2257:246a-30: skad cig ma de nyid la rnam par shes pa'i
T02D2257:246a-31: rtags rlung gi bdag nyid kyis 'gog pa tsam byed
T02D2257:246a-32: pa'i bla mas bstan pa'i bla ma chen po'i ngag
T02D2257:246a-33: las rtogs so // de ni 'du shes bcings pas mi grol bar 'gyur bar bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:246a-34: gang tshe rlung rgyu ba de mi g-yo ste //
T02D2257:246a-35: gang gi tshe na 'ching bar ci byar yod //
T02D2257:246a-36: ces bya ba'i don ni dus gang gi tshe bla
T02D2257:246a-37: ma dam pa de nyid dang bral ba'i tshe rnam
T02D2257:246a-39: steng 'og gi rlung rgyu ba bkag ste /
T02D2257:246a-40: de rtog pa la mi g-yo ste /
T02D2257:246a-41: mi rtog 'ba' zhig la gnas pa'i phyir bsgom bya
T02D2257:246b-0: dang sgom byed du rtog cing thabs dang @246b 'bras
T02D2257:246b-1: bu thob par 'dod pa gang gi tshe na 'ching
T02D2257:246b-2: bar 'gyur te de dag gi tshe ci byar yod
T02D2257:246b-3: do // da ni de nyid du shes pas grol bar 'gyur ba bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:246b-4: ji srid dbang po yul la lhung ba dang //
T02D2257:246b-5: de srid rang nyid las ni rab tu rgyas //
T02D2257:246b-6: khyed cag ci byed da lta sems la ltos //
T02D2257:246b-7: gar 'gro sems dang kye'o dpa' bo rnams //
T02D2257:246b-8: de ni shin tu dga' ba'i dgongs pas bzhugs //
T02D2257:246b-9: gang zhig gang na gnas pa'i mi rnams ni //
T02D2257:246b-10: de srid rang nyid de yis ma mthong ste //
T02D2257:246b-11: mkhas pa thams cad bstan bcos 'chad pa yis //
T02D2257:246b-12: lus la sangs rgyas yod pa ma rtogs so //
T02D2257:246b-13: zhes bya ba'i don ni rnal 'byor pa dag gis
T02D2257:246b-14: ji srid dbang po'i yul la lhung zhing zhen ba
T02D2257:246b-15: na de srid du snang ba la sogs pa de
T02D2257:246b-16: thams cad rang bzhin gyi sems nyid las ni rab
T02D2257:246b-17: tu rgyas par shes par bya'o //
T02D2257:246b-18: de ltar snang grags thams cad sems gnyug ma'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir /
T02D2257:246b-19: khyed cag gis sems rang bzhin gyis gnas pa de dag de lta ci byed de mi byed do //
T02D2257:246b-20: byed na sems la ltos shig dang ngo //
T02D2257:246b-21: de dag gar 'gro sems dang steng 'grongs med do //
T02D2257:246b-23: de nyid kyi ro yin pa'i phyir /
T02D2257:246b-24: de bas kye ho rnal 'byor pa'i dbang po rnams
T02D2257:246b-25: rang bzhin gyis sems dag pa de ni shin tu
T02D2257:246b-26: dga' ba'i dgongs pas de nyid la zhugs par bya'o
T02D2257:246b-27: // skyes pa dang bud med gang zhig rnam par
T02D2257:246b-28: rtog pa'i gnas pa'i mi rnams ni de kho na
T02D2257:246b-29: nyid rang la gnas pa de ma mthong ste /
T02D2257:246b-30: de thams cad ni rmongs pa nyid du zad do //
T02D2257:246b-31: de bas na tshig dang tha snyad la mkhas pa
T02D2257:246b-32: thams cad bstan pa'i chos kyi bye brag ma lus
T02D2257:246b-33: pa 'chad pa'i rang bzhin gyi lus la chos kyi
T02D2257:246b-34: sku'i sangs rgyas yod pa ma rtogs so //
T02D2257:246b-35: da ni dal ba dang bde ba'i dpe'i sgo nas bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:246b-36: glang chen lo bas nas sems tshags tshud pa ni //
T02D2257:246b-37: de ni 'gro 'ong bcang nas ngal ba ste //
T02D2257:246b-38: de ni 'di ltar rtogs so chos ci dgos //
T02D2257:246b-39: zhes bya ba'i don ni lum pa'i tshal na khyim
T02D2257:246b-40: bdag aag sho da na la glang po che pa
T02D2257:246b-41: tro ta zhes bya ba shin tu smyo ba zhig
T02D2257:247a-0: yod pa la / de dag btul ba na las dang bya @247a * //
T02D2257:247a-1: bya ba la dge ba dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2257:247a-2: zhi bar 'dod pa las de ltar ma gyur te /
T02D2257:247a-3: de dag 'ong ba dang 'gro ba dang gnas pa dang /
T02D2257:247a-4: rtsva za ba dang chu 'thung ba dang /
T02D2257:247a-5: 'tsho gnyer byed pa'i dus su shin tu sdug bsngal bar 'gyur te /
T02D2257:247a-6: 'tsho bas stobs zil gyis mnan par ma nus shing
T02D2257:247a-7: bdag nyid shin tu ngal par gyur te 'tsho ba
T02D2257:247a-8: dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs par gyur to
T02D2257:247a-9: // de nas batsha'i bu ga ya mgo zhes bya bas smras pa /
T02D2257:247a-10: kye stobs chen glang po 'di dag btsongs na bde //
T02D2257:247a-11: bya ba'i las dang ngal ba rnams dang bral //
T02D2257:247a-12: 'chi bar byed pa'i rkyen gyis gnod pa min //
T02D2257:247a-13: dge ldan zhi bar 'dod pas de mi thul //
T02D2257:247a-14: de ltar ma gyur ku sha'i rtsa nyid la //
T02D2257:247a-15: re ba ma skyes yangs pa nyid du thong //
T02D2257:247a-16: zhes nas glang po che de tshong 'dus su btsongs so //
T02D2257:247a-17: de lob par gyur nas sems tshags su tshud pa
T02D2257:247a-18: na de ni 'gro bar yang mi byed 'ong bar
T02D2257:247a-19: yang mi byed ngal zhing dub par yang mi 'gyur
T02D2257:247a-20: 'tsho ba dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal rnam par bcad
T02D2257:247a-21: nas ngang gis dal ba ste bde ba dang ldan
T02D2257:247a-23: kye kye bdag ni shan tu bde dang ldan //
T02D2257:247a-24: bde 'dod glang chen dag gis sdug bsngal 'gyur //
T02D2257:247a-25: glang chen btang bas dal pa'i mchog dang ldan //
T02D2257:247a-26: kun kyang bya ba btang na bde bar 'gyur //
T02D2257:247a-27: zhes bya ba ni khyim bdag ma ga ta na
T02D2257:247a-28: zhes bya bas thos nas rang gis rang nyid la
T02D2257:247a-29: bsam pas thos nas bdag gi sems ni glang po
T02D2257:247a-30: che smyon pa lta bu ste /
T02D2257:247a-31: 'di dag btul ba las dge ba dang ldan par
T02D2257:247a-32: yang ma gyur te thul pa yang ma yin pa'i
T02D2257:247a-33: phyir / btsong bar bya ba'i yul ni bdag gis
T02D2257:247a-34: mi rnyed de 'di ni gar dgar gtang bar bya'o
T02D2257:247a-35: zhes lhod de bsdad pas sems de dag 'gro bar
T02D2257:247a-36: phyir / yang mi byed / 'ong ba yang mi byed /
T02D2257:247a-38: 'dzin rtog byung tshor gyi rnam pa rang gis 'gags
T02D2257:247a-39: te bde ba chen po ci yang ma yin pa'i
T02D2257:247a-40: rang bzhin shin tu rtogs so //
T02D2257:247a-41: de nas de dag gis dur khrod chen po keng ri ya na zhes bya bar phyin te /
T02D2257:247b-0: rnal 'byor pa'i @247b tshogs la smras pa /
T02D2257:247b-1: dpa' bo rnams kyis gdams ngag stsal du gsol //
T02D2257:247b-2: bdag la byin gyis brlabs shing gnang bar mdzod //
T02D2257:247b-3: khyed ni chos sku'i bdag nyid stobs dang ldan //
T02D2257:247b-4: rmongs pa dag gi sgrib pa dag par mdzod //
T02D2257:247b-5: ces pa dang rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis de la smras pa /
T02D2257:247b-6: chos nyid dam pa'i ye shes de dag ni //
T02D2257:247b-7: 'di ltar khyod nyid kyis ni shin tu rtogs //
T02D2257:247b-8: rtogs so zhes ni smra ru med pa'i don //
T02D2257:247b-9: 'di dag nyams su myong bas chos ci dgos //
T02D2257:247b-10: zhes nges pa'i shes pa skyes pas skad cig ma de nyid la grol bar gyur to //
T02D2257:247b-11: de bas na blo dang ldan pa dag gis de bzhin nyid shes par bya'o //
T02D2257:247b-12: da ni chags pa dang bral bas 'bras bu mi 'gyur ba bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:247b-13: de ltar ngo tsha med smra mkhas pa de //
T02D2257:247b-14: gson po gang zhig rnam par ma gyur pa //
T02D2257:247b-15: de ni rgas shing 'khogs par 'gyur ram ci //
T02D2257:247b-16: bla mas bstan pa'i dri med blo gros ni //
T02D2257:247b-17: de nyid gter yin gzhan yang gang yin lo //
T02D2257:247b-18: yul nyid rnam par dag pa rten yang min //
T02D2257:247b-19: stong pa 'ba' zhig gis ni bshad par bya //
T02D2257:247b-21: de ltar gong du smos pa'i tha mal pa'i shes
T02D2257:247b-22: pa rang gi mtshan nyid de dag dogs pa dang
T02D2257:247b-23: 'jigs pa dang ngo tsha ba med de smra ba
T02D2257:247b-24: ni mkhas pa nga zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2257:247b-25: rje btsun pa ri bo ba nyid do //
T02D2257:247b-26: de dag kyang ci zhe na /
T02D2257:247b-27: shes pa som ma bcos pa gson po'i tshul de
T02D2257:247b-28: dag nyams su myong bas lus dang sems bde bas
T02D2257:247b-29: gang zhing stong pa rgyas de nyid zhi bar byed
T02D2257:247b-30: de / bde ba dang stong pa dbyer med pa'i
T02D2257:247b-31: rnam pas mnyam pa nyid kyi don las ma gyur
T02D2257:247b-32: pa de ni rtogs mi ldan pas rgas par yang
T02D2257:247b-33: de / mi 'gyur te / 'khor bar mi ltung
T02D2257:247b-34: ba nyid kyis 'khogs par yang ma yin te sdug
T02D2257:247b-35: bsngal gyi rnam pas 'gyur ram ci ste 'gyur ro
T02D2257:247b-36: de / mi 'gyur te / // de ltar bla
T02D2257:247b-37: mas bstan pa'i don de kho na de bzhin nyid
T02D2257:247b-38: la ni dri ma med de /
T02D2257:247b-39: de dag ni blo gros kyi mthar thug pa'i shes rab kyi de bzhin nyid do //
T02D2257:247b-40: de nyid zad mi shes pa'i gter yin te de las gzhan pa'i gter yin lo ste med do //
T02D2257:248a-0: yul dang yul can du rtog pa dag @248a * //
T02D2257:248a-1: ni de nyid rnam par dag pa'i ye shes yin no zhes pa brjod kyang /
T02D2257:248a-2: de kho na nyid kyi rten tsam du yang mi rung ste yin no //
T02D2257:248a-3: de dag kyang ci zhe na /
T02D2257:248a-4: stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid 'ba' zhig gis
T02D2257:248a-5: de nyid ni bshad du med pa'i tshul gyis bshad
T02D2257:248a-6: par bya'o // da ni rtogs pa'i sems pha rol
T02D2257:248a-7: tu phyin pa drug gi ngo bor snang pa bshad
T02D2257:248a-8: par bya'o // par bya ste / dngos po ma chags sems su shes pa dang //
T02D2257:248a-9: shes pa brda ru grags kyi de nyid tshul //
T02D2257:248a-10: tshul khrims de nyid ngo bor srung byed cing //
T02D2257:248a-11: ngo bo tsam du rtog med snying po che //
T02D2257:248a-12: sems kyi rdo rje nang du khro 'joms te //
T02D2257:248a-13: rlom med rdo rje mkha' la gnod mi 'gyur //
T02D2257:248a-14: sems nyid rang bzhin dal dang myur min yang //
T02D2257:248a-15: rtog pa bsal phyir cho 'phrul myur du brtsam //
T02D2257:248a-16: rang bzhin sangs rgyas lhan cig skyes pa ste //
T02D2257:248a-17: rtogs par byed pa mnyam gzhag tshul du bya //
T02D2257:248a-18: bla ma'i man ngag mtshon cha shes rab ste //
T02D2257:248a-19: rtogs nas rnal mar sbyor bar rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D2257:248a-21: dngos po snang grags kyi chos thams cad la ma chags pa ni sbyin pa ste /
T02D2257:248a-22: de nyid sems su shes pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T02D2257:248a-23: de dag gis shes su yod dam zhe na /
T02D2257:248a-24: shes pa de dag slob pa po'i blo la brda
T02D2257:248a-25: tsam du zad kyi don la sems ma bcos pa
T02D2257:248a-26: de kho na nyid kyi tshul lo //
T02D2257:248a-27: spyin pa rnam pa de nyid la tshul khrims su brjod par bya ste /
T02D2257:248a-28: de yang sems can la gnod pa'i las mi byed pa dang /
T02D2257:248a-29: de yang de nyid kyi ngo bor srung bar byed
T02D2257:248a-30: cing ngo bo tsam du yang rtog pa min te
T02D2257:248a-31: / don la ni snying po'i don che ba'i bdag nyid do //
T02D2257:248a-32: de nyid ngo bo de dag bzod pa bsgom par bya ste /
T02D2257:248a-33: sems chos kyi sku rdo rje gnyug ma de dag
T02D2257:248a-34: gi ngang du bdag gzhan gyi khro ba rnam par
T02D2257:248a-35: 'joms te / de la yang rlom sems med pa'i rdo rje ste /
T02D2257:248a-36: nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'i phyir de la gnod pa mi 'byung ngo //
T02D2257:248a-37: de nyid kyi ngo bor brtson 'grus brtsam par bya ste /
T02D2257:248a-38: sems nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dal ba dang myur
T02D2257:248a-39: ba gnyis ka rtag tu mi 'dod pa yin yang
T02D2257:248a-40: ma rtogs pa rnams kyis rtog pa bsal bar bya
T02D2257:248a-41: ba'i phyir dang / rtogs pa gdeng du gyur par
T02D2257:248b-0: bya ba'i phyir @248b bsod nams kyi tshogs nyi ma'i
T02D2257:248b-1: zer lta bu'i cho 'phrul myur du brtsam par bya'o
T02D2257:248b-2: ba'i phyir dang / // de nyid ngo bor bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag par bya ste /
T02D2257:248b-3: sems nyid rang bzhin gyi sangs rgyas lhan cig skyes
T02D2257:248b-4: pa'i ye shes ye nas gnas te de dag las
T02D2257:248b-5: sangs rgyas su med kyang bla ma'i gdams ngag nye
T02D2257:248b-6: bar bstan pa'i don rtogs par byed pa'i bdag nyid
T02D2257:248b-7: la mnyam gzhag gi tshul du bya'o //
T02D2257:248b-8: de nyid ngo bor shes rab bsgom par bya ste /
T02D2257:248b-9: bla ma'i gdams ngag mtshon cha dam pa de dag
T02D2257:248b-10: gis bdag gi rnam pa yongs su gcod par byed
T02D2257:248b-12: slob pa po'i blo la de dag rtogs nas don
T02D2257:248b-13: dang rtogs don rnal 'byor pa ni mngon par rdzogs
T02D2257:248b-14: par sangs rgyas pa ste chos kyi sku'o //
T02D2257:248b-15: de ltar sbyin ba dang tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang /
T02D2257:248b-17: shes rab mthar thug pa'i ngo bo de dag chos
T02D2257:248b-18: thams cad 'dus pa'i tshul du bshad par bya ste
T02D2257:248b-19: / ji ltar gzings la 'phur ba'i bya rog ni //
T02D2257:248b-20: bskor zhing bskor zhing slar yang de ru 'bab //
T02D2257:248b-21: ces bya ba'i don ni rin po che len par
T02D2257:248b-22: 'dod pa'i phyir rgya mtsho'i steng du gzings bcas te
T02D2257:248b-23: / rig pa'i ltas brtag pa'i phyir bya rog dag
T02D2257:248b-24: bzung ste 'o mas brid nas 'dzin bam gyi rnga
T02D2257:248b-25: yab phyar te bya rog de dag 'phur ba las
T02D2257:248b-27: bskor zhing bskor zhing slar la gzings kyi gnas de nyid du 'bab pa bzhin du /
T02D2257:248b-28: bla ma dam pa'i gdams ngag rgya mtsho lta bu'i
T02D2257:248b-29: steng du chos kyi sku'i nor bu thob par bya
T02D2257:248b-30: ba'i phyir / tha mal gyi shes pa'i gzings bcas
T02D2257:248b-31: nas snang srid phyag rgya chen po'i skur btags pa'i
T02D2257:248b-32: phyir dran pa rgyun chags kyi don 'o ma lta
T02D2257:248b-33: bu la blo brid de shes par bya rog gar
T02D2257:248b-34: dgar yan du bcug pa las slar la bskor zhing
T02D2257:248b-35: slar de nyid kyi ngo bor babs so //
T02D2257:248b-36: da ni 'dod pa'i yon tan la chags pa de bzhin nyid kyi dper sbyar bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:248b-37: yul la zhen pas 'ching bar ma byed cig / kye ho rmongs ba mda' bsnun gyis smras pa /
T02D2257:248b-38: nya dang phye leb glang chen bung ba dang //
T02D2257:248b-39: 'di ni ri dgas bzhin du lta bar byos //
T02D2257:248b-40: mchil pa ro la chags bzhin myang ba dang //
T02D2257:249a-0: reg bya bde la dang por @249a * //
T02D2257:249a-2: stong pa dri yis khyab par bya ba ste //
T02D2257:249a-3: sna ma'i me tog rab tu dang pa dang //
T02D2257:249a-4: dbyer med glu la myur du rgyug pa'i rigs //
T02D2257:249a-5: zhes bya ba'i don ni rnal 'byor pa 'dod pa'i
T02D2257:249a-6: yon tan gyi yul zhen pa dang tha dad kyi
T02D2257:249a-7: rtogs pas bcings par ma byed cig / de bas
T02D2257:249a-8: na ngo mtshar ba'i don te 'khor ba'i sems can
T02D2257:249a-9: thams cad la kye ho rmongs pa zhes bos te
T02D2257:249a-10: // de dag gis ci byed ce na /
T02D2257:249a-11: mda' snun gyis smras pa la nyon zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2257:249a-12: de dag kyang ci zhe na /
T02D2257:249a-13: nya ro la chags pa dang phye ma leb reg
T02D2257:249a-14: bya la chags pa dang glang po che aa ga
T02D2257:249a-15: ru nag po'i dri la chags pa dang /
T02D2257:249a-16: bung ba me tog gi kha dog la chags pa dang /
T02D2257:249a-17: ri dags ae na ya glu snyan la chags pa
T02D2257:249a-18: bzhin du de nyid kyi don la blta bar byos
T02D2257:249a-19: shig / de dag skyon dang bcas pa ste /
T02D2257:249a-20: chags pa mngon par 'phel ba'i phyir 'khor ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro zhe na ma yin te /
T02D2257:249a-21: nya mchil pa'i ro la chags pa bzhin du rnal
T02D2257:249a-22: 'byor pa de bzhin nyid kyi ro myong ba dang
T02D2257:249a-23: / bye ma leb reg bya'i bde ba la chags
T02D2257:249a-24: pa bzhin du rnal 'byor pas dang por lus dang
T02D2257:249a-25: sems kyi bde ba la gnas pa'i tshul dang /
T02D2257:249a-26: glang po che dri la chags pa bzhin du rnal
T02D2257:249a-27: 'byor pa bde ba la ma chags shing stong pa'i
T02D2257:249a-28: dri yis khyab par bya ba dang /
T02D2257:249a-29: bung ba kha dog la chags pa bzhin du rnal
T02D2257:249a-30: 'byor pas snang srid chos kyi sku phyag rgya chen
T02D2257:249a-31: po'i me tog rab tu dang bar shes pa dang
T02D2257:249a-32: / ri dags glu la rgyug pa bzhin du rnal
T02D2257:249a-33: 'byor pas bde ba dang stong pa dbyer med pa'i
T02D2257:249a-34: glu la myur du rgyug pa'i rigs so //
T02D2257:249a-35: da ni snang stong dbyer med pa bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:249a-36: gang zhig sems la rnam par 'phro bar snang //
T02D2257:249a-37: de srid mgon po la ni rang bzhin te //
T02D2257:249a-38: chu dang rlabs dag kyang ni gzhan yin nam //
T02D2257:249a-39: srid dang mnyam nyid nam mkha'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2257:249a-40: zhes bya ba'i don ni rnal 'byor pa gang zhig
T02D2257:249a-41: gis sems ni sems la rnam par 'phro bar snang
T02D2257:249a-42: ste / ji srid du 'phro ba de srid du
T02D2257:249a-43: bla ma dam pa'i mgon po dang phrad pa yin
T02D2257:249a-44: ste / te / de las ni rang bzhin gzhan du mi rtogs pa'i de kho na nyid do //
T02D2257:249b-0: de bas na rang @249b bzhin rnal ma de las
T02D2257:249b-1: gzhan du 'gyur ba lta bu ni ma yin no
T02D2257:249b-2: // dper na chu'i rgya mtsho chen po dag la
T02D2257:249b-3: chu dang rlabs dag dpag tu med pa cig yod
T02D2257:249b-4: kyang de nyid las gzhan yin rnam ste ma yin
T02D2257:249b-5: // no // de bas na ngo bo tha mi
T02D2257:249b-6: dad pa'i phyir srid pa'i ngo bo dang mya ngan
T02D2257:249b-7: las 'das pa'i mnyam pa nyid nam mkha'i ngo bo
T02D2257:249b-8: ltar rang bzhin gyis dag pa yin no //
T02D2257:249b-9: da ni khyad par gyi nus pa bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:249b-10: gang zhig ston te gang gis thos pa yi //
T02D2257:249b-11: dgos pa gang yin dam pa skyong ba na //
T02D2257:249b-12: gdug pa'i skungs sa rdul bzhin rlog par byed //
T02D2257:249b-13: snying ga nyid du nub par gyur pa yin //
T02D2257:249b-15: bla ma dam pa gang zhig gis ston pa yang
T02D2257:249b-16: dag pa'i don de dag slob pa po gang gis
T02D2257:249b-17: thos pa'i dgos pa de dag gang yin zhe na
T02D2257:249b-18: / tha mal gyi shes pa'i dam pa ste /
T02D2257:249b-19: de dag dran pa rgyun chags kyis skyong ba na
T02D2257:249b-20: rnam par rtog pa'i gdug pa'i skungs sa de dag
T02D2257:249b-21: rdul bzhin rlog par byed do //
T02D2257:249b-22: rtogs pa'i bye brag dpag tu med pa dag ni
T02D2257:249b-23: snying ga tha mal gyi shes pa nyid du nub
T02D2257:249b-25: nub pa de yang mtshon pa tsam du zad de /
T02D2257:249b-26: don la ji bzhin pa de kho na nyid rtogs pa la bya'o //
T02D2257:249b-27: da ni de kho na nyid kyi ngo bo'i tshul du mtshon par bya ste /
T02D2257:249b-28: ji ltar chu la chu bzhag na //
T02D2257:249b-29: de snyed chu ru ro mnyam 'gyur //
T02D2257:249b-30: ji ltar mar la mar gzhag mtshungs //
T02D2257:249b-31: sems dang snang ba de bzhin smra //
T02D2257:249b-32: skyon dang yon tan rnams dang ldan pa'i sems //
T02D2257:249b-33: mgon po sus kyang mtshon par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2257:249b-34: zhes bya ba'i don ni dper na chu'i thigs pa
T02D2257:249b-35: la chu'i thigs pa bzhag na ji snyed du bzhag
T02D2257:249b-36: pa de snyed chu ru ro mnyam par 'gyur ro
T02D2257:249b-37: // ji srid mar gyi khu ba la mar bzhag
T02D2257:249b-38: pa de dang mtshungs pa ste mar du ro mnyam
T02D2257:249b-39: // par 'gyur ro // sems snang ba la bzhag
T02D2257:249b-40: pa dang snang ba sems la bzhag pa'i ngo bos
T02D2257:249b-41: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyi de kho na
T02D2257:249b-42: nyid rtogs par byed pa ste /
T02D2257:249b-43: de dag ni gnyis su med par ro mnyam pa
T02D2257:249b-44: ste bde ba chen po'i ngang du yongs su rdzogs
T02D2257:249b-45: par 'gyur ro // de bas na rje btsun pa
T02D2257:249b-46: ri bo pa'i zhal sngar de bzhin du smra bar
T02D2257:250a-1: na sems nyid kyi ngo bo ni cir yang ma yin pa'i don la cir yang snang ba ste /
T02D2257:250a-2: snang ba la rtogs na skyon du 'gyur ba dang /
T02D2257:250a-3: de ma bcos par bzhag na sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams rtogs par byed pa ste /
T02D2257:250a-4: de dang ldan pa'i sems 'di ni mgon po sangs
T02D2257:250a-5: rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa sus kyang mtshon
T02D2257:250a-6: par mi nus shing mtshon par yang mi 'gyur ro
T02D2257:250a-7: // da ni de nyid kyi mtha' la gdams pa bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:250a-8: rmongs pa dag la gnyen po gang yang med //
T02D2257:250a-9: khyod ni stong pa nyid la zhen tam ci //
T02D2257:250a-10: nags la mched pa'i me lce ji bzhin du //
T02D2257:250a-11: gong du babs pa 'di ltar snang ba kun //
T02D2257:250a-12: ji ltar snang dang grags pa'i dngos po rnams //
T02D2257:250a-13: rtsa ba stong pa nyid dang lhan cig byos //
T02D2257:250a-14: zhes bya ba'i don ni tha mal gyi shes pa ni rmongs pa chen po ste /
T02D2257:250a-15: de dag la ni gnyen po gang yang med do //
T02D2257:250a-16: de bas na sems khyod ni sems nyid stong pa
T02D2257:250a-17: nyid ni cir yang ma yin pa la zhen tam
T02D2257:250a-18: ci / dbang po'i spyod yul du 'gyur ba thams
T02D2257:250a-19: cad kyang nags la me lce mched pa bzhin du
T02D2257:250a-20: gong du bstan pa'i don ci yang ma yin pa
T02D2257:250a-21: ci / la babs pa'o // ji ltar snang ba
T02D2257:250a-22: kun kyang de bzhin ni ji ltar snang ba dang
T02D2257:250a-23: grags pa'i dngos po ma lus pa rnams rtsa ba
T02D2257:250a-24: chos kyi sku yin pa'i phyir stong pa nyid dang
T02D2257:250a-25: lhan cig tu byos shig pa'o //
T02D2257:250a-26: da ni mnyam pa'i don la zug rngu'i tsher mas gnod pa de bsal ba bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:250a-27: gal te yid du 'ong ba mnyam pa'i sems //
T02D2257:250a-28: snying la gces spras byams pa'i sems nyid la //
T02D2257:250a-29: til gyi shun pa tsam gyi zug rngus kyang //
T02D2257:250a-30: rnams kyang sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig byed par zad //
T02D2257:250a-31: ces bya ba'i don ni rnal 'byor pa bdag ni
T02D2257:250a-32: gal te 'am brgya lam na gsal ba dang mi
T02D2257:250a-33: rtog pa dang bde ba dang yid du 'ong ba'i
T02D2257:250a-34: ngo bo la ci yang ma yin pa'i sems dang
T02D2257:250a-35: ldan te de ltar rtogs pa de ni rnal 'byor
T02D2257:250a-36: pa rnams kyi bla ma'i mchog ste /
T02D2257:250a-37: snying de la gces spras dang byams pa'i sems nyid bya bar rigs la /
T02D2257:250a-38: g-yeng ba dang gnod pa'i zug rngu dang bral bar bya'o //
T02D2257:250a-40: til gyi shun ba tsam gyi zug rngu yang rnal
T02D2257:250b-0: @250b 'byor pa de dag gi sems la gnod pa'i
T02D2257:250b-1: phyir nams kyang sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig skyes par byed
T02D2257:250b-2: par zad do // da ni dpe lta bu'i spyod pa bstan pa bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:250b-3: grogs po phag dang glang po smon pa ltos //
T02D2257:250b-4: de ltar yin pa de ni ma yin no //
T02D2257:250b-5: rtog bral gtan dang chags pa'i bza' gtad bral //
T02D2257:250b-6: rnam rtog klong dang dmag bzlog sdig par bral //
T02D2257:250b-7: zhes bya ba'i don ni rnal 'byor pa rnams la 'gogs po zhes bos te /
T02D2257:250b-8: grong khyer gyi phag dang rgyal po'i glang po che
T02D2257:250b-9: dang gnod sbyin gyis zin pa'i smyon pa ltos shig
T02D2257:250b-10: pa'i don to // de dag gis ci byed ce na /
T02D2257:250b-11: rnal 'byor pa dang chos mthun pa'i spyod pa de
T02D2257:250b-12: ltar yin te mi mthun pa'i phyogs dgag par bya
T02D2257:250b-13: ba'i phyir de dang mi mthun no //
T02D2257:250b-14: de dag kyang ci zhe na /
T02D2257:250b-15: phag pa rtog pa dang bral ba bzhin rnal 'byor
T02D2257:250b-16: pa dag kyang zas la gtsang btsog med cing rtog
T02D2257:250b-18: glang po che yid bsgyur bar mi nus shing brtan
T02D2257:250b-19: pa bzhin du rnal 'byor dag la yang bdud dang
T02D2257:250b-20: mu stegs dang phyir rgol ba dang phyi nang gi
T02D2257:250b-21: g-yeng pa dag gis blo bslad par mi nus shing
T02D2257:250b-22: brtan pa'o // smyon pa ni chags pa'i bza' gtad dang bral ba ste /
T02D2257:250b-23: rnal 'byor pa dag gis kyang su la yang chags
T02D2257:250b-24: par mi bya zhing spyod pa bza' gtad dang bral
T02D2257:250b-25: bar spyod pa'o // de dag dang mtshungs pa'i phyir mthun pa'i dpe nye bar 'grub pa'o //
T02D2257:250b-26: rnal 'byor pa dag gis rnam par rtog pa'i sa glong ba dang /
T02D2257:250b-27: pha rol po'i dmag zlog pa dang srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa dang bral bar bya'o //
T02D2257:250b-29: tha dad kyi rtog pa dang bcas kyi bar du
T02D2257:250b-30: rnam par smin pa mi slu bar 'byung ba'i phyir
T02D2257:250b-31: ro // da ni nor bu'i dpe'i sgo nas sems
T02D2257:250b-32: can la phan par bya ba bstan par bya ste
T02D2257:250b-33: ro // / ji ltar yid bzhin nor bu'i dgos pa bzhin //
T02D2257:250b-34: 'khrul pa gzhig pa'i mkhas pa ngo mtshar che //
T02D2257:250b-35: ngang las rang rig bde chen bag chags gzugs //
T02D2257:250b-36: thams cad de tshe mkha' mnyam de ltar 'gyur //
T02D2257:250b-37: ka la ku ta rmongs su mi rung ste //
T02D2257:250b-38: rang gzhan mkha' mnyam yid kyis 'dzin pa yin //
T02D2257:250b-39: yid de yid ma yin par byed 'gyur te /
T02D2257:251a-1: bya ba'i don ni ji ltar yid bzhin gyi nor
T02D2257:251a-2: bu rin po che snod bzang po'i nang du bzhag
T02D2257:251a-3: nas mchod pa phul te gsol ba btab pas dgos
T02D2257:251a-4: pa'i don ji lta bar 'byung ba bzhin du bla
T02D2257:251a-5: ma'i gdams ngag gi nor bu rin po che de
T02D2257:251a-6: dag rten gang zag gi snod bzang po'i blo la
T02D2257:251a-7: bcug ste / tha mal gyi shes pa'i mchod pa
T02D2257:251a-8: phul nas nges pa'i shes pa'i gsol ba btab na
T02D2257:251a-9: skad cig ma de nyid la 'khrul pa ma lus
T02D2257:251a-11: de dag gi don la mkhas pa ste ngo mtshar che'o //
T02D2257:251a-12: de dag kyang gzhan las 'thob pa ma yin te//
T02D2257:251a-13: rang la rang rig pa'i bde ba chen po 'di
T02D2257:251a-14: ni snang ba dang sems kyi tshul du bag chags
T02D2257:251a-16: tha mal gyi shes pa rtogs pa na brtags pa
T02D2257:251a-17: thams cad de'i tshe nam mkha' dang mnyam par 'gyur
T02D2257:251a-18: ro // ka la ku ta zhes bya ba ni //
T02D2257:251a-19: ka ka pa aa ai ta dang //
T02D2257:251a-20: la pa ni ha ri ha dang //
T02D2257:251a-21: ku ku pa ra na he dang //
T02D2257:251a-22: ta ta pa shi ne ke dang ste brda'i don to //
T02D2257:251a-23: de dag gsal bar bya ba ni //
T02D2257:251a-24: nyams su myong ba tha mal nyid //
T02D2257:251a-25: nam mkha' lta bu'i ngo bor gsal //
T02D2257:251a-26: re dogs gnyis 'dzin blang dor med //
T02D2257:251a-28: ma rtogs nang dang phyi ru blta //
T02D2257:251a-29: nges pa skyes nas go rims nyid //
T02D2257:251a-30: bsod nams tshogs bsags la brtson pa //
T02D2257:251a-31: 'di ni dam pa'i lam yin no //
T02D2257:251a-32: snang srid thams cad chos kyi sku //
T02D2257:251a-33: chu bo lta bu'i ngo bo nyid //
T02D2257:251a-34: dbang po yul phrad bde ba'i mchog / dran pa bsten pa mchog yin no //
T02D2257:251a-35: spyod lam bzhi la sngon 'gro ba'o //
T02D2257:251a-36: dran pa de bzhin nyid du bsten //
T02D2257:251a-37: sems nyid bla ma dam par bkur //
T02D2257:251a-38: dgag par dor zhing ci ster spyad //
T02D2257:251a-39: ces bya ba ni thun mong gi tshul lo //
T02D2257:251a-40: sems nyid ma bcos chos kyi sku //
T02D2257:251a-41: snang ba bde chen longs spyod rdzogs //
T02D2257:251a-42: 'gro 'ong sems can sprul pa'i bdag / dam pa dag la rtog pa'o //
T02D2257:251a-43: 'di dag ni khyad par gyi tshul lo //
T02D2257:251a-44: sems nyid rnal ma'i ngang gnas na //
T02D2257:251a-45: spyod pa drug gis ci byar yod //
T02D2257:251a-46: bde ba chen po'i ro myong nas //
T02D2257:251a-47: dge dang sdig pa'i bye brag med //
T02D2257:251a-48: 'di ni bla na med pa'i tshul lo //
T02D2257:251b-0: rnal @251b ma rtogs pa rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D2257:251b-1: sdig pa'i rnam par smin mi myong //
T02D2257:251b-2: dge ba'i bde bas 'bras bu min //
T02D2257:251b-3: rmi lam bzhin lta ci bder spyod //
T02D2257:251b-4: 'di dag ni de kho na nyid kyi tshul lo //
T02D2257:251b-5: ka ni rtsol sgrub bral ba ste //
T02D2257:251b-6: la ni ma bcos don gyi gtso //
T02D2257:251b-7: ku ni rnam rtog mtha' dang bral ;
T02D2257:251b-8: / ma shes smrar med mnyam nyid te //
T02D2257:251b-9: zhes bya ba 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul du bshad pa'o //
T02D2257:251b-10: de bas na smos su mi rung ba ste /
T02D2257:251b-11: rang bzhin rnal ma 'di dag nam mkha' dang mnyam
T02D2257:251b-12: pa'i phyir dran pa'i yid kyis 'dzin par byed pa
T02D2257:251b-13: yin no // yin pa de yang rtog pa'i zug rngu yin te //
T02D2257:251b-14: yid de dag dang dran pa rtog pa ma yin
T02D2257:251b-15: par shugs kyis byed par 'gyur te 'di ni dam
T02D2257:251b-16: pa'o // da ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:251b-17: rang bzhin gyis mdzes skyes pa'i mchog tu mdzes //
T02D2257:251b-18: khyim dang khyim na de ni brjod pa ste //
T02D2257:251b-19: bde chen gnas ni yongs su shes pa min //
T02D2257:251b-20: 'gro kun sems kyi sprul par mda' bsnun smras //
T02D2257:251b-21: de ni bsam med rtog pa ma yin no //
T02D2257:251b-22: kye ma rnal 'byor bsgom pa rang la dris //
T02D2257:251b-23: snying po rang bzhin dag pa'i rtog pa la //
T02D2257:251b-24: rang bzhin gnas pa'i sems kyis blta bar rigs//
T02D2257:251b-25: zhes bya ba'i don ni sems kyi rang bzhin bla
T02D2257:251b-26: ma dam pa'i gdams ngag gis mdzes par byas pa'i
T02D2257:251b-27: sems rnal ma gnyis su med pa skyes pa'i bde
T02D2257:251b-28: ba dang stong pa dbyer med pa las mchog tu
T02D2257:251b-29: gyur pa'i bdag nyid dran pa rgyun chags kyis mdzes
T02D2257:251b-30: par byas pa'i don 'di dag theg pa 'og ma
T02D2257:251b-31: rnams kyis khyim dang tshig dang tha snyad kyi khyim
T02D2257:251b-32: na de nyid brjod par bya ste /
T02D2257:251b-33: 'o khri phrag dpag tu med pa dag tu bshad
T02D2257:251b-34: du zin nas kyang dam pa rnams kyi gdams ngag
T02D2257:251b-35: la rag las pa'i bde ba chen po'i gnas ni
T02D2257:251b-36: yongs su shes pa min no //
T02D2257:251b-37: 'gro ba kun gyi shes pa ni snang ba thams cad sems kyi 'khrul par 'dod pa'am /
T02D2257:251b-38: de la rnam pa gzhan du yod par 'dod pa ste /
T02D2257:251b-39: de dag ni ma yin par mda' bsnun smras so //
T02D2257:251b-40: de dag kyang ci zhe na /
T02D2257:251b-41: snang grags kyi chos thams cad bde ba chen po
T02D2257:251b-42: gnyug ma'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir de ni bsam
T02D2257:252a-2: kye ma rnal 'byor pa kun de kho na nyid
T02D2257:252a-3: rang gi sgom pa ni rang gi dri bar bya'o
T02D2257:252a-5: rang ma yin pa gzhan mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2257:252a-6: rang de dag kyang ci zhe na /
T02D2257:252a-7: ye nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir snying po'o //
T02D2257:252a-8: de yang rang bzhin gdod ma nas dag pa'i rnal 'byor pa las rtog par cir yang snang ngo //
T02D2257:252a-9: de dag ni sems tha mal gyi shes pa rang
T02D2257:252a-10: bzhin du gnas pa'i sems kyis blta ba'i rigs so
T02D2257:252a-11: // da ni don de nyid la gdams pa bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:252a-12: de nas phyi nang mnyam par shes pa dang //
T02D2257:252a-13: shes byed de 'gog par ni bla ma'i lung //
T02D2257:252a-14: mgo snying lte gsang rkang lag spangs pa ste //
T02D2257:252a-15: ngas mthong bsam pa'i yul ni mchod par byed //
T02D2257:252a-16: gzhan dag bsam pa'i yul ni 'gag par 'gyur //
T02D2257:252a-17: gal te sems la sems kyis mtshon du 'gro //
T02D2257:252a-18: rlung dang yid ni mi g-yo brtan par 'gyur //
T02D2257:252a-19: zhes bya ba'i don ni rnal 'byor pa de dag
T02D2257:252a-20: gis nyams su myong nas mthong ba'i rtags ni phyi
T02D2257:252a-21: dang nang mnyam par shes shing ci yang ma yin
T02D2257:252a-22: pa nyid du mthong ba ste ci yang ma yin
T02D2257:252a-23: pa'o // de ltar shes par byed pa de shugs
T02D2257:252a-24: kyis 'gog pa la ni bla ma rnams kyi lung
T02D2257:252a-26: de nyid mngon sum du rtogs pas ni dge ba
T02D2257:252a-27: thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba sbyor ba snying
T02D2257:252a-28: rje chen po nyid dang bsod nams dang ye shes
T02D2257:252a-29: kyi tshogs kyi dngos po bzhi dang sems can thams
T02D2257:252a-30: cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'jug sngo
T02D2257:252a-31: zhing smon lam rgya chen po gdab pa dang /
T02D2257:252a-32: de dag thams cad dbang rnam pa bzhi go rims
T02D2257:252a-33: kyi tshul du gnas par byed pa'i dam tshig srung
T02D2257:252a-34: ba dang / de brtan par byed pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs yan lag shugs kyis spang ba ste /
T02D2257:252a-35: de dag la gnas kyang don med par 'gyur ro //
T02D2257:252a-36: don dang ldan pa ni gang zhig yin zhe na /
T02D2257:252a-37: nga mthong zhes pa ste tha mal gyi nga'o //
T02D2257:252a-38: de dag bsam pa'i yul ni don dam pa'o //
T02D2257:252a-39: bsod nams kyi tshogs khyad par can rdzogs par byed pa ni mchod par byed pa'i nges shes so //
T02D2257:252a-40: de dag ni nyams su myong ba dang gzhan dang
T02D2257:252b-0: gzhan du brtags pa'i bdag nyid @252b dag bsam pa'i
T02D2257:252b-1: yul rtog pa can de dag ni dang gis 'gag
T02D2257:252b-2: par 'gyur ro // gal te slob pa po dag
T02D2257:252b-3: gi blo la brjod par bya ba'i phyir sems kyis
T02D2257:252b-5: de tsam du zad pa nyid yin te /
T02D2257:252b-6: gzhan ni skyon dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2257:252b-7: mtshon pa'i don la rtog pa yin na rlung dang
T02D2257:252b-8: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni 'gag par 'gyur
T02D2257:252b-9: te // mtshan ma la mi g-yengs shing mi rtog pa la brtan pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
T02D2257:252b-10: da ni rnal ma'i don phyin ci ma log pa bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:252b-11: ji ltar lan tshva chu la thim pa ltar //
T02D2257:252b-12: de ltar sems ni rang bzhin nyid dag la //
T02D2257:252b-13: dngos por rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid thim par 'gyur //
T02D2257:252b-14: de tshe bdag dang gzhan ni mnyam par mthong //
T02D2257:252b-15: 'bad de bsam gtan byas pas ci byar yod //
T02D2257:252b-16: brtags gcig la ni lugs rnams mang po mthong //
T02D2257:252b-17: 'ongs pa ma mthong phyis kyang de mthong med //
T02D2257:252b-18: rang 'dod pa yis rang rig gsal bar 'gyur //
T02D2257:252b-19: rang bzhin 'jig cing gzhan dang 'gal ba yin //
T02D2257:252b-20: mgon po bdag ni gcig po bzhin dang ldan //
T02D2257:252b-21: khyim dang khyim nas grub mtha' de sgrub pa'i //
T02D2257:252b-22: gcig zos pas ni gzhan kun tshim par 'gyur //
T02D2257:252b-23: nang bzhag phyi rol song nas khyim bdag tshol //
T02D2257:252b-24: btsal kyang ma mthong phyis kyang de med de //
T02D2257:252b-25: 'dug par gyur kyang de yis ma shes so //
T02D2257:252b-27: ji ltar lan tshva chu dag gi nang du bcug
T02D2257:252b-28: na de la thim zhing lan tshva'i ror 'gyur ba
T02D2257:252b-29: ltar sems rang bzhin nyid nas dag pa'i tshul dag
T02D2257:252b-30: la dngos por rtog pa'i mtshan nyid kyi lan tshva
T02D2257:252b-31: dag bzhag na dngos po thim zhing bde ba chen
T02D2257:252b-33: de'i tshe bdag dang gzhan du mnyam par mthong ste tha mi dad do //
T02D2257:252b-34: de ltar ma rtogs pa'i rtsol sgrub dang bcas pa'i
T02D2257:252b-35: don de nyid la 'bad de bsam gtan byas pas
T02D2257:252b-36: 'ching ba'i phyir ci byar yod do //
T02D2257:252b-37: gnyug ma'i don de kho na nyid kyi brtags gcig
T02D2257:252b-38: la ni tha dad kyi rtogs pas brtag par lugs
T02D2257:252b-40: mthong du yod dam zhe na /
T02D2257:253a-0: byis pa'i ngang tshul can nam mkha' la tshad byed pa dang 'dra ba rnams kyis @253a * //
T02D2257:253a-1: brtag par zad kyi de kho na nyid la 'ongs
T02D2257:253a-2: par yang ma yin phyis kyang de mthong ba med
T02D2257:253a-3: do // sems tsam dag gi 'dod pa ni rang
T02D2257:253a-4: gi 'dod pa'i shugs kyis rang gi rang gsal ba'i
T02D2257:253a-5: ngo bo sgrub par smras te de ni mu stegs
T02D2257:253a-7: de'i phyir rang bzhin 'jig shing dbu ma la sogs
T02D2257:253a-8: pa'i gzhan dang yang 'gal bar 'gyur ba yin no
T02D2257:253a-9: // dgag sgrub dang bral ba'i don ni chos kyi
T02D2257:253a-10: sku'i mgon po bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid tha
T02D2257:253a-11: mal gyi shes pa gcig pu rang bzhin gyi bzhin
T02D2257:253a-12: // dang ldan no // de dag kyang bla ma
T02D2257:253a-13: dam pa'i gdams ngag gi khyim dang bdag nyid kyi
T02D2257:253a-14: nyams su myong ba'i khyim nas grub pa'i mtha' dgag
T02D2257:253a-15: sgrub dang bral ba de grub pa'o //
T02D2257:253a-16: de ni ma bcos pa'i don te de gcig pu
T02D2257:253a-17: rnal ma nyams su myong ba'i tshul gyis zos pa
T02D2257:253a-18: ni grub pa'i mtha' ma lus pa gzhan kun yang
T02D2257:253a-20: de ni rang byung gi ye shes te khyim gyi
T02D2257:253a-21: bdag po de dag bdag nyid kyi blo'i gting gi
T02D2257:253a-23: phyi rol du song nas tha snyad la rnam par brten pa'i mthus khyim bdag tshol lo //
T02D2257:253a-24: btsal ba'i don de dag kyang rnyed pa ma yin te /
T02D2257:253a-25: ci yang ma yin pa'i phyir ma mthong ngo //
T02D2257:253a-26: phyis kyang de dag la mthong ba med de rang
T02D2257:253a-27: nyid la ngang gis 'dug par gyur kyang rnam par
T02D2257:253a-28: rtog pa'i rtog ges bslad pa'i phyir de yis ma
T02D2257:253a-29: shes so // de bas na rab tu mi gnas pa'i rgyud las /
T02D2257:253a-30: bla ma'i gdams ngag khyim mchog dam pa dang //
T02D2257:253a-31: nyams myong khyim nas dgag sgrub med par rtog / ma bcos rnal ma'i zas shig za 'gyur bas //
T02D2257:253a-32: grub mtha' ma lus kun kyang tshim par 'gyur //
T02D2257:253a-33: rmongs pa ma rtogs tha snyad tshig la brten //
T02D2257:253a-34: btsal kyang ma rnyed 'dug kyang de ma shes //
T02D2257:253a-36: da ni bde stong dbyer med bstan par bya ste //
T02D2257:253a-37: rba rlabs med pa'i dbang phyug chen po'i mchog /
T02D2257:253a-38: rnyog pa med pa'i bsam gtan ci mi bzhag /
T02D2257:253a-39: chu dang mar me rang gsal gcig pu zhog /'gro
T02D2257:253a-40: dang 'ong ba ro gcig mi dor ro //
T02D2257:253a-41: snga na med pa'i sgeg mo dang phrad nas //
T02D2257:253a-42: nyal bas sems ni gzhi med pa la brten //
T02D2257:253b-0: @253b rang rig gzugs dang tha dad ma lta cig /'di ltar sangs rgyas lag tu gtong ba yin //
T02D2257:253b-2: sems nyid gnyug ma'i ngo bo de dag la sems
T02D2257:253b-3: bcos pa'i rba dang rnam par rtog pa'i rlabs dag
T02D2257:253b-4: gis gnod pa med pa'i don de nyid ni sa
T02D2257:253b-5: bcu'i dbang phyug chen po ste mchog go ;
T02D2257:253b-6: / de bas na don de nyid ni rnyog pa med pa ste /
T02D2257:253b-7: khyad par gyi bsam gtan yin pa'i phyir //
T02D2257:253b-8: mnyam pa'i don de la sems ci'i phyir mi bzhag ste gzhag go //
T02D2257:253b-9: chu ma rnyog pa'i rnal ma dangs pa dang mar
T02D2257:253b-10: me ma bslang pa dang gsal ba bzhin du sems
T02D2257:253b-11: ma bcos pa gcig pu de kho na nyid du
T02D2257:253b-12: zhog cig / khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad
T02D2257:253b-13: kyi 'gro ba dang 'grub pa'i mtha' dbu ma la
T02D2257:253b-14: sogs pa thams cad kyi 'ong ba thams cad kyang
T02D2257:253b-15: bdag nyid du ro gcig pa'i phyir mi 'dor ro
T02D2257:253b-16: // de dag ched du sgrub pa yang med de //
T02D2257:253b-17: srid p'a pam li p'am zhes bya'o //
T02D2257:253b-18: de dag gi don ni bla ma dam pa las snga na med pa'i don rtogs te /
T02D2257:253b-19: chos thams cad bde ba chen po ror sgeg pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2257:253b-20: shes rab chen po'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ngo
T02D2257:253b-21: bo de dag dang phrad nas mthar phyin pa dag
T02D2257:253b-22: go // de dag gi don yang snga na med pa yin nam zhe na /
T02D2257:253b-23: ma yin te pam li pra pa pri zhes bya ste /
T02D2257:253b-24: chos sku gnyug ma'i ngo bo dag / bdag nyid la ni yod pa ste //
T02D2257:253b-25: dgag sgrub med par sgeg pa la //
T02D2257:253b-26: dus gsum sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i mo //
T02D2257:253b-27: zhes bya ba'i don ni de dag kyang pram li pram pri ba zhes bya ste //
T02D2257:253b-28: nyams myong bde ba chen po'i ro //
T02D2257:253b-29: nyams su myong bar shin tu bde //
T02D2257:253b-30: bdag gis smra bar mi nus kyis //
T02D2257:253b-33: de nyid kyi phyir p'a pam li pram pri zhes bya ste /
T02D2257:253b-35: chos sku bde chen smra ru med //
T02D2257:253b-36: zab cing tshad dang rgya tshad med //
T02D2257:253b-37: de nyid ngo bo shes mi nus //
T02D2257:253b-38: rtogs par gyur pa ma yin no //
T02D2257:253b-40: de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2257:253b-41: p'a pri pam pri lam zhes pa ste de dag gi don ni /
T02D2257:253b-42: bde stong dbyer med mnyam pa nyid //
T02D2257:253b-43: mnyam pa phyogs cha cha dang bral //
T02D2257:253b-44: nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid mtshungs phyir //
T02D2257:253b-45: brjod pa tha snyad mtha' las 'das //
T02D2257:254a-1: 'byung ba'i phyir snga na med pa dang snga na
T02D2257:254a-2: yod pa dang smrar med pa dang mi shes pa
T02D2257:254a-3: dang mnyam pa nyid kyi sgeg mo ste /
T02D2257:254a-4: 'di dag ni ji bzhin shes pa 'ba' zhig la brjod pa'o //
T02D2257:254a-5: de yang shes pa bag yangs kyi sbyong pa rnal
T02D2257:254a-6: mas 'grub pa'i phyir nyal ba'i sems ni gzhi med
T02D2257:254a-8: de bas na sems rang rig pa'i ye shes dang
T02D2257:254a-9: snang ba yul gyi gzugs dang de sgrub par byed
T02D2257:254a-11: des rtogs pa'i don rnams tha dad pa'i rtogs par
T02D2257:254a-12: ma lta cig /'di ltar rtogs pa de ni chos
T02D2257:254a-13: kyi sku sangs rgyas lag tu gtod pa yin no
T02D2257:254a-14: // da ni dran pa rgyun chags kyi bdag nyid bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:254a-15: lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin de tshe mdzes //
T02D2257:254a-16: gang tshe lus dang ngag yid dbyer med pa //
T02D2257:254a-17: de tshe thams cad mkhyen pa thob pa ste //
T02D2257:254a-18: dbyer med dang la gzhag pa thob med kyang //
T02D2257:254a-19: brda ru mtshon nas gzhag dang thob par smras //
T02D2257:254a-20: smras pa'i tshig tu zhog la de don bsgoms //
T02D2257:254a-21: bsgom par bya ba rdul tsam med pa ste //
T02D2257:254a-22: med pa'i ngang la gzhag tu med pa'i ngang //
T02D2257:254a-23: de la gnas na rnal 'byor snying po'i lam //
T02D2257:254a-24: snying po med du brjod par ma yin gyis //
T02D2257:254a-25: dngos dang sems su shes shing shes pa med ;
T02D2257:254a-26: / med pa'i rdo rje de la 'jug par bya //
T02D2257:254a-27: zhes bya ba'i don ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ye
T02D2257:254a-28: shes kyi rang bzhin ni gang gi tshe don rnal
T02D2257:254a-29: ma nyams su myong ba'i tshe chos kyi sku mdzes
T02D2257:254a-30: pa'o // gang gi tshe rnal 'byor pa dag gi
T02D2257:254a-31: lus dang ngag dang yid dbyer med cing mnyam pa
T02D2257:254a-32: nyid kyi dang la gnas pa de'i tshe thams cad
T02D2257:254a-33: mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas thob pa ste /
T02D2257:254a-34: de ni bde ba dang stong pa dbyer med pa'i ngang la gnas pa'o //
T02D2257:254a-35: de ltar rtog pa'i don la mnyam par gzhag pa dang rjes la thob pa med do //
T02D2257:254a-36: de ltar med kyang ma rtog pa'i slob pa po'i
T02D2257:254a-37: blo la brda ru mtshon nas mnyam par gzhag pa
T02D2257:254a-38: dang rjes las thob pa smras so //
T02D2257:254a-39: brjod bya de tshig tsam du shugs kyis zhog la
T02D2257:254a-40: de'i don brjod bya dang bral ba sgoms shig pa'o
T02D2257:254a-41: // bsgom du yod dam zhe na /
T02D2257:254a-42: bsgom par bya ba ni rdul phra rab tsam yang med pa ste /
T02D2257:254b-0: de dag gi ngang la ni gzhag tu @254b med pa'o //
T02D2257:254b-1: gzhag tu med pa'i ngang la bzhag na mchog go //
T02D2257:254b-2: don de dag la gnas na rnal 'byor pa snying po'i lam mo //
T02D2257:254b-3: snying po'i lam brtags shing gnas pa'o //
T02D2257:254b-4: snying po zhes bya ba'i ngo bo nyid kyang gzhan
T02D2257:254b-5: du brjod du yod pa ma yin gyi dngos por
T02D2257:254b-6: snang ba dang grags pa thams cad sems su shes
T02D2257:254b-8: med pa'i don de ni ye shes rnam pa lnga ste /
T02D2257:254b-9: de nyid kyang tha mal gyi shes pa'i ngo bo
T02D2257:254b-10: yin pa'i phyir rdo rje ste de la 'jug par
T02D2257:254b-11: bya'o // da ni gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:254b-12: de'i phyir snying po brtag dka' bka' dang bra la //
T02D2257:254b-13: khyim bdag dang ni khyim bdag mo longs spyod //
T02D2257:254b-14: yul ni gang mthong ba de bshad par bya'o //
T02D2257:254b-15: zhes bya ba'i don ni chos nyid ma bcos pa
T02D2257:254b-16: rnal ma'i de kho na nyid la tshad gzung bar
T02D2257:254b-17: mi nus pa'i phyir snying po de brtag dka'o //
T02D2257:254b-18: skal ba dang ldan pa'i gang zag gis tha mal
T02D2257:254b-19: gyi shes pa nyams su myong ba nyid yin pa'i
T02D2257:254b-20: phyir dga' ba dang bral ba'o //
T02D2257:254b-21: de nyid kyis dus na kun gzhi byang chub kyi
T02D2257:254b-22: sems kyi khyim bdag dang chos nyid ma bcos pa
T02D2257:254b-23: rnal ma'i khyim bdag mo gnyis longs spyod de de
T02D2257:254b-24: yang 'dod pa'i yon tan mi 'gog cing rang dga'i
T02D2257:254b-25: tshul du'o // yul gang mthong ba de chos kyi sku'i ngo bor bshad par bya'o //
T02D2257:254b-26: da ni ngo mtshar gyi glu bstan par bya ste //
T02D2257:254b-27: nga yis rtsed mo byas pa la //
T02D2257:254b-28: byis pa rnams ni sha thang chad //
T02D2257:254b-29: me byung ba ni spra ba ste //
T02D2257:254b-30: me ni spra ba nyid la 'bar //
T02D2257:254b-31: zhes bya ba'i don ni sems nyid kyi don gyi
T02D2257:254b-32: glu blangs pa nang yis zhes pa ni sems nyid
T02D2257:254b-33: do // rtsed mo byas pa las zhes bya ba
T02D2257:254b-34: ni nyi ma'i zer bzhin du snang ba snang srid
T02D2257:254b-36: nus pa rnams zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i ro ma myongs pa rnams so //
T02D2257:254b-37: sha thang med ces bya ba ni dgag sgrub dang bral ba'i don gyis bslus pa'o //
T02D2257:254b-38: de dag kyang ji ltar spyad par bya zhe na /
T02D2257:254b-40: me 'byung ba'i rgyu ni spra ba ste byung ba'i
T02D2257:254b-41: me de nyid kyis ni spra ba nyid la 'bar
T02D2257:254b-42: zhing sreg go // de bzhin du sems la snang ba'i chos de dag byung ste /
T02D2257:254b-43: 'byung ba'i sems nyid de dag snang ba la rab tu thim mo //
T02D2257:255a-1: dngos po rang gi mtshan nyid la gdams pa bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:255a-2: kye ma ho gzhan yid ma yin gzhan ma yin //
T02D2257:255a-3: rnal 'byor spyod pa skyes dang bral ba ste //
T02D2257:255a-4: bdag po bzang zhing rang bzhin mdzes chags pa /
T02D2257:255a-5: yid kyis gang ba'i sems de rnal ma nyid //
T02D2257:255a-6: chags dang chags bral med pas gnyug mar gzhug / sems mnyam pas na rnal 'byor ngas ma mthong //
T02D2257:255a-7: za zhing 'thungs la bsam pa gang yang med //
T02D2257:255a-8: grogs mo de ni sems pa gang gnas pa //
T02D2257:255a-9: phyi rol par sems sdug bsngal dag gis 'dzin //
T02D2257:255a-10: sgyu ma'i rnam pa dang ni dpe dang bral //
T02D2257:255a-11: bya ba 'di tsam zhig du ma sems kye //
T02D2257:255a-12: rtsol ba gang la dbyer med pa yi klong //
T02D2257:255a-13: klong ni sgo gsum gang du 'ang dri ma med //
T02D2257:255a-14: zla ba chu 'dzag nor bu rang dbang min //
T02D2257:255a-15: thabs kyis rgyal srid kun la dbang sgyur ba //
T02D2257:255a-16: sems nyid de ni grub pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
T02D2257:255a-17: lhan cig skyes pa'i sdom pa shes par bya //
T02D2257:255a-18: yi ge pa yis 'gro ba ma lus khyab //
T02D2257:255a-19: kun la yi ge med pa gcig kyang med //
T02D2257:255a-20: ji srid yi ge med par gyur pa na //
T02D2257:255a-21: de srid yi ge dam pa rab tu shes //
T02D2257:255a-22: yi ge dag par shes pas snag tsha yal //
T02D2257:255a-23: rtsol med rig byed 'don pa'i don de nyams //
T02D2257:255a-24: dang po sems dang cig shos mi shes na //
T02D2257:255a-25: gang nas shar ba gang du nub par byed //
T02D2257:255a-26: ji ltar phyi rol de ltar rab shes na //
T02D2257:255a-27: bcu bzhi pa yi sa la rgyun du gnas //
T02D2257:255a-29: 'khor ba'i sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i tshig bos te /
T02D2257:255a-30: kye ma ho de kho na nyid ni gzhan gyi yid ma yin te /
T02D2257:255a-31: gzhan gyi yid ma yin na mtshungs pas tha dad par yang mi 'gyur te /
T02D2257:255a-32: gzhan ma yin pa thob par yang mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2257:255a-33: don rnal ma de nyid ni thog ma nyid nas 'byor ba ste /
T02D2257:255a-34: 'di nyid kyi spyod pa ni rnam par dag pa'i de kho na nyid do //
T02D2257:255a-35: 'di dag skye ba dang bral te 'gags pa de bzhin no //
T02D2257:255a-36: don de'i bdag po ni ma bcos pa ste bzang
T02D2257:255a-37: po yin zhing chos sku rang bzhin dang ldan no
T02D2257:255a-38: // de dag kyang bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis mdzes
T02D2257:255a-39: par byas shing snying rje chen po chags pa la
T02D2257:255a-40: // gnas par bya'o // tha dad kyi rnam par
T02D2257:255b-0: rtog @255b pas brtags pa'i sems ni yul gyis gang
T02D2257:255b-1: // gnas par bya'o // ba ste / sems de dag gdungs shing sdug bsngal ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2257:255b-2: sdug bsngal thams cad skad cig gis gcod par byed pa ni rnal ma nyid do //
T02D2257:255b-3: de dag gi ngo bo nyid ni chags pa dang
T02D2257:255b-4: bcas pa dang bral ba gnyis su med pas de
T02D2257:255b-5: kho na nyid kyi don gnyug mar bzhugs shig pa'i
T02D2257:255b-6: tha tshig go // gang gi sems nyams pas na
T02D2257:255b-7: chos kyi sku'i mthu zad par byas pa ste de
T02D2257:255b-8: dag la de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor ngas
T02D2257:255b-9: tha tshig go // ma mthong ngo // de yang bsam gtan la rab tu gzhol pa'i rgyud las //
T02D2257:255b-10: sems nyams pas ni 'bras bu thams cad nyams //
T02D2257:255b-11: nyams pa med de chos sku zad pa byed //
T02D2257:255b-12: skad cig gcig la nus pa'i mthu 'phrogs te //
T02D2257:255b-13: dbyer med bsam gtan 'byung ba ma yin no //
T02D2257:255b-14: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir de bas na sems nyams par mi bya'o //
T02D2257:255b-15: las kyi phyag rgya tsam gyis chog par byed pa ni za zhing ste /
T02D2257:255b-16: de'i bde ba la zhen pa'i shes pa thung la
T02D2257:255b-17: lhag par zhen pa ni 'khor ba'i bde ba skyed
T02D2257:255b-19: mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsam pa gang skad cig kyang med do //
T02D2257:255b-20: grogs mo zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin bdag med ma'o //
T02D2257:255b-21: de dang bral ba'i shes pa 'di dang 'di na
T02D2257:255b-22: rtog cing shes pa gang gnas pa de ni phyi
T02D2257:255b-23: rol mu stegs pa dang khyad med de /
T02D2257:255b-24: de kho na nyid kyi sems sdug bsngal dag gis 'dzin par nges pa'o //
T02D2257:255b-25: 'di dag ni sgyu ma tsam du yang mtshon par mi bya'o //
T02D2257:255b-26: rnal ma nyid dang de nyid kyi ngo bor gdams par mi bya'o //
T02D2257:255b-28: de dang bral bar yang mi brtag go //
T02D2257:255b-29: de yang bya ba gtang ba ste bya ba 'di
T02D2257:255b-30: yin no zhes tshig tsam du yang ma sems kyi
T02D2257:255b-31: zhes gdams so // de dag ni rtsol bas ma
T02D2257:255b-32: btsal te zag pa med pa'i bde bas gang zag
T02D2257:255b-33: pa dang bcas pa'i bde ba dang stong pa dbyer
T02D2257:255b-35: 'di dag ni lus dang ngag dang yid gsum gyis
T02D2257:255b-36: brtag pa dang bral ba ste dri ma med pa'o
T02D2257:255b-37: // de dag kyang rtsa dang rlung dang thig les
T02D2257:255b-38: nyams su myong bar byas pa ni ma yin no
T02D2257:255b-39: // // de dag thams cad kyang 'di nyid kyi ngang yin te dri ma med do //
T02D2257:256a-0: tha mal gyi shes pa nyid kyi phyir 'dod chags chen po dang ma bcos @256a * //
T02D2257:256a-1: pa'i don zhe sdang gi bdag nyid dang /
T02D2257:256a-2: chos thams cad kyi mi shes pa'i gti mug chen
T02D2257:256a-3: po ste 'di dag ni ngo bo nyid yin te
T02D2257:256a-5: de dag nyams su myong bar bya ba ni dang
T02D2257:256a-6: po shes pa rtsol sgrub dang bral bar bya ba
T02D2257:256a-7: dang / de nas ma bcos pa'i bdag nyid yongs su shes par bya ba dang /
T02D2257:256a-8: tha mar nyams dang rtog ge pa dang bral ba ste /
T02D2257:256a-9: 'di dag thams cad ni gnyug ma'i ngo bo la
T02D2257:256a-10: brjod pa yin pa'i phyir 'jug pa'i sgo tsam du
T02D2257:256a-11: zad kyi gang du yang dri ma med do //
T02D2257:256a-12: de dag rtog pa las sgrib pa rnam pa gnyis skad cig ma gcig la gcod par 'gyur te ;
T02D2257:256a-13: dper na zla ba'i rgya mtsho dag gi nang na
T02D2257:256a-14: chu'i nor bu gnas pa de dag la zla ba'i
T02D2257:256a-15: 'od kyis phog pa'i dus su chu 'byung ste rang
T02D2257:256a-16: yod pa ni ma yin no //
T02D2257:256a-17: dper na rgyal po dag gi stan la thabs kyis
T02D2257:256a-18: de dag gi steng du phyin na rgyal po'i srid
T02D2257:256a-19: kun la dbang sgyur ba bzhin du sems de kho
T02D2257:256a-20: na nyid de ni bla ma'i gdams ngag gis bsgrub
T02D2257:256a-21: par byas pa'i rnal 'byor pa de dag gis lhan
T02D2257:256a-22: cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyi sdom pa ci yang
T02D2257:256a-23: ma yin par shes par byas nas sku gsum gyi
T02D2257:256a-24: 'khor lo thams cad la dbang sgyur bar 'gyur ro
T02D2257:256a-25: // de dag rtog par 'gyur ba yin nam zhe na /
T02D2257:256a-26: pa ta ra te yi ge'o //
T02D2257:256a-27: de dag gi don ni nus pa dang ldan pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D2257:256a-28: de dag ni chags pa dang bral zhing ma 'dres
T02D2257:256a-29: pa'i don rnam par dag pa'i phyir de dag gis
T02D2257:256a-30: 'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad la khyab po
T02D2257:256a-31: // de bas na snang grags kyi chos kun la yi ge med pa gcig kyang med do //
T02D2257:256a-32: yi ge nyid kyang yod pa ma yin nam zhe na /
T02D2257:256a-33: ji srid du yi ge yod par gyur pa de
T02D2257:256a-34: srid du gnas pa ji srid yi ge med par
T02D2257:256a-35: gyur te / med pa ni yod pa yin pa'i
T02D2257:256a-36: phyir de srid yi ge dam pa rab tu shes
T02D2257:256a-37: gyur te / so // de'i brda tha snyad dang
T02D2257:256a-38: bral ba la ni yi ge dag par shes pa
T02D2257:256a-39: ste nyams su myong du med pa'i phyir snag tsha
T02D2257:256a-40: gyur te / so // yal lo // gzhan dag
T02D2257:256a-41: ni gcol la med pa'i phyir mu stegs kyi rig
T02D2257:256a-43: 'gro ba 'don par 'dod pa des rang nyid kyi
T02D2257:256a-44: don de nyid kyang nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro
T02D2257:256a-45: // de bas na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs
T02D2257:256b-0: pa @256b dam pa tha mal gyi shes pa 'di
T02D2257:256b-1: // dag sems dang / cig shos bde ba chen
T02D2257:256b-2: po'i rang bzhin de kho na nyid mi shes na
T02D2257:256b-3: snang ba'i chos 'di dag thams cad gang nas shar
T02D2257:256b-4: ba yin la gang du nub par byed do //
T02D2257:256b-5: de bas na ji ltar phyi rol gyi snang grags
T02D2257:256b-6: kyi chos de dag thams cad sems nyid gnyug ma'i
T02D2257:256b-7: ngo bo de ltar rab tu shes nas phung po
T02D2257:256b-8: lnga la rigs lnga'i rgya dang /
T02D2257:256b-9: de la mi bskyod pa'i rgya dang /
T02D2257:256b-10: de la rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i rgya dang /
T02D2257:256b-11: de la bde ba chen po'i rgya dang /
T02D2257:256b-12: ci yang ma yin par rtogs pa ste bcu bzhi pa'i sa la rgyun du gnas so //
T02D2257:256b-13: da ni bdag nyid rnam par dag pa bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:256b-14: lus med lus la svara med sbas pa ste //
T02D2257:256b-15: gang gis de shes de ni grol bar 'gyur //
T02D2257:256b-16: nga yis grub pa'i yi ge nag po ston //
T02D2257:256b-17: khu ba 'thungs pas nga ni brjed par 'gyur /
T02D2257:256b-18: gang gis bltar med yi ge gcig shes na //
T02D2257:256b-19: de yi ming ni bdag gis mi shes so //
T02D2257:256b-20: zhes bya ba'i don ni gnyug ma'i de kho na
T02D2257:256b-21: nyid la snang ba 'grub pa med pas lus med
T02D2257:256b-22: do // sems nyid du grub pa med pas lus la sbar med do //
T02D2257:256b-23: de yang dam pa'i gdams ngag la rag las pas sbas pa ste /
T02D2257:256b-24: skal pa dang ldan pa dag gis bla ma'i zhal gyi bdud rtsi 'thungs te /
T02D2257:256b-25: gnyug ma'i de kho na nyid shes nas bdag nyid grol zhing gzhan grol bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2257:256b-26: gang gi tshe bdag tu gnas pa de ni chos
T02D2257:256b-27: sku ste pa'i tha mal gyi shes pa grub pa'i
T02D2257:256b-28: yi ge mi 'gyur ba'i phyir nag po ste /
T02D2257:256b-29: de dag khyad par du 'gyur ba'i gang zag la ston pa'i phyir khu ba'o //
T02D2257:256b-30: de dag ni ci yang ma yin pa'i tshul du 'thung ba'i nga bdag ni brjed par 'gyur ro //
T02D2257:256b-31: yi ge nag po de nyid kyang sangs rgyas la sogs pa gang gis kyang bltar med de /
T02D2257:256b-32: rang bzhin gyis kha dog can gyi yi ge gcig
T02D2257:256b-33: shes nas de'i ming ni bdag gis mi shes pas
T02D2257:256b-34: dngos por grub pa lta ga la yod de med
T02D2257:256b-35: do zhes rje btsun pa dag gis gsungs so //
T02D2257:256b-36: da ni de kho na nyid rab tu gsal ba bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:256b-37: nags khrod gsum na yi ge nag po gcig / yi ge gsum gyi dbus na blta bar bya //
T02D2257:256b-38: gang zhig gsum la bab pa'i ngo bo ni //
T02D2257:257a-0: @257a * // gdol pa'i rig byed bzhi yang de yin no //
T02D2257:257a-2: nags zhes bya ba'i don ni sha'o //
T02D2257:257a-3: khrod ni rus pa'i tshogs ma lus pa'o //
T02D2257:257a-4: gsum na zhes bya ba ni rtsa rlung thig le'o //
T02D2257:257a-5: yi ge ni bde stong dbyer med do //
T02D2257:257a-6: nag po ni mi 'gyur ba'i don to //
T02D2257:257a-7: gcig ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas nyag gcig go //
T02D2257:257a-8: de dag la yi ge gsum du gnas te /
T02D2257:257a-12: de dag kyang rnam gsum du brjod de /
T02D2257:257a-13: lus dang ngag dang yid gsum mo ;
T02D2257:257a-14: / de dag kyang gti mug chen po dang sems nyid kyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir dbus so //
T02D2257:257a-15: de yang tha mal gyi shes par bzhag nas mnyam pa dang mi shes pa dang /
T02D2257:257a-16: bltar med pa'i ngo bo gsum du blta bar bya'o //
T02D2257:257a-17: skal ba dang ldan pa gang zhig gis yi ge
T02D2257:257a-18: gsum la gnas pa'i rang bzhin de dag la bab
T02D2257:257a-19: pa ni de'i ngo bo nyid kyi ha ra ta'o
T02D2257:257a-20: // de dag gi don ni thams cad dang ldan zhing khas mi len pa ste /
T02D2257:257a-21: de dag gdol pa'i rig byed dur khrod kyi ltas
T02D2257:257a-22: dang ro'i mtshan nyid dang 'degs pa'i go rims dang
T02D2257:257a-23: / 'degs pa'i dus bzhi yang de nyid yin te /
T02D2257:257a-24: gzhan dag la lta smos ci dgos so //
T02D2257:257a-25: da ni bde ba las byung ba'i lam bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:257a-26: kun du ru skabs bde chen grub pa ni //
T02D2257:257a-27: ji ltar bsgom pa'i smig rgyu snyegs pa bzhin //
T02D2257:257a-28: skom nas 'chi ste nam mkha'i chu rnyed dag / rdo rje padma gnyis kyi dbus gnas pa //
T02D2257:257a-29: bde ba gang gis rnam par bskyed pa ni //
T02D2257:257a-30: ci ste de bstan nus pa med pas na //
T02D2257:257a-31: sa gsum gang du rdzogs su re ba lags //
T02D2257:257a-32: yang na thabs kyi bde ba skad cig ma //
T02D2257:257a-33: yang na de gnyis gnyis su 'gyur ba ste //
T02D2257:257a-34: bla ma'i drin gyis slar yang nyid la ni //
T02D2257:257a-35: brgya lam 'gal ba'i shes rab ga la 'gyur //
T02D2257:257a-37: kun du ru ste sems can thams cad kyi sems
T02D2257:257a-38: chos kyi sku yin pa'i phyir dbang po'i sgo mnyam
T02D2257:257a-39: par sbyar ba las lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba
T02D2257:257a-40: skyed pa de dag bla ma'i man ngag gis skabs
T02D2257:257b-0: phye ste / bde ba chen po rgyas @257b btab
T02D2257:257b-1: nas de kho na nyid grub pa ni nyams su
T02D2257:257b-2: myong du yod kyang thob tu med pa ste /
T02D2257:257b-3: ji ltar skom pa dag gis smig rgyu mthong zhing
T02D2257:257b-4: rnyog pa bzhin du chu'i don byed ma nus te
T02D2257:257b-5: thob tu med pas skom nas 'chi'o //
T02D2257:257b-6: de dag rnyed par yang ma rig ste na ma mkha'i chu dang 'dra ste /
T02D2257:257b-8: man ngag las byung ba gzhan dag 'bras bu rnyed par yang mi 'gyur te /
T02D2257:257b-9: kun du ru zhes bya ba ni drag po'i sbyor ba'o //
T02D2257:257b-10: de dag gis skad ma cig gcig gi skabs la
T02D2257:257b-11: nyams su myong ba srid kyang phyag rgya chen po'i
T02D2257:257b-12: bde ba grub pa'i rnal ma ni mi 'byung ste
T02D2257:257b-13: / dper na skom pa dag gis smig rgyu'i chu
T02D2257:257b-14: rnyed pa gzhan du don byed par mi nus te
T02D2257:257b-15: / skom nas 'chi'o // de dag kyang bde ba
T02D2257:257b-16: chen po nam mkha' lta bu'i bla ma'i gdams ngag
T02D2257:257b-18: 'dod pa dag la zhen pa'i phyir dam pa ngag gis bsten par bya ba yang ma yin no //
T02D2257:257b-19: de bas na 'bras bu chen por mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2257:257b-20: de bas na stong pa dang bde ba dbyer med
T02D2257:257b-21: pa'i 'byung gnas rdo rje dang padmo snyoms par zhugs
T02D2257:257b-22: pa'i dbus dag na lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes
T02D2257:257b-24: de dag lam du khyer ba'i bde ba de dag
T02D2257:257b-25: la zhen pas bde ba las kyi phyag rgya gang
T02D2257:257b-26: gis gnas nas skyed pa de ni ci ste de
T02D2257:257b-27: dag la de kho na nyid kyi don bstan du
T02D2257:257b-28: yod dam / rtog pa 'ba' zhig la longs spyod pa'i phyir med pas na'o //
T02D2257:257b-29: de'i phyir nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba dang theg
T02D2257:257b-30: pa chen po'i sa gsum gang du rdzogs su re
T02D2257:257b-31: ba lags so // de dag ni bslab pa dang
T02D2257:257b-32: mi ldan zhing bye brag gi cha ma rtogs pa
T02D2257:257b-33: ba lags so // dang / 'khor ba mi brtag
T02D2257:257b-34: pa'i rnal ma la yid byung ba med pa dang
T02D2257:257b-35: ba lags so // dang / / bden pa rnam pa gnyis zung du 'jug pa med pa dang /
T02D2257:257b-36: bde ba chen po'i don ma rtogs pa'i 'bras bu
T02D2257:257b-37: sku gsum gyi bdag nyid thob pa ma yin no
T02D2257:257b-38: // de bas na thams cad kyi brten byed pa ma yin nam zhe na /
T02D2257:257b-39: yang na lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes ngos 'dzin
T02D2257:257b-40: pa'i thabs su lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D2257:257b-41: bde ba skad cig ma de dag la brten nas
T02D2257:257b-42: zag pa med pa'i bde ba de yang na'am phyis
T02D2257:257b-43: kyi dus su de dag la zhen pa med pas
T02D2257:258a-0: bde ba dang / stong pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa gnyis su @258a * //
T02D2257:258a-1: med par 'gyur pas stong pa dang /
T02D2257:258a-2: bde ba dbyer med pa phyed pa de dag bla
T02D2257:258a-3: ma dam pa'i bka' drin gyi zhal gyi bdud rtsi'i
T02D2257:258a-4: gdams ngag dam pa de dag nyams su myong bar
T02D2257:258a-5: slar yang bstan pa'i don de nyid pa ni brjod
T02D2257:258a-6: par bya ba gang zag brgya 'am gcig gis kyang
T02D2257:258a-8: de ltar nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa bstan nas /
T02D2257:258a-9: da ni 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa'i bdag nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02D2257:258a-10: grogs dag zab mo dang ni rgya che ba //
T02D2257:258a-11: gzhan gyis bdag nyid rtogs pa ma yin te //
T02D2257:258a-12: lhan cig skyes pas zhi ba'i dus kyi tshe //
T02D2257:258a-13: gnyug ma nyams su myong bas rab tu shes //
T02D2257:258a-14: mun nag chen por zla ba'i nor bu ni //
T02D2257:258a-15: ji ltar 'char bar byed pa bzhin du mdzes //
T02D2257:258a-16: mchog tu bde chen skad cig gcig la ni //
T02D2257:258a-17: sdug bsngal ma lus pham par byed pa'o //
T02D2257:258a-18: sdug bsngal snang byed sems la nub pa na //
T02D2257:258a-19: grol ba'i bdag po gza' dang mnyam du shar //
T02D2257:258a-20: 'di ltar sprul pa'i bdag nyid sprul pa ni //
T02D2257:258a-21: de ni dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dam pa'o //
T02D2257:258a-23: skal pa dang ldan pa'i gang zag la grogs dag ces pos te /
T02D2257:258a-24: don zab mo rgya mtsho lta bu dang /
T02D2257:258a-25: nam mkha' lta bu'i rgya che ba'i rnam pa de
T02D2257:258a-26: dag bdag tu 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i shes pa
T02D2257:258a-27: gzhan dag gis de kho na nyid kyi bdag nyid
T02D2257:258a-29: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyi de kho na
T02D2257:258a-30: nyid skyes pas nyon mongs par rnam par rtog pa
T02D2257:258a-31: zhi ba'i dus de nyid kyi tshe na gnyug ma'i
T02D2257:258a-32: de kho na nyid nyams su myong bas rab tu
T02D2257:258a-33: shes so // dper na mun nag chen po'i gnas
T02D2257:258a-34: su chu shel gyi zla ba'i nor bu'i 'od ni
T02D2257:258a-35: ji ltar 'char bar byed pa de nyid kyi dus
T02D2257:258a-36: na mun pa thams cad nges par bcom ste /
T02D2257:258a-37: bsil zhing dang la 'od kyi rgyun gsal bar byed
T02D2257:258a-38: pa bzhin du de kho na nyid de yang de
T02D2257:258a-39: ltar mdzes pa'o // de ltar yon tan thams cad
T02D2257:258a-40: kyi mchog tu gyur pa'i bde ba chen po skad
T02D2257:258a-41: cig ma gcig la ni sdug bsngal ma lus pa
T02D2257:258a-43: sdug bsngal 'byung ba'i rgyun snang ba'i rnam pa byed
T02D2257:258a-44: pa'i ngo bo thams cad sems la nub par 'gyur
T02D2257:258a-45: te de ni chos kyi sku'o //
T02D2257:258b-0: @258b sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T02D2257:258b-1: grol ba'i bdag po ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o
T02D2257:258b-2: // gza' skar gyi rnam pa lta bu sprul pa'i
T02D2257:258b-3: sku ste de dag dang mnyam du shar bar 'gyur
T02D2257:258b-4: // ro // der yang ma zad de khams gsum thams cad ni sku gsum pa'o //
T02D2257:258b-5: de ltar sprul pa'i bdag nyid ci yang ma yin pa dang /
T02D2257:258b-6: sprul pa'i sku 'gro 'ong gi rnam pa can dang
T02D2257:258b-7: de thams cad ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor
T02D2257:258b-8: ro // dkyil 'khor gyi sku dang bcas pa ste 'khor lo dam pa'o //
T02D2257:258b-9: de'i phyir chos kyi sku ni rtogs pa'i grub pa yin te /
T02D2257:258b-10: gzugs sku rnam pa gnyis ni shugs kyis grub pa yin no //
T02D2257:258b-11: de bas na yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo 'di
T02D2257:258b-12: ni skad cig ma gcig dang skye ba 'di dang
T02D2257:258b-13: bar mdo'i gnas su thob par byed pa'o //
T02D2257:258b-14: da ni 'bras bu khyad par can du grub pa bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:258b-15: kye ho rmongs pa'i sems kyi sems rtog na /
T02D2257:258b-16: lta ba ngan pa thams cad rang grol te //
T02D2257:258b-17: mchog tu bde chen de tsam zhig tu bas //
T02D2257:258b-18: de yi dbang gis dngos grub dam pa'o //
T02D2257:258b-20: kye ho zhes khams gsum pa rnams la gdams pas
T02D2257:258b-21: de tha dad kyi rtog pas bsgribs pa'i rmongs pa
T02D2257:258b-22: rnams kyis rang gi sems kyi rang gi de kho
T02D2257:258b-23: na nyid rtogs nas bdag tu lta ba la sogs
T02D2257:258b-24: pa'i lta ba ngan pa thams cad rang grol bar
T02D2257:258b-25: gyur te / mchog tu bde ba chen po'i rang
T02D2257:258b-26: bzhin chos kyi sku de dag ni thob tu med
T02D2257:258b-27: gyur te / pa ste // grol ba de tsam zhig tu bas so //
T02D2257:258b-28: dper na skyes bu nad sos pa tsam la nang med pa thob po zhes pa dang 'dra'o //
T02D2257:258b-29: grol ba tsam gyis thob pa dang dngos grub yin nam zhe na /
T02D2257:258b-30: de nyid thob pa'i dbang gis dngos grub mchog tu gyur pa ste /
T02D2257:258b-32: da ni de kho na nyid kyi skyon bsal bar bya ste /
T02D2257:258b-33: rdo rje sems dpa' yod dang med mi rtog / rtogs dang rtogs byed 'phags dang sangs rgyas min //
T02D2257:258b-34: mi rtag dang dgar gzhag pa kun du bzang //
T02D2257:258b-35: bcos pa bsgrims pas de nyid de mi rtogs //
T02D2257:258b-36: gzhag dang ma sgribs de med rtogs med mthong //
T02D2257:258b-37: gal te nyams myong dang po'i dus skyes kyang //
T02D2257:259a-0: @259a * // de la myong bar 'dzin pa de med de //
T02D2257:259a-1: sangs rgyas ye shes de dag dag la yang //
T02D2257:259a-2: 'phags pa rnams dang sangs rgyas bdag nyid ni //
T02D2257:259a-3: grub pa med de dgos pa'i don du brtags //
T02D2257:259a-7: da ni kun du bzang ba'i ngo bo nyid yin
T02D2257:259a-8: pa'i phyir sems nyid ma bcos pa gnyug ma'i ngo
T02D2257:259a-9: bo nyid ji lta ba la bya'o //
T02D2257:259a-10: de la yod pa dang med pa yang mi rtog go //
T02D2257:259a-11: gang la rtog pa dang gang gis rtogs par byed pa ste /
T02D2257:259a-12: de dag thams cad ni 'phags pa yang ma yin la sangs rgyas kyang min no //
T02D2257:259a-13: rang gi shes pas ma brtags shing rang dgar gzhag pa ni 'di ni kun du bzang po'o //
T02D2257:259a-14: bcos dang bsgribs pas ni mtha' ngan pa la brtags pa ste de nyid de yis mi rtogs so //
T02D2257:259a-15: de yang shes pa rnal ma la gzhag pa dang
T02D2257:259a-16: glod cing ma sgrims pa de nyid kyis rtogs su
T02D2257:259a-17: med pa'i don mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2257:259a-18: gal te rnal 'byor pa dag gi shes pa la
T02D2257:259a-19: nyams su myong ba'i bde ba dang po'i dus su
T02D2257:259a-20: skyes kyang de la myong ba dang zhen par 'dzin
T02D2257:259a-22: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes de kho na nyid la yang sems can du grub pa ma yin no //
T02D2257:259a-23: 'phags pa rnams su grub pa dang //
T02D2257:259a-24: sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid du grub pa ni med de /
T02D2257:259a-26: yid la byar med cing ci yang ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2257:259a-27: de dag gis ci byed ce na /
T02D2257:259a-28: ma rtogs pa'i sems can rtogs par bya ba'i phyir
T02D2257:259a-29: dgos pas don de dag tu brtags shing khas blangs
T02D2257:259a-30: pa ste / de bzhin nyid la ni zug rdu kho nar zad do //
T02D2257:259a-31: da ni dpes mtshon pa bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:259a-32: gyad kyi gtsug na nor bu de yod kyang //
T02D2257:259a-33: nor bu ma mthong mchog ston skyes bu ste //
T02D2257:259a-34: bdag las gzhan na rdzogs sangs rgyas med kyang //
T02D2257:259a-35: rtog pa bsal phyir 'phags pa bstan te bsgrub //
T02D2257:259a-36: de bsal dus na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te //
T02D2257:259a-37: 'bras bu de nyid bdag las thob pa'o //
T02D2257:259a-38: 'khrul pas brtags nas logs nas grub pa 'dra //
T02D2257:259a-39: de phyir sems dang 'khrul rtog der shes dang //
T02D2257:259a-40: shes pa med pa mnyam pa de dang bral //
T02D2257:259b-0: de ni bla ma @259b dag las mngon par rtogs //
T02D2257:259b-1: rtogs pas mtshon dang gang dang ldan pa min //
T02D2257:259b-2: sems kyi glang po gang dgar yan du chug / de yi mtshan nyid bdag gis bdag la dris //
T02D2257:259b-3: dris pa'i don de rjes su dran pa na //
T02D2257:259b-4: de ni de la rtog pas ma dri shig /
T02D2257:259b-5: ces bya ba'i don ni dper na gyad stobs po
T02D2257:259b-6: che'i spyi gtsug na nor bu rin po che de
T02D2257:259b-7: dag yod kyang nor bu de dag ma mthong ste
T02D2257:259b-9: nor bu rin po che mchog ston par byed pa
T02D2257:259b-10: ni me long dang ldan pa'i skyes bu ste skad
T02D2257:259b-11: cig ma de nyid la phongs pa'i sdug bsngal dang
T02D2257:259b-12: bral ba'o // de bzhin du chos kyi sku'i nor
T02D2257:259b-13: bu dam pa de dag rang nyid la yod de
T02D2257:259b-14: bral ba'o // / bdag las gzhan na rdzogs pa'i
T02D2257:259b-15: sangs rgyas de lta bu med kyang rnam par rtog
T02D2257:259b-16: pa'i bag chags 'thug po bsal ba'i phyir bla ma
T02D2257:259b-17: dam pa dang 'phags pa la sogs pa'i yul la
T02D2257:259b-18: bral ba'o // / brten te / me long lta
T02D2257:259b-19: bu'i gdams ngag las sangs rgyas kyi de kho na
T02D2257:259b-20: nyid rab tu bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2257:259b-21: de lta bus rnam rtog de dag bsal zhing grol
T02D2257:259b-22: ba'i dus na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin te sdug
T02D2257:259b-23: bsngal ma lus pa dang bral lo //
T02D2257:259b-24: de ltar phun sum tshogs pa'i 'bras bu de nyid bdag las thob pa ste /
T02D2257:259b-25: tha dad kyi 'khrul pas logs nas grub pa kho na 'dra'o //
T02D2257:259b-26: de'i phyir sems dang 'khrul par rtog pa thams cad
T02D2257:259b-27: gnyug ma'i ngo bo nyid der shes pa dang de
T02D2257:259b-28: yang shes pa med pa'i don gyis mnyam par gzhag
T02D2257:259b-29: go // de yang nyams su myong ba dang tha snyad kyi rnam pa dag dang bral lo //
T02D2257:259b-30: de ni bla ma dam pa dag gi zhal gyi bdud rtsi las mngon par rtogs so //
T02D2257:259b-31: rtogs pa de dag slob pa po'i blo las mtshon
T02D2257:259b-32: du zad kyang mtshon pa dang gang gi tha snyad
T02D2257:259b-33: kyi rnam pa dang ldan pa yin no //
T02D2257:259b-35: sems kyi glang po che gar dgar yan du chug cig pa'o //
T02D2257:259b-36: de dag gi mtshan nyid ni brjod pa dang tha snyad kyis gtan la dbab par mi nus te /
T02D2257:259b-37: bdag nyid kyi blo yis bdag nyid la dris shig pa'o //
T02D2257:259b-38: dris pa'i don de dag ci yang ma yin par
T02D2257:259b-39: 'dug pa dang don de nyid dus thams cad du
T02D2257:259b-40: rjes su dran pa na bla na med pa'i rtogs
T02D2257:260a-0: de la de kho na nyid kyi don de @260a * //
T02D2257:260a-1: ngag rtogs pas zug rdu gyur pa'i phyir ma 'dri shig pa'o //
T02D2257:260a-2: da ni sems grub pa med pa'i tshul gyis mtshon pa de nyid bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:260a-3: nam mkha'i ri bo chu 'thung 'dra ba'i sems //
T02D2257:260a-4: de yis 'gram du zhog cig rang dga' bar //
T02D2257:260a-5: yul gyi dbang po lag pas blangs nas su //
T02D2257:260a-6: de ni ji ltar gsod par snang bar 'gyur //
T02D2257:260a-7: rnal 'byor pa ni glang po skyong ba bzhin //
T02D2257:260a-8: de nyid las ni ldog par 'gyur yid bzhin //
T02D2257:260a-9: 'khor ba de nyid mya ngan 'das par nges //
T02D2257:260a-10: dbye bas gzhan du sems pa ma yin te //
T02D2257:260a-11: rang bzhin gcig gis dbye ba rnam par spangs //
T02D2257:260a-12: dri med nga yis rab tu rtogs yid kyis //
T02D2257:260a-13: de nyid dmigs bcas dmigs med stong nyid yin //
T02D2257:260a-14: gnyis las skyon ni yod pa ma yin te //
T02D2257:260a-15: rnal 'byor pa ni gang zhig pa bsgom pa yin //
T02D2257:260a-16: bsgom bya dmigs dang bcas pa dmigs med de //
T02D2257:260a-17: bde ba'i rnam pa'i rang bzhin de yin no //
T02D2257:260a-18: rab tu bla med ye shes rang 'byung ba //
T02D2257:260a-19: bla ma'i man ngag dus thabs bsten par shes //
T02D2257:260a-20: zhes bya ba'i don ni nam mkha'i chos kyi sku'i rnam par brjod pa'o //
T02D2257:260a-21: de bas na thams cad de nyid yin pa'i phyir
T02D2257:260a-22: ri bo nam mkha' la gzhag pa bzhin rnal 'byor
T02D2257:260a-23: pa'i sems rten med par bya ba kho na'o //
T02D2257:260a-24: dam pa dag gi gdams ngag gi chu 'thungs shing goms par bya ba dang /
T02D2257:260a-25: de 'dra ba'i sems de dag dran pa rgyun chags kyis dus rtag tu khyer ba'i phyir /
T02D2257:260a-26: gsal ba'i rnam pas dran pa'i 'gram du zhog cig pa'o //
T02D2257:260a-27: de yang rang dga'i tshul gyis so //
T02D2257:260a-28: de yang dbang po dang yul thug pa'i dus yul
T02D2257:260a-29: gyi bdag nyid dbang po'i rnam pa thams cad kyang
T02D2257:260a-30: dran pa'i lag pas blangs nas su yul dang dbang
T02D2257:260a-31: po de ni rang bzhin gnyug ma'i ji lta bar
T02D2257:260a-33: rnal 'byor pa dag gi ni shes pa glang po
T02D2257:260a-34: che lta bu dag bde ba chen po'i rtsal gar
T02D2257:260a-35: dgar bskyang bar bya ba ste rgyal po'i glang po
T02D2257:260a-36: bzhin no // de yang snang srid thams cad gnyug
T02D2257:260a-37: ma'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir shes pa de
T02D2257:260a-38: dag de nas ni dang gis ldog par 'gyur ro
T02D2257:260b-0: bzhin no // // de yang ched @260b du brtul ba lta bu ni ma yin te /
T02D2257:260b-1: yid bzhin du ldog par 'gyur ro //
T02D2257:260b-2: de bas na 'khor ba de nyid mya ngan las
T02D2257:260b-3: 'das par skye ba'i phyir rnam par rtog pa'i tha
T02D2257:260b-4: dad kyi dbye bas gzhan du shes pa ni ma
T02D2257:260b-5: yin te / bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gcig
T02D2257:260b-6: gis rtogs pa'i dbye ba rnam par spangs par bya
T02D2257:260b-7: yin te / ste / 'di dag ni shugs kyis 'gyur ba kho na'o //
T02D2257:260b-8: snying po'i don ni dri ma med pas rab tu
T02D2257:260b-9: rtogs te de ni yid kyi ye shes kho na
T02D2257:260b-10: nyid do // de nyid ni dmigs bcas so //
T02D2257:260b-13: de dag skyon dang bcas pa ma yin nam zhe na /
T02D2257:260b-14: lta ba de kho na nyid rab tu mi bsgrub pa'i phyir dgag bya rnam par mi gcod do //
T02D2257:260b-15: gnyis las gzhan pa gcig khas blangs kyang skyon ni yod pa ma yin te /
T02D2257:260b-16: rnal 'byor pa dag gi de nyid ni thams cad
T02D2257:260b-17: dang ldan zhing gang du yang khas mi len pa'i
T02D2257:260b-18: phyir gang du bsgoms pa ma yin te min pa'i
T02D2257:260b-19: phyir ro // de'i phyir bsgom par bya ba ni dmigs pa dang bcas pa dang /
T02D2257:260b-20: dmigs pa med pa ni ma yin te /
T02D2257:260b-21: bde ba chen po'i rnam pa'i rang bzhin de dag gzhan du brjod pa yang ma yin no //
T02D2257:260b-22: de nyid kyi ngo bo de ni chos kyi sku ste rab tu gyur pa bla na med pa'o //
T02D2257:260b-23: de yang gdod ma nas gnas pa'i phyir ye shes te /
T02D2257:260b-24: bcos ma yin pas na rang 'byung ba'o //
T02D2257:260b-25: de yang bla ma'i man ngag de dag nyams su
T02D2257:260b-26: myong ba'i dus kyis goms par bya ste thabs dran
T02D2257:260b-27: pa rgyun chags kyi dus thams cad du brten pas
T02D2257:260b-29: da ni sgrub par byed pa'i glu bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:260b-30: nags sum 'gro khyim du ma 'dug cig / bde ba la gnas gnas dag nyon mongs rgyu //
T02D2257:260b-31: dang po'i dus su btsal phyir de 'grub bya //
T02D2257:260b-32: btsal bas ma rnyed rnyed pas de 'dug min //
T02D2257:260b-33: 'khor los 'khor ba'i nags khrod dag tu rgyus ;

T02D2257:260b-35: de phyir khyim spangs bde dang sdug bsngal dor //
T02D2257:260b-36: sems kyi khyim du lta ba 'jug mi bya //
T02D2257:260b-37: bcug nas bde chags stong la zhen pas ldang //
T02D2257:260b-38: de spangs dbyer med mnyam pa'i rang bzhin gnas //
T02D2257:261a-1: yang de ru yid kyis yongs shes nas //
T02D2257:261a-2: ma lus rgyun tu rtogs pa de ni gnas //
T02D2257:261a-3: zhes bya ba'i don ni rab tu mi gnas pa'i rgyud las bshad pa lta bu ste /
T02D2257:261a-4: kye rnam 'byor stobs chen glang po seng ge yul //
T02D2257:261a-5: nags khrod dgon pa dag tu mi gnas par //
T02D2257:261a-6: grong khyer khyim gyi gnas su ma 'dug cig / chags pa'i nags la mngon par ma zhen par //
T02D2257:261a-7: khyim gyi zhe sdang dag la ma 'dug cig / gzung ba'i nags tshal dag tu ma 'gro bar //
T02D2257:261a-8: 'dzin pa'i khyim gyi rtags la ma 'dug cig / phyi rol nags kyi yul la ma lta bar //
T02D2257:261a-9: rang rig 'dzin pa'i khyim la ma rtog cig / ces 'byung ba lta bu la bya'o //
T02D2257:261a-10: de dag nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid kyi lus
T02D2257:261a-11: dang sems kyi bde ba la gnas na gnas pa

T02D2257:261a-14: bde ba de dag gi rang bzhin btsal bas ma
T02D2257:261a-15: rnyed de ma rnyed pa de dag rnyed pa'i mchog
T02D2257:261a-16: yin pas de dang ldan pa dag la ni der
T02D2257:261a-18: ji ltar gnas shing 'grub par bya zhe na /

T02D2257:261a-20: lus chags pa med par 'gro ba'i rnam pas chos
T02D2257:261a-21: kyi sku 'khor los 'khor ba'i nags khrod dag tu

T02D2257:261a-23: khyim dag tu gnas na chags pa dang zhe sdang 'phel bar 'gyur te /

T02D2257:261a-25: sdug bsngal dor bar 'dod pas sems kyi khyim du
T02D2257:261a-26: bdag tu lta bar mngon par gnas pas de dag
T02D2257:261a-27: thams cad dor la lta ba la mi 'jug par
T02D2257:261a-28: bya'o // bcug nas bde ba la chags shing stong
T02D2257:261a-29: pa la zhen pas zhe sdang 'phel bar 'gyur te
T02D2257:261a-30: bya'o // / de dag thams cad shugs kyis spangs
T02D2257:261a-31: la bde ba dang stong pa dbyer med pa la
T02D2257:261a-33: sems rnal ma rang bzhin gyis gnas par bya'o //
T02D2257:261a-34: gang yang de kho na nyid dag ni blo'i gting
T02D2257:261a-35: de ru yid kyi ye shes kyis yongs su shes
T02D2257:261a-36: na / phyi nang gi g-yeng ba ma lus pa
T02D2257:261b-0: rgyun du chos kyi @261b sku'i rtogs pa nyag gcig
T02D2257:261b-1: las mi mthun pa'i de'i gnas so //
T02D2257:261b-2: da ni mnyam pa'i don gyi glu bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:261b-3: 'khor ba gang yin mya ngan 'das pa gang //
T02D2257:261b-4: yid ni dri med lhan cig skyes pa yi //
T02D2257:261b-5: gnas skabs dgra bo'i rigs la 'jug pa med //
T02D2257:261b-6: de tsam zhig la nges pas gnas pa ni //
T02D2257:261b-7: de yi rgyal po yin te bye brag med //
T02D2257:261b-8: rtogs pa nags dang khyim na gnas pa min //
T02D2257:261b-9: 'di ltar bya ba de nyid shes gyur na //
T02D2257:261b-10: dri ma med pa'i nge sems rang bzhin gyis //
T02D2257:261b-11: ma lus mi rtog par ni shes par byos //
T02D2257:261b-12: de ni bdag yin gzhan yang de nyid do //
T02D2257:261b-13: gang bsgoms yongs su bsgoms pa'ang de nyid yin //
T02D2257:261b-14: bde ba'i de nyid dang ni bral bar byas //
T02D2257:261b-15: 'on kyang bdag nyid rnam par grol pa'o //

T02D2257:261b-17: nyams su myong ba na 'khor ba gang yin mya
T02D2257:261b-18: ngan las 'das pa gang yin te gnyis su med

T02D2257:261b-20: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid do //

T02D2257:261b-28: ji ltar spyod par bya zhe na /

T02D2257:262a-22: sems ni ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa yis//
