T02D2257:262a-31: mkhas pa rnams la shar dang nub med de //
T02D2257:262a-32: snang grags sems su shes shing der mi 'dzin //
T02D2257:262a-33: mtshan nyid shes med shes pas 'ching mi dgos //
T02D2257:262a-34: de phyir blo ldan rnams la ngang gis 'byung //

T02D2257:262a-40: phyi rol snang ba'i tshogs dpag tu med pa cig

T02D2257:263b-5: zhes snying rjes kun nas bslang ba 'am ye shes
T02D2257:263b-6: kyi rgyun las btang ba ni min no //
T02D2257:263b-7: de'i phyir rjes las thob pa ni mi mnga' bar nges te /
T02D2257:263b-8: gal te rjes las thob pa yod par 'dod na
T02D2257:263b-9: ni ma thar thug pa'i 'bras bu rang rig rang
T02D2257:263b-10: gsal bar 'dod pa ste 'bras bu chos kyi sku
T02D2257:263b-11: mi 'byung ngo // de dag las slar yang 'bad
T02D2257:263b-12: pa ci rnyed cig byas kyang rtsa ba chos kyi
T02D2257:263b-13: sku mi 'byung zhing gzugs sku rnam pa gnyis kyi
T02D2257:263b-15: de lta bu'i don la dmigs par byed ba gang
T02D2257:263b-16: yin pa de ni mtha'i rnam par rtog pa der
T02D2257:263b-17: lhung ba yin pas des ni chos kyi sku mi
T02D2257:263b-18: thob la gzugs sku rnam pa gnyis kyi yan lag
T02D2257:263b-20: 'di dag ni shugs kyis 'byung ba yin te sa
T02D2257:263b-21: bon chos kyi sku gnyug ma'i ngo bo nyid kyi
T02D2257:263b-22: sa bon gcig nyams su myong ba la stong pa
T02D2257:263b-23: dang snying rje gnyis po'i rnam pa lta bur gnas
T02D2257:263b-24: la / de'i don la gzugs sku gnyis 'byung ba'o //
T02D2257:263b-25: de dag thams cad kyang bde ba chen po'i rang
T02D2257:263b-26: bzhin gyi rgyu mtshan yin pas 'bras bu chos kyi
T02D2257:263b-28: de yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus su 'thob ba lta bu ni ma yin no //
T02D2257:263b-29: 'di nyid kyi rnam pa la bde ba dang stong
T02D2257:263b-30: pa dbyer med pa'i don rnal ma mchog tu gyur
T02D2257:263b-31: pa zag pa med pa'i bde bas gang ba rdo
T02D2257:263b-32: rje sems dpa' chen po de dag rtogs pas ni
T02D2257:263b-33: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa rnams las
T02D2257:263b-35: da ni cha dang mthun pa'i don bstan par bya ste /
T02D2257:263b-36: gang zhig 'dod pa can ni 'ong ba'i tshe //
T02D2257:263b-37: de ni gal te 'gro na re ba med //
T02D2257:263b-38: za phyir phor bas gdungs pa'i skyes bu zhig / kham phor dum bus slong par 'dod pa la //
T02D2257:263b-39: phyi sgor bor ba'i kham phor blangs nas su //
T02D2257:263b-40: gzhan la ster ba'i don ni mi byed pa //
T02D2257:263b-41: 'dod pa po la de dag mi ster ba //
T02D2257:263b-42: 'dis ni 'khor ba'i 'bras bu gang yin pa //
T02D2257:263b-43: nges par bskyed pas rnal 'byor dman pa'i lam //
T02D2257:264a-0: @264a * // de dag bzlog ste rang bzhin lam khyer na //
T02D2257:264a-1: de bas rnam rtog bor byas na 'ang rung //
T02D2257:264a-2: zhes bya ba'i don ni rnal 'byor pa dag gis
T02D2257:264a-3: snang ba sems la ma thim zhing tha mi dad
T02D2257:264a-4: ma grub kyi bar du rnam par smin pa la
T02D2257:264a-6: gang zhig ces bya ba ni rigs kyi bu skal pa dang ldan pa gang zhig go //
T02D2257:264a-7: de dag gnyis su med pa'i don khyad par can
T02D2257:264a-8: 'dod pa blo bzang po can dag 'ongs pa'i tshe
T02D2257:264a-9: rnal 'byor pa dag de ni gal te phan mi
T02D2257:264a-10: 'dogs shing 'gro na pha rol gyi sems bsad pa
T02D2257:264a-11: yin te rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi re ba med do
T02D2257:264a-12: // de bas na gzhan mi dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sbyor ba phra mo tsam yang mi bya ste /
T02D2257:264a-13: tha na za 'dod pa'i phyir phor bas gdungs pa'i
T02D2257:264a-14: gdol pa zhig gis skyes bu zhig la kham phor
T02D2257:264a-15: gyi dum bu 'am kham phor nyid slong bar 'dod
T02D2257:264a-16: pa la kham phor ji bzhin pa nyid dam phyi
T02D2257:264a-17: rol gyi sgo rtsar bor ba'i kham phor gyi dum
T02D2257:264a-18: bu blangs nas gzhan la ster ba'i don mi byed
T02D2257:264a-19: dam / 'dod pa po de dag la mi snyan
T02D2257:264a-20: par brjod cing mi ster ba 'di dag ni 'khor
T02D2257:264a-21: ba'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu gang yin pa
T02D2257:264a-22: de nges par skyed par byed pas rnal 'byor pa'i
T02D2257:264a-23: blo dman pa yin zhing lam log par rig par
T02D2257:264a-24: dam / bya'o // de dag las bzlog ste rang
T02D2257:264a-25: bzhin lam du khyer nas dus thams cad du spyod
T02D2257:264a-26: lam rnam pa bzhi la khyad med par 'jug pa
T02D2257:264a-27: na mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa bor bar byas
T02D2257:264a-28: dam / bya'o // na'ang rung ste / rnam par
T02D2257:264a-29: smin pa phra mo dag gis ldang bar mi nus
T02D2257:264a-30: dam / bya'o // na'ang rung ste / so //
T02D2257:264a-31: da ni don gyi glu bdun pa bstan par bya
T02D2257:264a-32: dam / bya'o // na'ang rung ste / so // ste / ae ma ho //
T02D2257:264a-37: aa yi ko dhi ka pa sa ri /
T02D2257:264a-38: khre ran aam pa ko yi ya /
T02D2257:264a-41: aa'i ka'i ra po li sa /
T02D2257:264a-42: gu hya tan tra kha ma la kang /
T02D2257:264a-44: su zhes bya ste 'di dag ni rje btsun pa
T02D2257:264a-45: dag gis rtog pa brjod pa ste de dag gi
T02D2257:264a-46: don ni / ae ma ho mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i skad /
T02D2257:264a-47: ae ni chos kyi dbyings yin te //
T02D2257:264a-48: ma ni de nyid kyis bskyed do //
T02D2257:264a-49: dper gzhag pa yi nam mkha' ste //
T02D2257:264a-50: 'gro ba tshogs bsags rgyud la des //
T02D2257:264a-51: ma ni nor 'dzin de las skye //
T02D2257:264b-0: @264b gsang ba rgyud las rag las gsal //
T02D2257:264b-1: skad ni mtshon ba tsam du zad //
T02D2257:264b-2: ces bya ba'i don ni aa ai ho zhes bya ste de dag gsal bar bya ba ni /
T02D2257:264b-3: chos kyi dbyings ni rnam pa gsum //
T02D2257:264b-4: bde dang gsal dang mi rtog pa'o //
T02D2257:264b-5: skyed pa'i ma ni de bzhin te //
T02D2257:264b-6: ma bcos rnal ma dran pa'o//
T02D2257:264b-7: mtshon pa'i dpe ni nam mkha' ste //
T02D2257:264b-8: smrar med mnyam dang ma shes so //
T02D2257:264b-9: tshogs bsags gang zag rten yin te //
T02D2257:264b-10: sbyangs dang tshogs med bla ma bsten //
T02D2257:264b-11: shugs kyis ma ni nyams myong ste //
T02D2257:264b-12: tha ma la goms dang rgyun du'o //
T02D2257:264b-13: gsang ba'i don ni brgyad pa ste //
T02D2257:264b-14: byin brlab nyams myong de ldan pa'o //
T02D2257:264b-15: thams cad brda yi rnam pa ste //
T02D2257:264b-16: nga yis smra bar mi nus pa'o //
T02D2257:264b-17: zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don no //
T02D2257:264b-18: da ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo bar bya ste //
T02D2257:264b-19: gnyis su med pa rdo rje'i glu //
T02D2257:264b-20: de nyid ye shes mtshon byed pa'i //
T02D2257:264b-21: don dam gnyis med yi ge yis //
T02D2257:264b-22: 'gro rnams rang la glur len shog //
T02D2257:264b-23: ces bya ba'i don ni snang ba dang sems gnyis
T02D2257:264b-24: su med pa bde ba chen po rdo rje'i glu
T02D2257:264b-25: 'di dag gis sems can gyi rgyud la de kho
T02D2257:264b-26: na nyid kyi ye shes yod pa de dag mtshon
T02D2257:264b-28: 'di dag ni don dam pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes yin te /
T02D2257:264b-29: de yis skal ba dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba rnams
T02D2257:264b-30: rang la glur len cing rtog par shog cig pa'i
T02D2257:264b-31: don to // da ni rje btsun pa dpal gyi
T02D2257:264b-32: ri bo pa'i dgongs pa bdag gis rnam par phye
T02D2257:264b-33: zhing gsal bar bya ba'i don bsngo bar bya ste
T02D2257:264b-34: don to // / sems nyid lhan cig skyes pa chos kyi sku //
T02D2257:264b-35: snang ba lhan cig skyes pa sku yi 'od //
T02D2257:264b-36: snang stong dbyer med lhan cig skyes pa ste //
T02D2257:264b-37: de nyid chos sku'i dgongs pa chos sku nyid //
T02D2257:264b-38: bdag nyid nyams su myong mthu las byung ba yi //
T02D2257:264b-39: rtogs pas rje btsun dgongs pa gsal bar byas //
T02D2257:264b-40: dri ldan mgon po khyod la phyag 'tshal te //
T02D2257:264b-41: drin mchog blan phyir 'di byas dgyes par mdzod //
T02D2257:264b-42: 'di las byung ba'i bsod nams tshogs dag gis //
T02D2257:264b-43: sems can thams cad bde ba che rtogs shog / rnam gsum slob ma dag pa'i phyir //
T02D2257:264b-44: de nyid gsal bar byed pa'i don //
T02D2257:264b-45: gnyis med rtogs pa mee tris bshad //
T02D2257:265a-1: la gzhol ba don ldan shog / mi zang pa'i
T02D2257:265a-2: gter mdzod yongs su gang ba'i glu zhes bya ba'i
T02D2257:265a-3: rgya cher bshad pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen
T02D2257:265a-4: po dpal sa ra ha pa'i dgongs pa mkhas par
T02D2257:265a-5: grags pa dpal ldang nyis su med pa'i rdo rjes
